46001001	Paul , called to be an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
46001002	to the church of God that is in Corinth , sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , together with all those who call upon the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place , their Lord and ours .
46001003	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
46001004	I give thanks to my God always concerning you , because of the grace of God which was given to you in Christ Jesus ,
46001005	that in everything you were made rich in him , in all speech and all knowledge ,
46001006	just as the testimony about Christ has been confirmed in you ,
46001007	so that you do not lack in any spiritual gift as you eagerly await the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
46001008	who will also confirm you until the end , blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001009	God is faithful , by whom you were called to fellowship with his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	Now I exhort you , brothers , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that you all say the same thing and there not be divisions among you , and that you be made complete in the same mind and with the same purpose .
46001011	For it has been made clear to me concerning you , my brothers , by ˻ Chloe’s people ˼ , that there are quarrels among you .
46001012	But I say this , that each of you is saying , “ I am with Paul , ” and “ I am with Apollos , ” and “ I am with Cephas , ” and “ I am with Christ . ”
46001013	Has Christ been divided ? Paul was not crucified for you , was he ? Or were you baptized in the name of Paul ?
46001014	I give thanks to God that I baptized none of you except Crispus and Gaius ,
46001015	lest anyone should say that you were baptized in my name .
46001016	( Now I also baptized the household of Stephanus . Beyond that I do not know if I baptized anyone else . )
46001017	For Christ did not send me to baptize , but to proclaim the gospel , not with ˻ clever speech ˼ , lest the cross of Christ be emptied .
46001018	For the message about the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing , but to us who are being saved it is the power of God .
46001019	For it is written , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and the intelligence of the intelligent I will confound . ”
46001020	Where is the wise person ? Where is the scribe ? Where is the debater of this age ? Has not God made foolish the wisdom of the world ?
46001021	For since , in the wisdom of God , the world through its wisdom did not know God , God was pleased through the foolishness of preaching to save those who believe .
46001022	For indeed , Jews ask for sign miracles and Greeks seek wisdom ,
46001023	but we preach Christ crucified , to the Jews a cause for stumbling , but to the Gentiles foolishness ,
46001024	but to those who are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God .
46001025	For the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom , and the weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	For consider your calling , brothers , that not many were wise according to human standards , not many were powerful , not many were well born .
46001027	But the foolish things of the world God chose in order that he might put to shame the wise , and the weak things of the world God chose in order that he might put to shame the strong ,
46001028	and the insignificant of the world , and the despised , God chose , the things that are not , in order that he might abolish the things that are ,
46001029	so that all flesh may not boast before God .
46001030	But from him you are in Christ Jesus , who became wisdom to us from God , and righteousness and sanctification and redemption ,
46001031	so that , just as it is written , “ The one who boasts , let him boast in the Lord . ”
46002001	And I , when I came to you , brothers , did not come with superiority of speech or of wisdom , proclaiming to you the mystery of God .
46002002	For I decided not to know anything among you except Jesus Christ and him crucified .
46002003	And I came to you in weakness and in fear and with much trembling ,
46002004	and my speech and my preaching were not with persuasive words of wisdom , but with a demonstration of the Spirit and power ,
46002005	in order that your faith would not be in the wisdom of men , but in the power of God .
46002006	Now we do speak wisdom among the mature , but wisdom not of this age or of the rulers of this age , who are perishing ,
46002007	but we speak the hidden wisdom of God in a mystery , which God predestined before the ages for our glory ,
46002008	which none of the rulers of this age knew . For if they had known it , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
46002009	But just as it is written , “ Things which eye has not seen and ear has not heard , and have not entered into the heart of man , are the things which God has prepared for those who love him . ”
46002010	But to us God has revealed them through the Spirit . For the Spirit searches all things , even the depths of God .
46002011	For who among men knows the things of a man , except the spirit of the man that is in him ? Thus also no one knows the things of God except the Spirit of God .
46002012	Now we have received not the spirit of the world , but the Spirit who is from God , in order that we may know the things freely given to us by God ,
46002013	things which we also speak , not in words taught by human wisdom , but in words taught by the Spirit , explaining spiritual things to spiritual people .
46002014	But the natural man does not accept the things of the Spirit of God , for they are foolishness to him , and he is not able to understand them , because they are spiritually discerned .
46002015	Now the spiritual person discerns all things , but he himself is judged by no one .
46002016	“ For who has known the mind of the Lord ; who has advised him ? ” But we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	And I , brothers , was not able to speak to you as to spiritual people , but as to fleshly people , as to infants in Christ .
46003002	I gave you milk to drink , not solid food , for you were not yet able to eat it . But now you are still not able ,
46003003	for you are still fleshly . For where there is jealousy and strife among you , are you not fleshly , and do you not live like unregenerate people ?
46003004	For whenever anyone says , “ I am with Paul , ” and another , “ I am with Apollos , ” are you not merely human ?
46003005	Therefore , what is Apollos and what is Paul ? Servants through whom you believed , and to each as the Lord gave .
46003006	I planted , Apollos watered , but God was causing it to grow .
46003007	So then , neither the one who plants nor the one who waters is anything , but God who is causing it to grow .
46003008	Now the one who plants and the one who waters are one , but each one will receive his own reward according to his own labor .
46003009	For we are God’s fellow workers ; you are God’s field , God’s building .
46003010	According to the grace of God given to me , like a skilled master builder I laid a foundation , and another is building upon it . But each one must direct his attention to how he is building upon it .
46003011	For no one is able to lay another foundation than the one which is laid , which is Jesus Christ .
46003012	Now if anyone builds upon the foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , grass , straw ,
46003013	the work of each one will become evident . For the day will reveal it , because it will be revealed with fire , and the fire itself will test the work of each one , of what sort it is .
46003014	If anyone’s work that he has built upon it remains , he will receive a reward .
46003015	If anyone’s work is burned up , he will suffer loss , but he himself will be saved , but so as through fire .
46003016	Do you not know that you are God’s temple and the Spirit of God dwells in you ?
46003017	If anyone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy this one . For God’s temple is holy , which you are .
46003018	Let no one deceive himself . If anyone thinks himself to be wise among you in this age , let him become a fool , in order that he may become wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God , for it is written , “ The one who catches the wise in their craftiness , ”
46003020	and again , “ The Lord knows the thoughts of the wise , that they are futile . ”
46003021	So then , let no one boast in people . For all things are yours ,
46003022	whether Paul or Apollos or Cephas or the world or life or death or things present or things to come , all thingsare yours ,
46003023	and you are Christ’s , and Christ is God’s .
46004001	Thus let a person consider us as servants of Christ and stewards of God’s mysteries .
46004002	In this case , moreover , it is sought in stewards that one be found faithful .
46004003	But to me it is a very little matter that I be judged by you or by a human court , but I do not even judge myself .
46004004	For I am conscious of nothing against myself , but not by this am I vindicated . But the one who judges me is the Lord .
46004005	Therefore do not judge anything before the time , until the Lord should come , who will both enlighten the hidden things of darkness and will reveal the counsels of hearts , and then praise will come to each one from God .
46004006	Now I have applied these things , brothers , to myself and Apollos for your sake , in order that in us you may learn not to go beyond what is written , lest someone be inflated with pride on behalf of one person against the other .
46004007	For who concedes you superiority ? And what do you have that you did not receive ? But if indeed you received it , why do you boast as if you did not receive it ?
46004008	Already you are satiated ! Already you are rich ! Apart from us you reign as kings ! And would that indeed you reigned as kings , in order that we also might reign as kings with you !
46004009	For , I think , God has exhibited us apostles last of all , as condemned to death , because we have become a spectacle to the world and to angels and to people .
46004010	We are fools for the sake of Christ , but you are prudent in Christ ! We are weak , but you are strong ! You are honored , but we are dishonored !
46004011	Until the present hour we are both hungry and thirsty and poorly clothed and roughly treated and homeless ,
46004012	and we toil , working with our own hands . When we are reviled , we bless ; when we are persecuted , we endure ;
46004013	when we are slandered , we encourage . We have become like the refuse of the world , the offscouring of all things , until now .
46004014	I am not writing these things to shame you , but admonishing you as my dear children .
46004015	For if you have ten thousand guardians in Christ , yet you do not have many fathers , for in Christ Jesus I fathered you through the gospel .
46004016	Therefore I exhort you , become imitators of me .
46004017	Because of this , I have sent to you Timothy , who is my dear and faithful child in the Lord , who will remind you of my ways in Christ Jesus , just as I teach everywhere in every church .
46004018	But some have become arrogant , as if I were not coming to you .
46004019	But I am coming to you soon , if the Lord wills , and I will know not the talk of the ones who have become arrogant , but the power .
46004020	For the kingdom of God is not with talk , but with power .
46004021	What do you want ? Shall I come to you with a rod , or with love and a spirit of gentleness ?
46005001	It is reported everywhere that there is sexual immorality among you , and sexual immorality of such a kind which does not even exist among the Gentiles , so that someone has the wife of his father .
46005002	And you are inflated with pride , and should you not rather have mourned , so that the one who has done this deed would be removed from your midst ?
46005003	For although I am absent in body but present in spirit , I have already passed judgment on the one who has done this in this way , as if I were present .
46005004	In the name of our Lord Jesus , when you are assembled , and my spirit , together with the power of our Lord Jesus ,
46005005	I have decided to hand over such a person to Satan for the destruction of the flesh , in order that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord .
46005006	Your boasting is not good . Do you not know that a little leaven leavens the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Clean out the old leaven in order that you may be a new batch of dough , just as you are unleavened . For Christ our Passover has been sacrificed .
46005008	So then , let us celebrate the feast , not with the old leaven or with the leaven of wickedness and sinfulness , but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth .
46005009	I wrote to you in the letter not to associate with sexually immoral people .
46005010	By no means did I mean the sexually immoral people of this world or the greedy people and swindlers or idolaters , since then you would have to depart out of the world .
46005011	But now I have written to you not to associate with any so-called brother , if he is a sexually immoral person or a greedy person or an idolater or an abusive person or a drunkard or a swindler — with such a person not even to eat .
46005012	For what is it to me to judge those outside ? Should you not judge those inside ?
46005013	But those outside God will judge . Remove the evil person ˻ from among yourselves ˼ .
46006001	Does anyone among you , if he has a matter against someone else , dare to go to court before the unrighteous , and not before the saints ?
46006002	Or do you not know that the saints will judge the world ? And if by you the world is judged , are you unworthy of the most insignificant courts ?
46006003	Do you not know that we will judge angels , not to mention ordinary matters ?
46006004	Therefore , if you have courts with regard to ordinary matters , do you seat these despised people in the church ?
46006005	I say this to your shame . So is there not anyone wise among you who will be able to render a decision between his brothers ?
46006006	But brother goes to court with brother , and this before unbelievers !
46006007	Therefore it is already completely a loss for you that you have lawsuits with one another . Why not rather be wronged ? Why not rather be defrauded ?
46006008	But you wrong and defraud , and do this to brothers !
46006009	Or do you not know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God ? Do not be deceived ! Neither sexually immoral people , nor idolaters , nor adulterers , nor passive homosexual partners , nor dominant homosexual partners ,
46006010	nor thieves , nor greedy persons , not drunkards , not abusive persons , not swindlers will inherit the kingdom of God .
46006011	And some of you were these things , but you were washed , but you were sanctified , but you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	All things are permitted for me , but not all things are profitable . All things are permitted for me , but I will not be controlled by anything .
46006013	Food is for the stomach , and the stomach for food , but God will abolish ˻ both of them ˼ . Now the body is not for sexual immorality , but for the Lord , and the Lord for the body .
46006014	And God both raised up the Lord and will raise us up by his power .
46006015	Do you not know that your bodies are members of Christ ? Therefore , shall I take away the members of Christ and make them members of a prostitute ? May it never be !
46006016	Or do you not know that the one who joins himself to a prostitute is one body with her ? For it says , “ The two will become one flesh . ”
46006017	But the one who joins himself to the Lord is one spirit with him .
46006018	Flee sexual immorality . Every sin that a person commits is outside his body , but the one who commits sexual immorality sins against his own body .
46006019	Or do you not know that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit who is in you , whom you have from God , and you are not your own ?
46006020	For you were bought at a price ; therefore glorify God with your body .
46007001	Now concerning the things about which you wrote : “ It is good for a man not to touch a woman . ”
46007002	But because of sexual immorality , let each man have his own wife and let each woman have her own husband .
46007003	The husband must fulfill his obligation to his wife , and likewise also the wife to her husband .
46007004	The wife does not have authority over her own body , but her husband does . And likewise also the husband does not have authority over his own body , but his wife does .
46007005	Do not defraud one another , except perhaps by agreement , for a time , in order that you may devote yourselves to prayer , and then you should be ˻ together ˼ again , lest Satan tempt you because of your lack of self control .
46007006	But I say this as a concession , not as a command .
46007007	I wish all people could be like myself , but each one has his own gift from God , one in this way and another in that way .
46007008	Now I say to the unmarried and to the widows : It is good for them if they remain as I am .
46007009	But if they cannot control themselves , they should marry , for it is better to marry than to burn with sexual desire .
46007010	To the married I command — not I , but the Lord — a wife must not separate from her husband .
46007011	But if indeed she does separate , she must remain unmarried or be reconciled to her husband . And a husband must not divorce his wife .
46007012	Now to the rest I say — not the Lord — if any brother has an unbelieving wife and she consents to live with him , he must not divorce her .
46007013	And if any wife has an unbelieving husband and he consents to live with her , she must not divorce her husband .
46007014	For the unbelieving husband is sanctified by his wife , and the unbelieving wife is sanctified by the brother , since otherwise your children are unclean , but now they are holy .
46007015	But if the unbeliever leaves , let him leave . The brother or the sister is not bound in such cases . But God has called you in peace .
46007016	For how do you know , wife , whether you will save your husband ? Or how do you know , husband , whether you will save your wife ?
46007017	But to each one as the Lord has apportioned . As God has called each one , thus let him live — and thus I order in all the churches .
46007018	Was anyone called after being circumcised ? He must not undo his circumcision . Was anyone called in uncircumcision ? He must not become circumcised .
46007019	Circumcision is nothing and uncircumcision is nothing , but the keeping of the commandments of God .
46007020	Each one in the calling in which he was called — in this he should remain .
46007021	Were you called while a slave ? Do not let it be a concern to you . But if indeed you are able to become free , rather make use of it .
46007022	For the one who is called in the Lord while a slave is the Lord’s freedperson . Likewise the one who is called while free is a slave of Christ .
46007023	You were bought at a price ; do not become slaves of men .
46007024	Each one in the situation in which he was called , brothers — in this he should remain with God .
46007025	Now concerning virgins I do not have a command from the Lord , but I am giving an opinion as one shown mercy by the Lord to be trustworthy .
46007026	Therefore , I consider this to be good because of the impending distress , that it is good for a man to be thus .
46007027	Are you bound to a wife ? Do not seek release . Are you free from a wife ? Do not seek a wife .
46007028	But if you marry , you have not sinned , and if the virgin marries , she has not sinned . But such people will have affliction in the flesh , and I would spare you .
46007029	But I say this , brothers : the time is shortened , that from now on even those who have wives should be as if they do not have wives ,
46007030	and those who weep as if they do not weep , and those who rejoice as if they do not rejoice , and those who buy as if they do not possess ,
46007031	and those who make use of the world as if they do not make full use of it . For the present form of this world is passing away .
46007032	But I want you to be free from care . The unmarried person cares for the things of the Lord , how he may please the Lord .
46007033	But the one who is married cares for the things of the world , how he may please his wife ,
46007034	and he is divided . And the unmarried woman or the virgin cares for the things of the Lord , in order that she may be holy both in body and in spirit . But the married woman cares for the things of the world , how she may please her husband .
46007035	Now I am saying this for your own benefit , not that I may put a restriction on you , but to promote appropriate and devoted service to the Lord without distraction .
46007036	But if anyone thinks he is behaving dishonorably concerning his virgin , if she is past her prime and it ought to be thus , let him do what he wishes . He does not sin . Let them marry .
46007037	But he who stands firm in his heart , not having necessity , but has authority concerning his own will , and has decided this in his own heart , to keep his own virgin , he will do well .
46007038	So then , the one who marries his own virgin does well , and the one who does not marry her will do better .
46007039	A wife is bound for as long a time as her husband lives . But if her husband ˻ dies ˼ , she is free to marry whomever she wishes , only in the Lord .
46007040	But she is happier if she remains thus , according to my opinion — and I think I have the Spirit of God .
46008001	Now concerning food sacrificed to idols , we know that “ we all have knowledge . ” Knowledge puffs up , but love builds up .
46008002	If anyone thinks he knows anything , he has not yet known as it is necessary to know .
46008003	But if anyone loves God , this one is known by him .
46008004	Therefore , concerning the eating of food sacrificed to idols , we know that “ an idol is nothing in the world ” and that “ there is no God except one . ”
46008005	For even if after all there are so-called gods , whether in heaven or on earth , just as there are many gods and many lords ,
46008006	yet to us there is one God , the Father , from whom are all things , and we are for him , and there is one Lord , Jesus Christ , through whom are all things , and we are through him .
46008007	But this knowledge is not in everyone . But some , being accustomed until now to the idol , eat this food as food sacrificed to idols , and their conscience , because it is weak , is defiled .
46008008	But food does not bring us close to God . Neither if we do not eat do we lack , nor if we do eat do we have more .
46008009	But watch out lest somehow this right of yours becomes a cause for stumbling to the weak .
46008010	For if someone should see you who has knowledge reclining for a meal in an idol’s temple , will not his conscience , because it is weak , be strengthened so that he eats the food sacrificed to idols ?
46008011	For the one who is weak — the brother for whom Christ died — is destroyed by your knowledge .
46008012	Now if you sin in this way against the brothers and wound their conscience , which is weak , you sin against Christ .
46008013	Therefore , if food causes my brother to sin , I will never eat meat ˻ forever ˼ , in order that I may not cause my brother to sin .
46009001	Am I not free ? Am I not an apostle ? Have I not seen Jesus our Lord ? Are you not my work in the Lord ?
46009002	If to others I am not an apostle , yet indeed I am to you , for you are my seal of apostleship in the Lord .
46009003	My defense to those who examine me is this :
46009004	Do we not have the right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Do we not have the right to take along a sister as wife , like the rest of the apostles and the brothers of the Lord and Cephas ?
46009006	Or do only I and Barnabas not have the right ˻ to refrain from working ˼ ?
46009007	Who ever serves as a soldier at his own expense ? Who plants a vineyard and does not eat the fruit of it ? Or who shepherds a flock and does not drink from the milk of the flock ?
46009008	I am not saying these things according to a human perspective . Or does the law not also say these things ?
46009009	For in the law of Moses it is written , “ You must not muzzle an ox while it is threshing . ” It is not about oxen God is concerned , is it ?
46009010	Or doubtless does he speak ˻ for our sake ˼ ? For it is written ˻ for our sake ˼ , because the one who plows ought to plow in hope and the one who threshes ought to do so in hope of a share .
46009011	If we have sown spiritual things among you , is it too great a thing if we reap material things from you ?
46009012	If others share this right over you , do we not do so even more ? Yet we have not made use of this right , but we endure all things , in order that we may not cause any hindrance to the gospel of Christ .
46009013	Do you not know that those performing the holy services eat the things from the temple , and those attending to the altar have a share with the altar ?
46009014	In the same way also the Lord ordered those who proclaim the gospel to live from the gospel .
46009015	But I have not made use of any of these rights . And I am not writing these things in order that it may be thus with me . For it would be better to me rather to die than for anyone to deprive me of my reason for boasting .
46009016	For if I proclaim the gospel , it is not to me a reason for boasting , for necessity is imposed on me . For woe is to me if I do not proclaim the gospel .
46009017	For if I do this voluntarily , I have a reward , but if I do so unwillingly , I have been entrusted with a stewardship .
46009018	What then is my reward ? That when I proclaim the gospel , I may offer the gospel free of charge , in order not to make full use of my right in the gospel .
46009019	For although I am free from all people , I have enslaved myself to all , in order that I may gain more .
46009020	I have become like a Jew to the Jews , in order that I may gain the Jews . To those under the law I became as under the law ( although I myself am not under the law ) in order that I may gain those under the law .
46009021	To those outside the law I became as outside the law ( although I am not outside the law of God , but subject to the law of Christ ) in order that I may gain those outside the law .
46009022	To the weak I became weak , in order that I may gain the weak . I have become all things to all people , in order that by all means I may save some .
46009023	I do all this for the sake of the gospel , in order that I may become a participant with it .
46009024	Do you not know that those who run in the stadium all run , but one receives the prize ? Run in such a way that you may win .
46009025	And everyone who competes exercises self-control in all things . Thus those do so in order that they may receive a perishable crown , but we an imperishable one .
46009026	Therefore I run in this way , not as running aimlessly ; I box in this way , not as beating the air .
46009027	But I discipline my body and subjugate it , lest somehow after preaching to others , I myself should become disqualified .
46010001	For I do not want you to be ignorant , brothers , that our fathers were all under the cloud and all went through the sea ,
46010002	and all were baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea ,
46010003	and all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink . For they drank from the spiritual rock that followed them , and the rock was Christ .
46010005	But God was not pleased with the majority of them , for they were struck down in the desert .
46010006	Now these things happened as examples for us , so that we should not be desirers of evil things , just as those also desired them ,
46010007	and not become idolaters , as some of them did , just as it is written , “ The people sat down to eat and drink , and stood up to play , ”
46010008	nor commit sexual immorality , as some of them committed sexual immorality , and twenty-three thousand fell in one day ,
46010009	nor put Christ to the test , as some of them tested him , and were destroyed by snakes ,
46010010	nor grumble , just as some of them grumbled , and were destroyed by the destroyer .
46010011	Now these things happened to those people as an example , but are written for our instruction , on whom the ends of the ages have come .
46010012	Therefore , the one who thinks that he stands must watch out lest he fall .
46010013	Temptation has not come upon you except what is common to humanity . But God is faithful , who will not permit you to be tempted beyond what you are able , but will also make a way out together with the temptation , so that you may be able to endure it .
46010014	Therefore , my dear friends , flee from idolatry .
46010015	I am speaking as to sensible people ; you judge what I am saying .
46010016	The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not a participation in the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not a participation in the body of Christ ?
46010017	Because there is one bread , we who are many are one body , for we all share from the one bread .
46010018	Consider Israel according to the flesh : are not the ones who eat the sacrifices sharers in the altar ?
46010019	Therefore , what am I saying ? That food sacrificed to idols is anything , or that an idol is anything ?
46010020	No , but that the things which they sacrifice , they sacrifice to demons and not to God , and I do not want you to become sharers with demons .
46010021	You are not able to drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons . You are not able to share the table of the Lord and the table of demons .
46010022	Or are we attempting to provoke the Lord to jealousy ? We are not stronger than he is , are we ?
46010023	All things are permitted , but not all things are profitable . All things are permitted , but not all things build up .
46010024	Let no one seek ˻ his own good ˼ but the good of the other .
46010025	Eat everything that is sold in the meat market , ˻ asking no questions ˼ for the sake of the conscience ,
46010026	for “ the earth is the Lord’s , and its fullness . ”
46010027	If any of the unbelievers invites you , and you want to go , eat everything that is set before you , ˻ asking no questions ˼ for the sake of the conscience .
46010028	But if someone says to you , “ This is offered to idols , ” do not eat it , for the sake of that one who informed you and the conscience .
46010029	Now I am not speaking about your own conscience , but the conscience of the other person . For why is my freedom judged by another’s conscience ?
46010030	If I partake with thankfulness , why am I slandered concerning that for which I give thanks ?
46010031	Therefore , whether you eat or you drink or whatever you do , do all things for the glory of God .
46010032	˻ Give no offense ˼ both to Jews and to Greeks and to the church of God ,
46010033	just as I also please all people in all things , not seeking my own benefit , but the benefit of the many , in order that they may be saved .
46011001	Become imitators of me , just as I also am of Christ .
46011002	Now I praise you that you remember me in all things , and just as I handed over to you the traditions , you hold fast to them .
46011003	But I want you to know that Christ is the head of every man , and the man is the head of the woman , and the head of Christ is God .
46011004	Every man who prays or prophesies while having something on his head dishonors his head ,
46011005	but every woman who prays or prophesies with uncovered head dishonors her head , for she is one and the same with the one whose head is shaved .
46011006	For if a woman does not cover herself , let her hair be shorn off . But if it is shameful for a woman to have her head shorn or shaved , let her cover her head .
46011007	For indeed a man ought not to cover his head , because he is the image and glory of God , but the woman is the glory of the man .
46011008	For man is not from woman , but woman from man .
46011009	For indeed man was not created for the sake of the woman , but woman for the sake of the man .
46011010	Because of this , the woman ought to have a symbol of authority on her head , on account of the angels .
46011011	Nevertheless , neither is woman anything apart from man , nor is man anything apart from woman in the Lord .
46011012	For just as the woman is from the man , thus also the man is through the woman . But all thingsare from God .
46011013	You judge ˻ for yourselves ˼ : is it fitting for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	And does not nature itself teach you that a man , if he wears long hair , it is a dishonor to him ?
46011015	But a woman , if she wears long hair , it is her glory , because her hair is given to her for a covering .
46011016	But if anyone is disposed to be contentious , we have no such custom , nor do the churches of God .
46011017	But in giving this instruction I do not praise you , because you come together not for the better but for the worse .
46011018	For in the first place , when you come together as a church , I hear there are divisions among you , and in part I believe it .
46011019	For indeed it is necessary that there be factions among you , in order that those who are approved may become evident among you .
46011020	Therefore , when you come together in the same place , it is not to eat the Lord’s supper .
46011021	For when you eat it , each one of you goes ahead to take his own supper , and one is hungry and another is drunk .
46011022	For do you not have houses for eating and drinking ? Or do you despise the church of God and humiliate those who do not have anything ? What shall I say to you ? Shall I praise you ? In this I will not praise you !
46011023	For I received from the Lord what I also passed on to you , that the Lord Jesus , on the night in which he was betrayed , took bread ,
46011024	and after he had given thanks , he broke it and said , “ This is my body which is for you . Do this in remembrance of me . ”
46011025	Likewise also the cup , after they had eaten , saying , “ This cup is the new covenant in my blood . Do this , as often as you drink it , in remembrance of me . ”
46011026	For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup , you proclaim the Lord’s death until he comes .
46011027	So then , whoever eats the bread or drinks the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner will be guilty of the body and the blood of the Lord .
46011028	But let a person examine himself , and in this way let him eat from the bread and let him drink from the cup .
46011029	For the one who eats and drinks , if he does not recognize the body , eats and drinks judgment against himself .
46011030	Because of this , many are weak and sick among you , and quite a few ˻ have died ˼ .
46011031	But if we were evaluating ourselves , we would not be judged .
46011032	But if we are judged by the Lord , we are being disciplined , in order that we will not be condemned with the world .
46011033	So then , my brothers , when you come together in order to eat the Lord’s supper , wait for one another .
46011034	If anyone is hungry , let him eat at home , lest you come together for judgment . And I will give directions about the remaining matters whenever I come .
46012001	Now concerning spiritual gifts , brothers , I do not want you to be ignorant .
46012002	You know that when you were pagans , you were led astray to the speechless idols , however you were led .
46012003	Therefore I make known to you that no one speaking by the Spirit of God says , “ Jesus is accursed , ” and no one is able to say “ Jesus is Lord ” except by the Holy Spirit .
46012004	Now there are varieties of gifts , but the same Spirit ,
46012005	and there are varieties of ministries , and the same Lord ,
46012006	and there are varieties of activities , but the same God , who works all things in all people .
46012007	But to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit for what is beneficial to all .
46012008	For to one is given a word of wisdom through the Spirit , and to another a word of knowledge by the same Spirit ,
46012009	to another faith by the same Spirit , and to another gifts of healing by the one Spirit ,
46012010	and to another ˻ miraculous powers ˼ , and to another prophecy , and to another distinguishing of spirits , to another kinds of tongues , and to another interpretation of tongues .
46012011	But in all these things one and the same Spirit is at work , distributing to each one individually just as he wishes .
46012012	For just as the body is one and has many members , but all the members of the body , although they are many , are one body , thus also Christ .
46012013	For by one Spirit we were all baptized into one body , whether Jews or Greeks , whether slaves or free persons , and all were made to drink one Spirit .
46012014	For the body is not one member , but many .
46012015	If the foot should say , “ Because I am not a hand , I am not a part of the body , ” not because of this is it not a part of the body .
46012016	And if the ear should say , “ Because I am not an eye , I am not a part of the body , not because of this is it not a part of the body .
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , where would the hearing be ? If the whole were hearing , where would the sense of smell be ?
46012018	But now God has placed the members , each one of them , in the body just as he wanted .
46012019	And if they all were one member , where would the body be ?
46012020	But now there are many members , but one body .
46012021	Now the eye is not able to say to the hand , “ I do not have need of you , ” or again , the head to the feet , “ I do not have need of you . ”
46012022	But by much more the members of the body which are thought to be weaker are necessary ,
46012023	and the parts of the body which we think to be less honorable , these we clothe with more abundant honor , and our unpresentable parts come to have more abundant presentability ,
46012024	but our presentable parts do not have need of this . Yet God composed the body by giving more abundant honor to the part which lacked it ,
46012025	in order that there not be a division in the body , but the members would have the same concern for one another .
46012026	And if one member suffers , all the members suffer together ; if one member is honored , all the members rejoice with it .
46012027	Now you are the body of Christ , and members ˻ of it individually ˼ ,
46012028	and whom God has appointed in the church : first , apostles , second , prophets , third , teachers , then miracles , then gifts of healing , helps , administrations , kinds of tongues .
46012029	Not all are apostles , are they ? Not all are prophets , are they ? Not all are teachers , are they ? Not all are workers of miracles , are they ?
46012030	Not all have gifts of healing , do they ? Not all speak with tongues , do they ? Not all interpret , do they ?
46012031	But strive for the greater gifts . And I will show you a still more excellent way .
46013001	If I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , but do not have love , I have become a ringing brass gong or a clashing cymbal .
46013002	And if I have the gift of prophecy and I know all mysteries and all knowledge , and if I have all faith so that I can remove mountains , but do not have love , I am nothing .
46013003	And if I parcel out all my possessions , and if I hand over my body in order that I may boast , but do not have love , it benefits me nothing .
46013004	Love is patient , love is kind , love is not jealous , it does not boast , it does not become conceited ,
46013005	it does not behave dishonorably , it˻ is not selfish ˼ , it does not become angry , it does not keep a record of wrongs ,
46013006	it does not rejoice at unrighteousness , but rejoices with the truth ,
46013007	bears all things , believes all things , hopes all things , endures all things .
46013008	Love never ends . But if there are prophecies , they will pass away . If there are tongues , they will cease . If there is knowledge , it will pass away .
46013009	For we know in part and we prophesy in part ,
46013010	but whenever the perfect comes , the partial will pass away .
46013011	When I was a child , I spoke like a child , I thought like a child , I reasoned like a child . When I became a man , I set aside the things of a child .
46013012	For now we see through a mirror ˻ indirectly ˼ , but then face to face . Now I know in part , but then I will know completely , just as I have also been completely known .
46013013	And now these three things remain : faith , hope , and love . But the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love , and strive for spiritual gifts , but especially that you may prophesy .
46014002	For the one who speaks in a tongue does not speak to people but to God , because no one understands , but by the Spirit he speaks mysteries .
46014003	But the one who prophesies speaks to people edification and encouragement and consolation .
46014004	The one who speaks in a tongue edifies himself , but the one who prophesies edifies the church .
46014005	Now I want you all to speak with tongues , but even more that you may prophesy . The one who prophesies is greater than the one who speaks with tongues , unless he interprets , in order that the church may receive edification .
46014006	But now , brothers , if I come to you speaking with tongues , how do I benefit you , unless I speak to you either with a revelation or with knowledge or with a prophecy or with a teaching ?
46014007	Likewise , the inanimate things which produce a sound , whether flute or lyre , if they do not produce a distinction in the tones , how will it be known what is played on the flute or on the lyre ?
46014008	For indeed , if the trumpet produces an indistinct sound , who will prepare for battle ?
46014009	And so you through the tongue , unless you produce a clear message , how will it be known what is spoken ? For you will be speaking into the air .
46014010	There are probably so many kinds of languages in the world , and none without meaning .
46014011	Therefore , if I do not know the meaning of the language , I will be a barbarian to the one who is speaking , and the one who is speaking will be a barbarian in my judgment .
46014012	In this way also you , since you are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek for the edification of the church , in order that you may abound .
46014013	Therefore the one who speaks in a tongue must pray that he may interpret .
46014014	For if I pray in a tongue , my spirit prays but my mind is unproductive .
46014015	˻ Therefore what should I do ˼ ? I will pray with my spirit , but I will also pray with my mind . I will sing praise with my spirit , but I will also sing praise with my mind .
46014016	For otherwise , if you praise in your spirit , how will the one who fills the place of the outsider say the “ amen ” at your thanksgiving , because he does not know what you are saying ?
46014017	For indeed you are giving thanks well , but the other person is not edified .
46014018	I give thanks to God that I speak with tongues more than all of you ,
46014019	but in the church I prefer to speak five words with my mind , in order that I may instruct other people , than ten thousand words in a tongue .
46014020	Brothers , do not become children in your understanding , but with respect to wickedness be as a child , and in your understanding be mature .
46014021	In the law it is written : “ By those who speak a foreign languageand by the lips of othersI will speak to this people , and not even in this way will they obey me , ” says the Lord .
46014022	So then , tongues are for a sign not to those who believe , but to unbelievers , but prophecy is not for unbelievers , but for those who believe .
46014023	Therefore , if the whole church comes together at the same time and all speak with tongues , and outsiders or unbelievers enter , will they not say that you are out of your minds ?
46014024	But if all prophesy , and some unbeliever or outsider enters , he is convicted by all , he is judged by all ,
46014025	the secret things of his heart become evident , and so , falling on his face , he will worship God , proclaiming , “ God is truly among you ! ”
46014026	˻ Therefore what should you do ˼ , brothers ? Whenever you come together , each one of you has a psalm , has a teaching , has a revelation , has a tongue , has an interpretation . All things must be done for edification .
46014027	If anyone speaks in a tongue , it must be on one occasion two or at most three , and ˻ one after the other ˼ , and one must interpret .
46014028	But if there is no interpreter , he must be silent in the church , but let him speak to himself and to God .
46014029	Let two or three prophets speak , and the others evaluate .
46014030	And if something is revealed to another who is seated , the first must be silent .
46014031	For you are all able to prophesy ˻ in turn ˼ , in order that all may learn and all may be encouraged ,
46014032	and the spirits of prophets are subject to prophets .
46014033	For God is not a God of disorder but of peace . As in all the churches of the saints ,
46014034	the women must be silent in the churches , for it is not permitted for them to speak , but they must be in submission , just as the law also says .
46014035	But if they want to learn something , let them ask their own husbands at home , for it is shameful for a woman to speak in church .
46014036	Or has the word of God gone out from you , or has it come to you only ?
46014037	If anyone thinks he is a prophet or spiritual , he should recognize that the things which I am writing to you are a command of the Lord .
46014038	But if anyone ignores this , he is ignored .
46014039	So then , my brothers , desire to prophesy , and do not prevent speaking with tongues .
46014040	But let all things be done decently and according to proper procedure .
46015001	Now I make known to you , brothers , the gospel which I proclaimed to you , which you have also received , in which you also stand ,
46015002	by which you are also being saved , if you hold fast to the message I proclaimed to you , unless you believed to no purpose .
46015003	For I passed on to you ˻ as of first importance ˼ what I also received , that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ,
46015004	and that he was buried , and that he was raised up on the third day according to the scriptures ,
46015005	and that he appeared to Cephas , then to the twelve ,
46015006	then he appeared to more than five hundred brothers at once , the majority of whom remain until now , but some have fallen asleep .
46015007	Then he appeared to James , then to all the apostles ,
46015008	and last of all , as it were to one born at the wrong time , he appeared also to me .
46015009	For I am the least of the apostles , not worthy to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
46015010	But by the grace of God I am what I am , and his grace to me has not been in vain , but I labored even more than all of them , and not I , but the grace of God with me .
46015011	Therefore whether I or those , in this way we preached , and in this way you believed .
46015012	Now if Christ is preached as raised up from the dead , how do some among you say that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
46015013	But if there is no resurrection of the dead , Christ has not been raised either .
46015014	But if Christ has not been raised , then both our preaching is in vain , and your faith is in vain .
46015015	And also we are found to be false witnesses of God , because we testified against God that he raised Christ , whom he did not raise if after all , then , the dead are not raised .
46015016	For if the dead are not raised , Christ has not been raised either .
46015017	But if Christ has not been raised , your faith is empty ; you are still in your sins .
46015018	And as a further result , those who have fallen asleep in Christ have perished .
46015019	If ˻ we have put our hope ˼ in Christ in this life only , we are of all people most pitiable .
46015020	But now Christ has been raised from the dead , the first fruits of those who have fallen asleep .
46015021	For since through a man came death , also through a man came the resurrection of the dead .
46015022	For just as in Adam all die , so also in Christ all will be made alive .
46015023	But each in his own group : Christ the first fruits , then those who are Christ’s at his coming ,
46015024	then the end , when he hands over the kingdom to the God and Father , when he has abolished all rule and all authority and power .
46015025	For it is necessary for him to reign until he has put all his enemies under his feet .
46015026	The last enemy to be abolished is death .
46015027	For “ he subjected all things under his feet . ” But when it says “ all things ” are subjected , it is clear that the one who subjected all things to him is not included .
46015028	But whenever all things are subjected to him , then the Son himself also will be subjected to the one who subjected all things to him , in order that God may be all in all .
46015029	Otherwise , why do they do it , those who are being baptized on behalf of the dead ? If the dead are not raised at all , why indeed are they being baptized on behalf of them ?
46015030	And why are we in danger every hour ?
46015031	I die every day — yes indeed , by my boasting in you , brothers , which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord !
46015032	If according to a human perspective I fought wild beasts at Ephesus , what benefit is it to me ? If the dead are not raised , let us eat and drink , for tomorrow we die .
46015033	Do not be deceived ! “ Bad company corrupts good morals . ”
46015034	Sober up correctly and ˻ stop sinning ˼ , for some have no knowledge of God — I say this to your shame .
46015035	But someone will say , “ How are the dead raised ? And with what sort of body do they come ? ”
46015036	Foolish person ! What you sow does not come to life unless it dies .
46015037	And what you sow is not the body which it will become , but you sow the bare seed , whether perhaps of wheat or of some of the rest .
46015038	But God gives to it a body just as he wishes , and to each one of the seeds its own body .
46015039	Not all flesh is the same , but there is one flesh of human beings , and another flesh of animals , and another flesh of birds , and another of fish ,
46015040	and heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . But the glory of the heavenly bodiesis of one kind , and the glory of the earthly bodiesis of another kind .
46015041	There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars , for star differs from star in glory .
46015042	Thus also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption , it is raised in incorruptibility .
46015043	It is sown in dishonor , it is raised in glory . It is sown in weakness , it is raised in power .
46015044	It is sown a natural body , it is raised a spiritual body . If there is a natural body , there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	Thus also it is written , “ The first man , Adam , became a living soul ” ; the last Adam became a life-giving spirit .
46015046	But the spiritual is not first , but the natural ; then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man is from the earth , made of earth ; the second man is from heaven .
46015048	As the one who is made of earth , so also are those who are made of earth , and as the heavenly , so also are those who are heavenly .
46015049	And just as we have borne the image of the one who is made of earth , we will also bear the image of the heavenly .
46015050	But I say this , brothers , that flesh and blood is not able to inherit the kingdom of God , nor can corruption inherit incorruptibility .
46015051	Behold , I tell you a mystery : we will not all fall asleep , but we will all be changed ,
46015052	in a moment , in the blink of an eye , at the last trumpet . For the trumpet will sound , and the dead will be raised imperishable , and we will be changed .
46015053	For it is necessary for this perishable body to put on incorruptibility , and this mortal body to put on immortality .
46015054	But whenever this perishable body puts on incorruptibility and this mortal body puts on immortality , then the saying that is written will take place : “ Death is swallowed up in victory .
46015055	Where , O death , is your victory ? Where , O death , is your sting ?
46015056	Now the sting of death is sin , and the power of sin is the law .
46015057	But thanks be to God , who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ !
46015058	So then , my dear brothers , be steadfast , immovable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , because you know that your labor is not in vain in the Lord .
46016001	Now concerning the collection for the saints : just as I gave directions about it to the churches of Galatia , so you do also .
46016002	On the first day of the week , each one of you ˻ put aside ˼ something , saving up ˻ to whatever extent he has prospered ˼ , in order that whenever I come , at that time collections do not take place .
46016003	And whenever I arrive , whomever you approve by letters , I will send these to take your gift to Jerusalem .
46016004	And if it is worthwhile for me to go also , they will travel with me .
46016005	But I will come to you whenever I go through Macedonia ( for I am going through Macedonia ) ,
46016006	and perhaps I will stay with you , or even spend the winter , so that you may send me on my way wherever I may go .
46016007	For I do not want to see you now in passing , for I hope to remain some time with you , if the Lord allows it .
46016008	But I will remain in Ephesus until Pentecost ,
46016009	for a great and effective door has opened for me , and there are many opponents .
46016010	But if Timothy comes , see that he is with you without cause to fear , for he is carrying out the Lord’s work , as I also am .
46016011	Therefore do not let anyone disdain him , but send him on his way in peace in order that he may come to me , for I am expecting him with the brothers .
46016012	Now concerning Apollos our brother , I urged him many times that he should come to you with the brothers , and he was not at all willing that he should come now , but he will come whenever he has an opportunity .
46016013	Be on the alert , stand firm in the faith , act courageously , be strong .
46016014	All your actions must be done in love .
46016015	Now I urge you , brothers — you know about the household of Stephanas , that they are the first fruits of Achaia , and they have devoted themselves to the ministry for the saints —
46016016	that you also be subject to such people , and to all those who work together and labor .
46016017	Now I rejoice over the arrival of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus , because these make up for your absence ,
46016018	for they have refreshed my spirit and yours . Therefore recognize such people .
46016019	The churches of the province of Asia greet you . Aquila and Prisca greet you in the Lord many times , together with the church in their house .
46016020	All the brothers greet you . Greet one another with a holy kiss .
46016021	The greeting is by my hand — Paul’s .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , let him be accursed . O Lord , come !
46016023	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
