47001001	Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God , and Timothy our brother , to the church of God that is in Corinth , together with all the saints who are in all Achaia .
47001002	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
47001003	Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies and God of all comfort ,
47001004	who comforts us in all our affliction , so that we may be able to comfort those who are in all affliction with the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God .
47001005	For just as the sufferings of Christ overflow to us , thus through Christ our comfort overflows also .
47001006	But if we are afflicted , it is for your comfort and salvation ; if we are comforted , it is for your comfort that is at work in the patient endurance of the same sufferings that we also suffer .
47001007	And our hope for you is firm , because we know that as you are sharers in the sufferings , so also you will be sharers in the comfort .
47001008	For we do not want you to be ignorant , brothers , concerning our affliction that happened in the province of Asia , that we were burdened to an extraordinary degree , beyond our strength , so that we were in despair even of living .
47001009	But we ourselves had the sentence of death in ourselves , so that we would not be putting confidence in ourselves , but in God who raises the dead ,
47001010	who delivered us from so great a risk of death , and will deliver us , in whom we have put our hope that he will also deliver us again ,
47001011	while you also join in helping ˻ on our behalf ˼ by prayer , so that thanks may be given ˻ on our behalf ˼ by many persons for this gracious gift given to us through the help of many .
47001012	For our reason for boasting is this : the testimony of our conscience that we conducted ourselves in the world , and especially toward you , in sincerity and purity of motive from God and not in merely human wisdom , but by the grace of God .
47001013	For we are not writing anything else to you except what you can read or also understand . But I hope that you will understand ˻ completely ˼ ,
47001014	just as you have also understood us in part , that we are your reason for boasting , just as you are also ours in the day of our Lord Jesus .
47001015	And with this confidence , I was wanting to come to you previously , in order that you may have a second proof of my goodwill ,
47001016	and through you to go to Macedonia , and to come to you again from Macedonia , and to be sent on my way by you to Judea .
47001017	Therefore , when I was wanting to do this , perhaps then was I making use of vacillation ? Or was I deciding what I was deciding according to the flesh , in order that with me my “ yes ” may be “ yes ” and my “ no ” may be “ no ” at the same time ?
47001018	But God is faithful , so that our word to you is not “ yes ” and “ no . ”
47001019	For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , the one who was proclaimed among you by us , by me and Silvanus and Timothy , did not become “ yes ” and “ no , ” but has become “ yes ” in him .
47001020	For as many as are the promises of God , in him they are “ yes ” ; therefore also through him is the “ amen ” to the glory of God through us .
47001021	Now the one who establishes us together with you in Christ and who anoints us is God ,
47001022	who also sealed us and gave the down payment of the Spirit in our hearts .
47001023	But I call upon God as witness against my life , that in order to spare you , I did not come again to Corinth .
47001024	Not that we lord it over your faith , but we are fellow workers for your joy , because by faith you stand firm .
47002001	For I have decided this for myself , not to come to you again in sorrow .
47002002	For if I cause you sorrow , then who will make me glad except the one who is caused to be sad by me ?
47002003	And I wrote this very thing in order that when I came , I would not experience sorrow from those who ought to have made me glad , because I have confidence about you all , that my joy ˻ belongs to all of you ˼ .
47002004	For out of great distress and anguish of heart I wrote to you through many tears , not so that you may be caused to be sad , but so that you may know the love that I have especially for you .
47002005	But if anyone has caused sorrow , he has not caused me sorrow , but ˻ to some degree ˼ — ˻ in order not to say too much ˼ — to all of you .
47002006	This punishment by the majority is sufficient for such a person .
47002007	So then , you should rather forgive and comfort him , lest somehow this person should be overwhelmed by excessive sorrow .
47002008	Therefore I urge you to confirm your love for him .
47002009	Because for this reason also I wrote , in order that I could know your proven character , whether you are obedient in everything .
47002010	Now to whomever you forgive anything , I also do ; for indeed , whatever I have forgiven , if I have forgiven anything , it is˻ for your sake ˼ in the presence of Christ ,
47002011	in order that we may not be exploited by Satan ( for we are not ignorant of his schemes ) .
47002012	Now when I arrived in Troas for the gospel of Christ and a door was opened for me by the Lord ,
47002013	I did not experience rest in my spirit , because I did not find Titus my brother , but saying farewell to them , I departed for Macedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to God , who always leads us in triumphal procession in Christ , and who reveals the fragrance of the knowledge of him through us in every place .
47002015	For we are the aroma of Christ to God among those who are being saved and among those who are perishing ,
47002016	to those on the one hand an odor from death to death , and to those on the other hand a fragrance from life to life . And who is qualified for these things ?
47002017	For we are not like the majority who peddle the word of God , but as from pure motives — but as from God — we speak before God in Christ .
47003001	Are we beginning to commend ourselves again ? Or do we , like some , need letters of recommendation to you or from you ?
47003002	You are our letter , inscribed on our hearts , known and read by all people ,
47003003	revealing that you are a letter of Christ , delivered by us , inscribed not with ink but with the Spirit of the living God , not on stone tablets but on tablets of human hearts .
47003004	Now we possess such confidence through Christ toward God .
47003005	Not that we are adequate in ourselves to consider anything as from ourselves , but our adequacy is from God ,
47003006	who also makes us adequate as servants of a new covenant , not of the letter , but of the Spirit , for the letter kills , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	But if the ministry of death in letters carved on stone came with glory , so that the sons of Israel were not able to look intently into the face of Moses because of the glory of his face , which was transitory ,
47003008	how will the ministry of the Spirit not be even more with glory ?
47003009	For if there was glory in the ministry of condemnation , by much more will the ministry of righteousness overflow with glory .
47003010	For indeed what had been glorified has not been glorified in this case , on account of the glory that surpasses it .
47003011	For if what was transitory came with glory , by much more what remains is with glory .
47003012	Therefore , because we have such a hope , we use much boldness ,
47003013	and not as Moses used to place a veil over his face , in order that the sons of Israel would not stare at the end of what was transitory .
47003014	But their minds were hardened . For until this very day , the same veil remains upon the reading of the old covenant , not being uncovered , because it is done away with in Christ .
47003015	But until today , whenever Moses is read aloud , a veil lies upon their heart ,
47003016	but whenever one turns to the Lord , the veil is removed .
47003017	Now the Lord is the Spirit , and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is freedom .
47003018	And we all , with unveiled face , reflecting the glory of the Lord , are being transformed into the same image from glory into glory , just as from the Lord , the Spirit .
47004001	Because of this , since we have this ministry , just as we have been shown mercy , we do not lose heart ,
47004002	but we have renounced shameful hidden things , not behaving with craftiness or adulterating the word of God , but with the open proclamation of the truth commending ourselves to every person’s conscience before God .
47004003	But if indeed our gospel is veiled , it is veiled among those who are perishing ,
47004004	among whom the god of this age has blinded the minds of the unbelievers , so that they would not see the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ , who is the image of God .
47004005	For we do not proclaim ourselves , but Jesus Christ as Lord , and ourselves as your slaves for the sake of Jesus .
47004006	For God who said , “ Light will shine out of darkness , ” is the one who has shined in our hearts for the enlightenment of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
47004007	But we have this treasure in earthenware jars , in order that the extraordinary degree of the power may be from God and not from us .
47004008	We are afflicted in every way , but not crushed ; perplexed , but not despairing ;
47004009	persecuted , but not abandoned ; struck down , but not destroyed ;
47004010	always carrying around the death of Jesus in our body , in order that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our body .
47004011	For we who are alive are continually being handed over to death because of Jesus , in order that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our mortal flesh .
47004012	So then , death is at work in us , but life in you .
47004013	But because we have the same spirit of faith in accordance with what is written , “ I believed , therefore I spoke , ” we also believe , therefore we also speak ,
47004014	because we know that the one who raised the Lord Jesus will also raise us together with Jesus and present us together with you .
47004015	For all these things˻ are for your sake ˼ , in order that the grace that is increasing through the many may cause thanksgiving to abound to the glory of God .
47004016	Therefore we do not lose heart , but even if our outer person is being destroyed , yet our inner person is being renewed day after day .
47004017	For our momentary light affliction is producing in us an eternal weight of glory ˻ beyond all measure and proportion ˼ ,
47004018	because we are not looking at what is seen , but what is not seen . For what is seen is temporary , but what is not seen is eternal .
47005001	For we know that if our earthly house , the tent , is destroyed , we have a building from God , a house not made by hands , eternal in the heavens .
47005002	For indeed , in this house we groan , because we desire to put on our dwelling from heaven ,
47005003	if indeed , even after we have taken it off , we will not be found naked .
47005004	For indeed we who are in this tent groan , being burdened ˻ for this reason , that ˼ we do not want to be unclothed , but to be clothed , in order that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life .
47005005	Now the one who has prepared us for this very thingis God , who has given us the down payment , the Spirit .
47005006	Therefore , although we are always confident and know that while we are at home in the body we are absent from the Lord —
47005007	for we live by faith , not by sight —
47005008	so we are confident and prefer rather to be absent from the body and to be at home with the Lord .
47005009	Therefore indeed we have as our ambition , whether at home in the body or absent from the body , to be acceptable to him .
47005010	For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ , in order that each one may receive back the things through the body according to what he has done , whether good or bad .
47005011	Therefore , because we know the fear of the Lord , we are attempting to persuade people , but we are revealed to God , and I hope to be revealed in your consciences .
47005012	We are not commending ourselves to you again , but are giving you an opportunity to boast about us , in order that you may have an answer for those who boast in appearance and not in heart .
47005013	For if we are out of our senses , it is for God ; if we are of sound mind , it is for you .
47005014	For the love of Christ controls us , because we have concluded this : that one died for all ; as a result all died .
47005015	And he died for all , in order that those who live should no longer live for themselves , but for the one who died for them and was raised .
47005016	So then , from now on we know no one ˻ from a human point of view ˼ , if indeed we have known Christ ˻ from a human point of view ˼ , but now we know him this way no longer .
47005017	Therefore if anyone is in Christ , he is a new creation ; the old things have passed away ; behold , new things have come .
47005018	And all these thingsare from God , who has reconciled us to himself through Christ , and who has given us the ministry of reconciliation ,
47005019	namely , that God was in Christ reconciling the world to himself , not counting their trespasses against them , and entrusting to us the message of reconciliation .
47005020	Therefore we are ambassadors on behalf of Christ , as if God were imploring you through us . We beg you on behalf of Christ , be reconciled to God .
47005021	He made the one who did not know sin to be sin on our behalf , in order that we could become the righteousness of God in him .
47006001	Now because we are fellow workers , we also urge you not to receive the grace of God in vain .
47006002	For he says , “ At the acceptable time I heard you , and in the day of salvation I helped you . ” Behold , now is the acceptable time ; behold , now is the day of salvation !
47006003	We are giving no one an occasion for taking offense in anything , in order that our ministry will not have fault found with it ,
47006004	but commending ourselves as servants of God in every way , in much endurance , in afflictions , in distresses , in difficulties ,
47006005	in beatings , in prisons , in disturbances , in troubles , in sleepless nights , in going hungry ,
47006006	in purity , in knowledge , in patience , in kindness , in the Holy Spirit , in love without hypocrisy ,
47006007	in the word of truth , in the power of God , with the weapons of righteousness for the right hand and left hand ,
47006008	through glory and dishonor , through slander and good repute , regarded as deceivers and yet truthful ,
47006009	as unknown and yet known completely , as dying , and behold , we go on living , as disciplined , and yet not put to death ,
47006010	as grieving , but always rejoicing , as poor , but making many rich , as having nothing , and possessing everything .
47006011	˻ We have spoken freely and openly ˼ to you , Corinthians ; our heart is open wide .
47006012	You are not restricted by us , but you are restricted in your affections .
47006013	Now the same wayin exchange ( I am speaking as to children ) , you open wide your hearts also .
47006014	Do not become unevenly yoked with unbelievers , for what participation is there between righteousness and lawlessness ? Or what fellowship does light have with darkness ?
47006015	And what agreement does Christ have with Beliar ? Or what share does a believer have with an unbeliever ?
47006016	And what agreement does the temple of God have with idols ? For we are the temple of the living God , just as God said , “ I will live in them and will walk about among them , and I will be their God and they will be my people . ”
47006017	Therefore “ come out from their midstand be separate , ” says the Lord , “ and do not touch what is unclean , and I will welcome you ,
47006018	and I will be a father to you , and you will be sons and daughters to me , ” says the all-powerful Lord .
47007001	Therefore since we have these promises , dear friends , let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of body and spirit , accomplishing holiness in the fear of God .
47007002	˻ Make room for us in your hearts ˼ . We have wronged no one , we have ruined no one , we have defrauded no one .
47007003	I do not say this˻ to condemn you ˼ , because I have already said that you are in our hearts , so that we die together and we live together .
47007004	Great is my confidence toward you ; great is my boasting on your behalf ; I am filled with encouragement ; I am overflowing with joy in all our affliction .
47007005	For even when we arrived in Macedonia , our body had no rest , but we were afflicted in every way — quarrels outside , fears within .
47007006	But God , who comforts the humble , comforted us by the coming of Titus ,
47007007	and not only by his coming , but also by the comfort with which he was comforted among you , because he reported to us your longing , your mourning , your zeal for me , so that I rejoiced even more .
47007008	For if indeed I grieved you by my letter , I do not regret it ( even if I did regret it ) , for I see that that letter grieved you , even though for ˻ a short time ˼ .
47007009	Now I do not rejoice that you were grieved , but that you were grieved to repentence . For you were grieved according to the will of God , so that you suffered loss in no way through us .
47007010	For grief according to the will of God brings about a repentence leading to salvation , not to be regretted , but worldly grief brings about death .
47007011	For behold how much diligence this very thing , being grieved according to the will of God , has brought about in you : what defense of yourselves , what indignation , what fear , what longing , what zeal , what punishment ! In everything you have demonstrated yourselves to be innocent in this matter .
47007012	Consequently , even if I wrote to you , it was not because of the one who did wrong or because of the one who had been wronged , but in order that your diligence ˻ on our behalf ˼ might be revealed to you before God .
47007013	Because of this we have been encouraged , and in addition to our encouragement , we rejoiced much more over the joy of Titus , because his spirit had been refreshed by all of you .
47007014	For if I have boasted anything to him about you , I have not been put to shame , but as I have spoken everything to you in truth , thus also our boasting to Titus ˻ has proven to be true ˼ .
47007015	And his affection for you is all the more when he remembers the obedience of all of you as you welcomed him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I rejoice , because in everything I am completely confident in you .
47008001	Now we make known to you , brothers , the grace of God that has been given among the churches of Macedonia ,
47008002	that with a great ordeal of affliction , the abundance of their joy and the extreme depth of their poverty have overflowed to the wealth of their generosity .
47008003	I testify that they gave according to their ability , and beyond their ability , by their own choice ,
47008004	requesting of us with much exhortation the favor and the fellowship of the ministry to the saints ,
47008005	and not just as we had hoped , but they gave themselves first to the Lord and then to us , by the will of God .
47008006	So we urged Titus that , just as he had previously begun it , thus he would also complete for you this act of grace .
47008007	But just as you excel in everything — in faith and in speaking and in knowledge and with all diligence and in the love from us that is in you — so may you excel in this grace also .
47008008	I am not saying this as a command , but proving the genuineness of your love by means of the diligence of others .
47008009	For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that although he was rich , for your sake he became poor , in order that you , by his poverty , may become rich .
47008010	And I am giving an opinion in this matter , because this is profitable for you who not only began previously , a year ago , to do something , but also to want to do it .
47008011	So now also complete the doing of it , in order that just as you have the eagerness to want to do it , thus also you may complete it from what you have .
47008012	For if the eagerness is present ˻ according to what one has ˼ , it is acceptable not ˻ according to what one does not have ˼ .
47008013	For this is not that for others there may be relief , and for you difficult circumstances , but as a matter of equality .
47008014	At the present time your abundance will be for their need , in order that their abundance may also be for your need , so that there may be equality ,
47008015	just as it is written , “ The one who gathered much did not have too much , and the one who gathered little did not have too little . ”
47008016	But thanks be to God , who has put in the heart of Titus the same devotion ˻ on your behalf ˼ ,
47008017	because he not only welcomed our request , but being very earnest , by his own choice he went out to you .
47008018	And we have sent at the same time with him the brother whose praise in the gospel has become known throughout all the churches .
47008019	And not only this , but he was also chosen by the churches as our traveling companion together with this gift that is being administered by us to the glory of the Lord himself and to show our readiness to help .
47008020	We are trying to avoid this , lest anyone should find fault with us in this abundant gift that is being administered by us .
47008021	For we are taking into consideration what is honorable not only before the Lord , but also before people .
47008022	And we are sending with them our brother whom we have tested many times in many things that he is diligent , but now much more diligent because of his great confidence in you .
47008023	If there is a question concerning Titus , he is my partner and fellow worker for you . If there is a question concerning our brothers , they are messengers of the churches , the glory of Christ .
47008024	Therefore show to them the proof of your love and our boasting about you ˻ openly before ˼ the churches .
47009001	For it is unnecessary for me to write to you concerning the ministry to the saints ,
47009002	because I know your readiness to help , concerning which I keep on boasting to the Macedonians about you , that Achaia has been ready to help since last year , and your zeal has stirred up the majority of them .
47009003	But I am sending the brothers in order that our boasting about you would not prove to be empty in this case , so that you may be prepared just as I was saying ,
47009004	lest somehow if Macedonians should come with me and find you unprepared , we — ˻ not to speak of you ˼ — would be humiliated in connection with this project .
47009005	Therefore I considered it necessary to urge the brothers that they should go on ahead to you and make arrangements in advance for your generous gift that was promised previously , so this would be prepared as a generous gift and not as grudgingly granted .
47009006	Now the point is this : the one who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly , and the one who sows bountifully will also reap bountifully .
47009007	Each one should give as he has decided in his heart , not ˻ reluctantly ˼ or from compulsion , for God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	And God is able to cause all grace to abound to you , so that in everything at all times , because you have enough of everything , you may overflow in every good work .
47009009	Just as it is written , “ He scattered widely , he gave to the poor ; his righteousness remains ˻ forever ˼ . ”
47009010	Now the one who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will provide and multiply your seed , and will cause the harvest of your righteousness to grow ,
47009011	being made rich in every way for all generosity , which is producing through us thanksgiving to God ,
47009012	because the service of this ministry is not only supplying the needs of the saints , but also is overflowing through many expressions of thanksgiving to God .
47009013	Through the proven character of this service they will glorify God because of the submission of your confession to the gospel of Christ and the generosity of your participation toward them and toward everyone ,
47009014	and they are longing for you in their prayers for you , because of the surpassing grace of God to you .
47009015	Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift !
47010001	Now I , Paul , appeal to you myself by the humility and gentleness of Christ , who ˻ when I am present in person ˼ am humble among you , but when I am absent am bold toward you —
47010002	now I ask when I am present that I will not need to be bold with the confidence with which I propose to show boldness toward some who consider us as behaving according to the flesh .
47010003	For although we are living in the flesh , we do not wage war according to the flesh ,
47010004	for the weapons of our warfare are not merely human , but powerful to God for the tearing down of fortresses , tearing down arguments
47010005	and all pride that is raised up against the knowledge of God , and taking every thought captive to the obedience of Christ .
47010006	And ˻ we are ready ˼ to punish all disobedience , whenever your obedience is completed .
47010007	You are looking at things according to appearance . If anyone is convinced he himself is Christ’s , he should consider this concerning himself again : that just as Christ himself is , so also are we .
47010008	For even if I boast somewhat more about our authority that the Lord gave us˻ for building you up and not for tearing you down ˼ , I will not be put to shame ,
47010009	so that I do not want to appear as if I were terrifying you by my letters ,
47010010	because it is said , “ His letters are severe and powerful , but his bodily presence is weak and his speech is of no account . ”
47010011	Let such a person consider this : that what we are in word by letters when we are absent , we will also be in ˻ actions ˼ when we are present .
47010012	For we do not dare to classify or to compare ourselves with some who commend themselves , but they themselves , when they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves with themselves , do not understand .
47010013	But we will not boast ˻ beyond limits ˼ , but according to the measure of the assignment that God has assigned to us as a measure to reach even as far as you .
47010014	For we are not overextending ourselves , as if we had not reached you , because we have reached even as far as you with the gospel of Christ ,
47010015	not boasting ˻ beyond limits ˼ in the labors of others , but having hope that as your faith is growing to be enlarged greatly by you according to our assignment ,
47010016	so that we may proclaim the gospel in the regions that lie beyond you , and not boast in the things accomplished in the area assigned to someone else .
47010017	But “ the one who boasts , let him boast in the Lord . ”
47010018	For it is not the one commending himself who is approved , but the one whom the Lord commends .
47011001	I wish that you would put up with me ˻ in something a little foolish ˼ — but indeed you are putting up with me .
47011002	For I am jealous for you with a godly jealousy , because I promised you in marriage to one husband , to present youas a pure virgin to Christ .
47011003	But I am afraid lest somehow , as the serpent deceived Eve by his craftiness , your minds may be led astray from the sincerity and the purity of devotion to Christ .
47011004	For if the one who comes proclaims another Jesus whom we have not proclaimed , or you receive a different spirit which you did not receive , or a different gospel which you did not accept , you put up with it well enough !
47011005	For I consider myself in no way to be inferior to the preeminent apostles .
47011006	But even if I am unskilled in speech , yet I am not in knowledge ; certainly in everything we have made this clear to you in every way .
47011007	Or did I commit a sin by humbling myself in order that you may be exalted , because I proclaimed the gospel of God to you without payment ?
47011008	I robbed other churches by accepting support from them for the ministry to you .
47011009	And when I was present with you and was in need , I did not burden anyone , for the brothers who came from Macedonia supplied my need , and in everything I kept myself from being a burden to you , and will keep myself from being a burden .
47011010	As the truth of Christ is in me , this boasting ˻ of mine ˼ will not be stopped in the regions of Achaia .
47011011	˻ Why ˼ ? Because I do not love you ? God knows I do !
47011012	But what I am doing , I will also do , in order that I may remove the opportunity of those who want an opportunity , that they may be found just as also we are in what they are boasting about .
47011013	For such people are false apostles , deceitful workers , disguising themselves as apostles of Christ .
47011014	And no wonder , for Satan himself disguises himself as an angel of light .
47011015	Therefore it is not a great thing if his servants also disguise themselves as servants of righteousness , whose end will be according to their deeds .
47011016	Again I say , do not let anyone think I am foolish . But indeed , if you do , accept me even as foolish , in order that I also may boast a little .
47011017	What I am saying in this project of boasting , I am not saying as the Lord would say , but as in foolishness .
47011018	Since many are boasting according to human standards , I also will boast .
47011019	For because you are wise , you put up with foolish people gladly !
47011020	For you put up with it if someone enslaves you , if someone devours you , if someone takes advantage of you , if someone is presumptious toward you , if someone strikes you in the face .
47011021	I say this to my shame , namely , that we have been weak . But in whatever anyone dares to boast — I am speaking in foolishness — I also dare to boast .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? I am also ! Are they Israelites ? I am also ! Are they descendants of Abraham ? I am also !
47011023	Are they servants of Christ ? — I am speaking as though I were beside myself — I am more so , with far greater labors , with far more imprisonments , with beatings to a much greater degree , in danger of death many times .
47011024	Five times I received at the hands of the Jews forty lashes less one .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with rods . Once I received a stoning . Three times I was shipwrecked . A day and a night I have spent in the deep water .
47011026	I have been on journeys many times , in dangers from rivers , in dangers from robbers , in dangers from my own people , in dangers from the Gentiles , in dangers in the city , in dangers in the wilderness , in dangers at sea , in dangers because of false brothers ,
47011027	with toil and hardship , often in sleepless nights , with hunger and thirst , often going hungry , in cold and poorly clothed .
47011028	Apart from these external things , there is the pressure on me every day of the anxiety about all the churches .
47011029	Who is weak , and I am not weak ? Who is caused to sin , and I do not burn with indignation ?
47011030	If it is necessary to boast , I will boast about˻ the things related to my weakness ˼ .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Jesus , who is blessed ˻ forever ˼ , knows that I am not lying .
47011032	In Damascus , the governor under King Aretas was guarding the city of the Damascenes in order to take me into custody ,
47011033	and I was lowered through a window through the wall in a rope-basket , and I escaped his hands .
47012001	It is necessary to boast ; it is not profitable , but I will proceed to visions and revelations of the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Christ fourteen years ago — whether in the body I do not know , or outside the body I do not know , God knows — such a man was caught up to the third heaven ,
47012003	and I know this man — whether in the body or apart from the body I do not know , God knows —
47012004	that he was caught up to paradise and heard words not to be spoken , which it is not permitted for a person to speak .
47012005	On behalf of such a person I will boast , but on behalf of myself I will not boast , except in my weaknesses .
47012006	For if I want to boast , I will not be foolish , because I will be telling the truth , but I am refraining , so that no one can credit to me more than what he sees in me or hears anything from me ,
47012007	even because of the extraordinary degree of the revelations . Therefore , so that I would not exalt myself , a thorn in the flesh was given to me , a messenger of Satan , in order that it would torment me so that I would not exalt myself .
47012008	Three times I appealed to the Lord about this , that it would depart from me .
47012009	And he said to me , “ My grace is sufficient for you , because the power is perfected in weakness . ” Therefore rather I will boast most gladly in my weaknesses , in order that the power of Christ may reside in me .
47012010	Therefore I delight in weaknesses , in insults , in calamities , in persecutions and difficulties for the sake of Christ , for whenever I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	I have become a fool ! You compelled me , for I ought to have been commended by you , for I am in no way inferior to the preeminent apostles , even if I am nothing .
47012012	Indeed , the signs of an apostle have been done among you with all patient endurance , both signs and wonders and deeds of power .
47012013	˻ For in what respect are you made worse off ˼ more than the rest of the churches , except that I myself was not a burden to you ? Forgive me this wrong !
47012014	Behold , this third time I am ready to come to you , and I will not be a burden to you . For I am not seeking your possessions , but you . For children are not obligated to save up for their parents , but parents for their children .
47012015	But I will spend and be expended most gladly for your lives . If I love you much more , am I to be loved less ?
47012016	But let it be . I have not been a burden to you , but because I was crafty , I took you by cunning .
47012017	I have not taken advantage of you ˻ through anyone whom I sent to you ˼ , have I ?
47012018	I urged Titus to go , and I sent the brother with him . Titus did not take advantage of you , did he ? Did we not conduct ourselves in the same spirit ? Did we not walk in the same footsteps ?
47012019	Have you been thinking all this time that we are defending ourselves to you ? We are speaking in Christ before God , and all these things , dear friends , are for your edification .
47012020	For I am afraid lest somehow when I arrive , I will not find you as I want , and I may be found by you as you do not want . I am afraid lest somehow there will be strife , jealousy , outbursts of anger , selfish ambition , slander , gossip , pride , disorder .
47012021	I am afraid lest when I come again my God will humiliate me ˻ in your presence ˼ , and I will grieve over many of those who sinned previously and have not repented because of their impurity and sexual immorality and licentiousness that they have practiced .
47013001	This is the third time I am coming to you . ˻ By the testimony ˼ of two or three witnesses every word will be established .
47013002	I have already said when I was present the second time , and although I am absent now I also say in advance to those who sinned previously and to all the rest , that if I come again I will not spare anyone ,
47013003	since you are demanding proof that Christ , who is not weak toward you , but is powerful among you , is speaking in me .
47013004	For indeed , he was crucified because of weakness , but he lives because of the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we will live together with him because of the power of God toward you .
47013005	Test yourselves to see if you are in the faith . Examine yourselves ! Or do you not recognize regarding yourselves that Jesus Christ is in you , unless you are unqualified ?
47013006	And I hope that you will recognize that we are not unqualified !
47013007	Now we pray to God that you not do wrong in any way , not that we are seen as approved , but that you do what is good , even though we are seen as though unqualified .
47013008	For we are not able to do anything against the truth , but rather only for the truth .
47013009	For we rejoice whenever we are weak , but you are strong , and we pray for this : your maturity .
47013010	Because of this , I am writing these thingsalthough I am absent , in order that when I am present I may not have to act severely according to the authority that the Lord has given me for building up and not for tearing down .
47013011	Finally , brothers , rejoice , be restored , be encouraged , ˻ be in agreement ˼ , be at peace , and the God of love and peace will be with you .

48001001	Paul , an apostle not from men nor by men but through Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised him from the dead ,
48001002	and all the brothers with me , to the churches of Galatia .
48001003	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ ,
48001004	who gave himself for our sins in order to rescue us from the present evil age , according to the will of our God and Father ,
48001005	to whom be the glory forever and ever . Amen .
48001006	I am astonished that you are turning away so quickly from the one who called you by the grace of Christ to a different gospel ,
48001007	not that there is a different gospel , except there are some who are disturbing you and wanting to distort the gospel of Christ .
48001008	But even if we or an angel from heaven should proclaim a gospel to you contrary to what we proclaimed to you , let him be accursed !
48001009	As we said before , and now I say again , if anyone is proclaiming a gospel to you contrary to what you have received , let him be accursed !
48001010	For am I now making an appeal to people or to God ? Or am I seeking to please people ? If I were still trying to please people , I would not be a slave of Christ .
48001011	For I make known to you , brothers , the gospel that has been proclaimed by me , that it is not ˻ of human origin ˼ .
48001012	For neither did I receive it from man , nor was I taught it , but I received it through a revelation of Jesus Christ .
48001013	For you have heard about my former way of life in Judaism , that to an extraordinary degree I was persecuting the church of God , and trying to destroy it ,
48001014	and was progressing in Judaism beyond many contemporaries in my nation , because I was a far more zealous adherent of the traditions handed down by my forefathers .
48001015	But when God , who set me apart from my mother’s womb and called me by his grace , was pleased
48001016	to reveal his Son in me , in order that I would proclaim the gospel about him among the Gentiles , immediately I did not consult with flesh and blood ,
48001017	nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me , but I went away to Arabia and I returned again to Damascus .
48001018	Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to become acquainted with Cephas , and I stayed with him fifteen days ,
48001019	but I did not see any others of the apostles except James , the brother of the Lord .
48001020	( Now the things which I am writing to you , behold , I assure you before God that I am not lying . )
48001021	Then I came to the regions of Syria and of Cilicia ,
48001022	but I was unknown ˻ in person ˼ to the churches of Judea that are in Christ ,
48001023	and they were only hearing , “ The one formerly persecuting us is now proclaiming the faith that formerly he was attempting to destroy , ”
48001024	and they were glorifying God because of me .
48002001	Then after fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , taking along Titus also .
48002002	Now I went up there because of a revelation and laid out to them the gospel that I preach among the Gentiles , but in private to the influential people , lest somehow I was running , or had run , in vain .
48002003	But not even Titus who was with me , although he was a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised .
48002004	Now this was because of the false brothers secretly brought in , who slipped in to spy out our freedom that we have in Christ Jesus , in order that they might enslave us ,
48002005	to whom not even for an hour did we yield in subjection , in order that the truth of the gospel might remain continually with you .
48002006	But from those ˻ who were influential ˼ ( whatever they were , it makes no difference to me , ˻ God does not show partiality ˼ ) — for those who were influential added nothing to me .
48002007	But these , when they saw that I had been entrusted with the gospel to the uncircumcision , just as Peter to the circumcision
48002008	( for the one who was at work through Peter for his apostleship to the circumcision was at work also through me for the Gentiles ) ,
48002009	and when James and Cephas and John — those thought to be pillars — acknowledged the grace given to me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hand of fellowship , in order that we should go to the Gentiles and they to the circumcision .
48002010	They asked only that we should remember the poor , the very thing I was also eager to do .
48002011	But when Cephas came to Antioch , I opposed him to his face , because he was condemned .
48002012	For before certain people came from James , he used to eat with the Gentiles , but when they came , he withdrew and separated himself , because he was afraid of those who were of the circumcision ,
48002013	and the rest of the Jews also joined in this hypocrisy with him , so that even Barnabas was carried away with them in their hypocrisy .
48002014	But when I saw that they were not being straightforward with the truth of the gospel , I said to Cephas in the presence of them all , “ If you , although you are a Jew , live like a Gentile and not like a Jew , how can you try to compel the Gentiles to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We are Jews by nature and not sinners from among the Gentiles ,
48002016	but knowing that a person is not justified by the works of the law , if not by faith in Jesus Christ , and we have believed in Christ Jesus so that we may be justified by faith in Christ and not by the works of the law , because by the works of the law ˻ no human being will be justified ˼ .
48002017	But if while seeking to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also have been found to be sinners , then is Christ an agent of sin ? May it never be !
48002018	For if I build up again these things which I destroyed , I show myself to be a transgressor .
48002019	For through the law I died to the law , in order that I might live to God . I have been crucified with Christ ,
48002020	and I no longer live , but Christ lives in me , and that life I now live in the flesh , I live by faith in the Son of God , who loved me and gave himself for me .
48002021	I do not declare invalid the grace of God , for if righteousness is through the law , then Christ died to no purpose .
48003001	O foolish Galatians , who has bewitched you , before whose eyes Jesus Christ was publicly portrayed as having been crucified ?
48003002	I want only to learn this from you : Did you receive the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
48003003	Are you so foolish ? Having begun by the Spirit , are you now trying to be made complete by the flesh ?
48003004	Have you suffered so many things for nothing — if indeed also it was for nothing ?
48003005	Therefore does the one who gives you the Spirit and who works miracles among you do so by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
48003006	Just as Abraham believed God , and it was credited to him for righteousness ,
48003007	then understand that the ones ˻ who have faith ˼ , these are sons of Abraham .
48003008	And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith , proclaimed the good news in advance to Abraham : “ In you all the nations will be blessed . ”
48003009	So then , the ones who have faith are blessed together with Abraham who believed .
48003010	For as many as are of the works of the law are under a curse , for it is written , “ Cursed is everyone who does not abide by all the things that are written in the book of the law to do them . ”
48003011	Now it is clear that no one is justified in the sight of God by the law , because “ the one who is righteous will live by faith . ”
48003012	But the law is not from faith , but “ the one who does these things will live by them . ”
48003013	Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us , because it is written , “ Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree , ”
48003014	in order that the blessing of Abraham might come to the Gentiles in Christ Jesus , so that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
48003015	Brothers , I am speaking according to a human perspective . Nevertheless , when the covenant of a man has been ratified , no one declares it invalid or adds additional provisions to it .
48003016	Now to Abraham and to his descendant the promises were spoken . It does not say , “ and to descendants , ” as concerning many , but as concerning one , “ and to your descendant , ” who is Christ .
48003017	Now I am saying this : the law , that came after four hundred and thirty years , does not revoke a covenant previously ratified by God , in order to nullify the promise .
48003018	For if the inheritance is from the law , it is no longer from the promise , but God graciously gave it to Abraham through the promise .
48003019	Why then the law ? It was added on account of transgressions , until the descendant should come to whom it had been promised , having been ordered through angels by the hand of a mediator .
48003020	Now the mediator is not for one , but God is one .
48003021	Therefore is the law opposed to the promises of God ? May it never be ! For if a law had been given that was able to give life , certainly righteousness would have been from the law .
48003022	But the scripture imprisoned all under sin , in order that the promise could be given by faith in Jesus Christ to those who believe .
48003023	But before faith came , we were detained under the law , imprisoned until the coming faith was revealed .
48003024	So then , the law became our guardian until Christ , in order that we could be justified by faith .
48003025	But after faith has come , we are no longer under a guardian .
48003026	For you are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus ,
48003027	for as many of you as were baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
48003028	There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither slave nor free , there is neither male and female , for you are all one in Christ Jesus .
48003029	And if you are Christ’s , then you are descendants of Abraham , heirs according to the promise .
48004001	Now I say , for as long a time as the heir is a child , he is no different from a slave , although he is master of everything ,
48004002	but he is under guardians and managers until the time set by his father .
48004003	So also we , when we were children , we were enslaved under the elemental spirits of the world .
48004004	But when the fullness of time came , God sent out his Son , born of a woman , born under the law ,
48004005	in order that he might redeem those under the law , in order that we might receive the adoption .
48004006	And because you are sons , God sent out the Spirit of his Son into our hearts , crying out , “ Abba ! ( Father ! ) , ”
48004007	so that you are no longer a slave but a son , and if a son , also an heir through God .
48004008	But at that time when you did not know God , you were enslaved to the things which by nature are not gods .
48004009	But now , because you have come to know God , or rather have come to be known by God , how can you turn back again to the weak and miserable elemental spirits ? Do you want to be enslaved to them all over again ?
48004010	You carefully observe days and months and seasons and years .
48004011	I am afraid for you , lest perhaps I have labored for you in vain !
48004012	I ask you , brothers , become like me , because I also have become like you . You have done me no wrong !
48004013	But you know that because of an illness of the flesh I proclaimed the gospel to you the first time .
48004014	And you did not despise or disdain what was a trial for you in my flesh , but you welcomed me like an angel of God , like Christ Jesus .
48004015	So where is your blessing ? For I testify to you that , if possible , you would have torn out your eyes and given them to me !
48004016	So then , have I become your enemy by being truthful to you ?
48004017	They zealously seek you , not commendably , but they want to exclude you , in order that you may seek them zealously .
48004018	But it is good to be sought zealously in good at all times , and not only when I am present with you .
48004019	My children , for whom I am having birth pains again , until Christ is formed in you !
48004020	But I could wish to be present with you now , and to change my tone because I am perplexed about you .
48004021	Tell me , you who are wanting to be under the law , do you not understand the law ?
48004022	For it is written that Abraham had two sons , one by the female slave and one by the free woman .
48004023	But the one by the female slave was born according to human descent , and the one by the free woman through the promise ,
48004024	which things are spoken allegorically , for these women are two covenants , one from Mount Sinai , bearing children for slavery , who is Hagar .
48004025	Now Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia , and corresponds to the present Jerusalem , for she is a slave with her children .
48004026	But the Jerusalem above is free , which is our mother .
48004027	For it is written , “ Rejoice , O barren woman , who does not give birth to children ; burst out and shout , you who do not have birth pains , because many are the children of the desolate woman , even more than those of the one who has a husband . ”
48004028	But you , brothers , are children of the promise , just as Isaac .
48004029	But just as at that time the child born according to human descent persecuted the child born according to the Spirit , so also now .
48004030	But what does the scripture say ? “ Drive out the female slave and her son , for the son of the female slave will never inherit with the son ” of the free woman .
48004031	Therefore , brothers , we are not children of the female slave but of the free woman .
48005001	For freedom Christ has set us free . Stand firm , therefore , and do not be subject again to a yoke of slavery .
48005002	Look ! I , Paul , tell you that if you become circumcised , Christ will profit you nothing !
48005003	And again I testify to every man who becomes circumcised , that he is under obligation to keep the whole law .
48005004	You are estranged from Christ , you who are attempting to be justified by the law ; you have fallen from grace .
48005005	For through the Spirit by faith we eagerly await the hope of righteousness .
48005006	For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision counts for anything nor uncircumcision , but faith working through love .
48005007	You were running well . Who hindered you from obeying the truth ?
48005008	This persuasion is not from the one who calls you !
48005009	A little leaven leavens the whole batch of dough .
48005010	I have confidence in you in the Lord that you will think nothing different , but the one who is confusing you ˻ will pay the penalty ˼ , whoever he may be .
48005011	Now , brothers , if I am still preaching circumcision , why am I still being persecuted ? In that case the stumbling block of the cross has been abolished .
48005012	I wish that the ones who are disturbing you would also ˻ castrate themselves ˼ !
48005013	For you were called to freedom , brothers . Only do not let your freedom become an opportunity for the flesh , but through love serve one another .
48005014	For the whole law is fulfilled in one statement , namely , “ You shall love your neighbor as yourself . ”
48005015	But if you bite and devour one another , watch out that you are not consumed by one another .
48005016	But I say , live by the Spirit , and you will never carry out the desire of the flesh .
48005017	For the flesh desires against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh , for these are in opposition to one another , so that whatever you want , you may not do these things .
48005018	But if you are led by the Spirit , you are not under the law .
48005019	Now the deeds of the flesh are evident , which are sexual immorality , impurity , licentiousness ,
48005020	idolatry , sorcery , enmity , strife , jealousy , outbursts of anger , selfish ambition , dissension , factions ,
48005021	envy , drunkenness , carousing , and things like these , things which I am telling you in advance , just as I said before , that the ones who practice such things will not inherit the kingdom of God .
48005022	But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , self control . Against such things there is no law .
48005024	Now those ˻ who belong to Christ Jesus ˼ have crucified the flesh together with its feelings and its desires .
48005025	If we live by the Spirit , we must also follow the Spirit .
48005026	We must not become conceited , provoking one another , envying one another .
48006001	Brothers , even if a person is caught in some trespass , you who are spiritual restore such a person in a spirit of humility , looking out for yourself , lest you also be tempted .
48006002	Carry the burdens of one another , and so fulfill the law of Christ .
48006003	For if anyone thinks he is something although he is nothing , he is deceiving himself .
48006004	But let each one examine his own work , and then he will have a reason for boasting in himself alone , and not in someone else .
48006005	For each one will carry his own burden .
48006006	Now the one who is taught the word must share in all good things with the one who teaches .
48006007	Do not be deceived : God is not to be mocked , for whatever a person sows , this he will also reap ,
48006008	because the one who sows to his own flesh will reap corruption from the flesh , but the one who sows to the Spirit will reap eternal life from the Spirit .
48006009	And let us not grow weary in doing good , for at the proper time we will reap , if we do not give up .
48006010	So then , as we have opportunity , let us do good to all people , and especially to those who belong to the household of faith .
48006011	See with what large letters I am writing to you with my own hand .
48006012	As many as are wanting to make a good showing in the flesh , these are attempting to compel you to be circumcised , only so that they will not be persecuted for the cross of Christ .
48006013	For not even those who are circumcised observe the law themselves , but they want you to be circumcised in order that they may boast in your flesh .
48006014	But as for me , may it never be that I boast , except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , through whom the world has been crucified to me , and I to the world .
48006015	For neither is circumcision anything nor uncircumcision , but a new creation .
48006016	And all those who follow this rule , peace and mercy be on them and on the Israel of God .
48006017	Finally , let no one cause me trouble , for I carry on my body the marks of Jesus .
48006018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit , brothers . Amen .
49001001	Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , to the saints who are in Ephesus and faithful in Christ Jesus :
49001002	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49001003	Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ ,
49001004	just as he chose us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and blameless before him in love ,
49001005	having predestined us to adoption through Jesus Christ to himself according to the good pleasure of his will ,
49001006	to the praise of the glory of his grace that he bestowed on us in the beloved ,
49001007	in whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ,
49001008	that he caused to abound to us in all wisdom and insight ,
49001009	making known to us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure that he purposed in him ,
49001010	for the administration of the fullness of times , to bring together all things in Christ , the things in the heavens and the things on the earth , in him
49001011	in whom also we were chosen , having been predestined according to the purpose of the One who works all things according to the counsel of his will ,
49001012	that we who hoped beforehand in Christ should be for the praise of his glory ,
49001013	in whom also you , when you heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation , in whom also when you believed you were sealed with the promised Holy Spirit ,
49001014	who is the down payment of our inheritance , until the redemption of the possession , to the praise of his glory .
49001015	Because of this I also , hearing of ˻ your faith ˼ in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints ,
49001016	do not cease giving thanks for you , making mention in my prayers ,
49001017	that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , ˻ the glorious Father ˼ , may give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him
49001018	( the eyes of your hearts having been enlightened ) , so that you may know what is the hope of his calling , what are the riches of the glory of his inheritance among the saints ,
49001019	and what is the surpassing greatness of his power toward us who believe , according to the working of his mighty strength
49001020	which he worked in Christ , raising him from the dead and seating him at his right hand in the heavenly places ,
49001021	above all rule and authority and power and lordship and every name named , not only in this age but also in the coming one ,
49001022	and he subjected all things under his feet and gave him as head over all things to the church ,
49001023	which is his body , the fullness of the one who fills all things in every way .
49002001	And you , ˻ although you were dead ˼ in your trespasses and sins ,
49002002	in which you formerly walked according to the course of this world , according to the ruler of the authority of the air , the spirit now working in the sons of disobedience ,
49002003	among whom also we all formerly lived in the desires of our flesh , doing the will of the flesh and of the mind , and we were children of wrath by nature , as also the rest of them were .
49002004	But God , being rich in mercy , because of his great love with which he loved us ,
49002005	and we being dead in trespasses , he made us alive together with Christ ( by grace you are saved ) ,
49002006	and raised us together and seated us together in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus ,
49002007	in order that he might show in the coming ages the surpassing riches of his grace in kindness upon us in Christ Jesus .
49002008	For by grace you are saved through faith , and this is not from yourselves , it is the gift of God ;
49002009	it is not from works , so that no one can boast .
49002010	For we are his creation , created in Christ Jesus for good works , which God prepared beforehand , so that we may walk in them .
49002011	Therefore remember that formerly you , the Gentiles in the flesh , the so-called uncircumcision by the so-called circumcision in the flesh , made by hands ,
49002012	that you were at that time apart from Christ , alienated from the citizenship of Israel , and strangers to the covenants of promise , not having hope , and without God in the world .
49002013	But now in Christ Jesus you , the ones who once were far away , have become near by the blood of Christ .
49002014	For he himself is our peace , who made both one and broke down the dividing wall of the partition , the enmity , in his flesh ,
49002015	invalidating the law of commandments in ordinances , in order that he might create the two in himself into one new man , thus making peace ,
49002016	and might reconcile both in one body to God through the cross , killing the enmity in himself .
49002017	And coming , he proclaimed the good news of peace to you who were far away and peace to the ones who were near ,
49002018	because through him we both have access in one Spirit to the Father .
49002019	Consequently , therefore , you are no longer strangers and foreigners , but you are fellow citizens of the saints and members of the household of God ,
49002020	built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Christ Jesus himself being the cornerstone ,
49002021	in whom the whole building , joined together , grows into a holy temple in the Lord ,
49002022	in whom you also are built up together into a dwelling place of God in the Spirit .
49003001	On account of this I , Paul , the prisoner of Christ Jesus for the sake of you Gentiles
49003002	— if indeed you have heard about the stewardship of God’s grace given to me for you ,
49003003	that according to revelation the mystery was made known to me , just as I wrote beforehand in brief ,
49003004	so that you may be able when you read to understand my insight into the mystery of Christ
49003005	( which in other generations was not made known to the sons of men as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ) :
49003006	that the Gentiles are fellow heirs , and fellow members of the body , and fellow sharers of the promise in Christ Jesus through the gospel ,
49003007	of which I became a servant , according to the gift of God’s grace given to me , according to the working of his power .
49003008	To me , the least of all the saints , was given this grace : to proclaim the good news of the fathomless riches of Christ to the Gentiles ,
49003009	and to enlighten everyone as to what is the administration of the mystery hidden from the ages by God , who created all things ,
49003010	in order that the many-sided wisdom of God might be made known now to the rulers and the authorities in the heavenly places through the church ,
49003011	according to the purpose of the ages which he carried out in Christ Jesus our Lord ,
49003012	in whom we have boldness and access in confidence through faith in him .
49003013	Therefore I ask you not to be discouraged at my afflictions on behalf of you , which are your glory .
49003014	On account of this , I bend my knees before the Father ,
49003015	from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named ,
49003016	that he may grant you according to the riches of his glory to be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inner person ,
49003017	that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith ( you having been firmly rooted and established in love ) ,
49003018	in order that you may be strong enough to grasp together with all the saints what is the breadth , and length , and height , and depth ,
49003019	and to know the love of Christ that surpasses knowledge , in order that you may be filled up to all the fullness of God .
49003020	Now to the one who is able to do beyond all measure more than all that we ask or think , according to the power that is at work in us ,
49003021	to him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations forever and ever . Amen .
49004001	Therefore I , the prisoner in the Lord , exhort you to live in a manner worthy of the calling with which you were called :
49004002	with all humility and gentleness , with patience , putting up with one another in love ,
49004003	being eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace ;
49004004	one body and one Spirit ( just as also you were called with one hope of your calling ) ,
49004005	one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49004006	one God and Father of all , who is over all , and through all , and in all .
49004007	Now to each one of us was given this grace , according to the measure of Christ’s gift .
49004008	Therefore it says , “ Ascending on high he led captivity captive ; he gave gifts to men . ”
49004009	Now “ he ascended , ” what is it , except that he also descended to the lower regions of the earth ?
49004010	The one who descended himself is also the one who ascended above all the heavens , in order that he might fill all things .
49004011	And he himself gave some as apostles and some as prophets and some as evangelists and some as pastors and teachers
49004012	for the equipping of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for building up the body of Christ ,
49004013	until we all reach the unity of the faith and the knowledge of the Son of God , to a mature man , to a measure of the maturity of the fullness of Christ ,
49004014	so that we may no longer be infants , tossed about by waves and carried about by every wind of teaching , by the trickery of people , by craftiness with reference to the scheming of deceit .
49004015	But speaking the truth in love , we are to grow into him with reference to all things , who is the head , Christ ,
49004016	from whom the whole body , joined together and held together by every supporting ligament , according to the working by measure of each single part , the growth of the body makes for the building up of itself in love .
49004017	This therefore I say and testify in the Lord , that you no longer walk as the Gentiles walk : in the futility of their mind ,
49004018	being darkened in understanding , alienated from the life of God , because of the ignorance that is in them , because of the hardness of their heart ,
49004019	who , becoming callous , gave themselves over to licentiousness , for the pursuit of all uncleanness in greediness .
49004020	But you did not learn Christ in this way ,
49004021	if indeed you have heard about him , and you were taught by him ( just as truth is in Jesus ) ,
49004022	that you take off , according to your former way of life , the old man , who is being destroyed according to deceitful desires ,
49004023	be renewed in the spirit of your mind ,
49004024	and put on the new man ( in accordance with God ) , who is created in righteousness and holiness from the truth .
49004025	Therefore , putting aside the lie , speak truth each one of you with his neighbor , because we are members of one another .
49004026	Be angry and do not sin ; do not let the sun set on your anger ,
49004027	nor give place to the devil .
49004028	The one who steals must steal no longer , but instead must labor , working with his own hands what is good , so that he may have something to share with the one who has need .
49004029	˻ No rotten word must proceed ˼ from your mouth , but only something good for the building up of the need , in order that it may give grace to those who hear ,
49004030	and do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God , by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption .
49004031	All bitterness , and rage , and wrath , and clamor , and abusive speech , must be removed from you , together with all wickedness .
49004032	But become kind toward one another , compassionate , forgiving one another , just as also God in Christ has forgiven you .
49005001	Therefore become imitators of God , as beloved children ,
49005002	and live in love , just as also Christ loved us , and gave himself for us an offering and sacrifice to God for a fragrant smell .
49005003	But sexual immorality , and all uncleanness , or greediness , must not even be named among you ( as is fitting for saints ) ,
49005004	and obscenity , and foolish talk , or coarse jesting ( which are not proper ) , but rather thanksgiving .
49005005	For this you know ˻ for certain ˼ , that every sexually immoral person , or unclean person , or greedy person ( who is an idolater ) , does not have an inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God .
49005006	Let no one deceive you with empty words , for because of these things the wrath of God is coming on the sons of disobedience .
49005007	Therefore do not be sharers with them ,
49005008	for you were formerly darkness , but now you are light in the Lord . Live like children of light
49005009	( for the fruit of the light is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ) ,
49005010	trying to learn what is well-pleasing to the Lord .
49005011	And do not participate in the unfruitful deeds of darkness , but rather even expose them .
49005012	For it is shameful even to speak about the things being done by them in secret ,
49005013	but all things exposed by the light are made visible ,
49005014	for everything made visible is light . Therefore it says , Wake up , sleeper , and rise from the dead , and Christ will shine on you .
49005015	Therefore , consider carefully how you live , not as unwise but as wise ,
49005016	making the most of the time because the days are evil .
49005017	Because of this do not become foolish , but understand what the will of the Lord is .
49005018	And do not be drunk with wine ( in which is dissipation ) , but be filled by the Spirit ,
49005019	speaking to one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and singing praise in your heart to the Lord ,
49005020	giving thanks always for all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to the God and Father ,
49005021	being subject to one another ˻ out of reverence for ˼ Christ
49005022	— wives to their own husbands as to the Lord ,
49005023	because the husband is the head of the wife , as also Christ is the head of the church ( he himself being the Savior of the body ) .
49005024	But as the church is subject to Christ , thus also wives should be subject to their husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives , just as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for her ;
49005026	in order that he might sanctify her by cleansing her with the washing of water by the word ;
49005027	in order that he might present to himself the church glorious , not having a spot or wrinkle or any such thing , but that she may be holy and blameless .
49005028	Thus also husbands ought to love their own wives as their own bodies . The one who loves his own wife loves himself .
49005029	For no one ever hated his own flesh , but nourishes and cherishes it , just as also Christ does the church ,
49005030	because we are members of his body .
49005031	“ For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife , and the two will become one flesh . ”
49005032	( This mystery is great , but I am speaking with reference to Christ and the church . )
49005033	Only you also , each one of you , must thus love his own wife as himself , and the wife ˻ must respect ˼ her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents in the Lord , for this is right .
49006002	“ Honor your father and mother ” ( which is the first commandment with a promise ) ,
49006003	“ in order that it may be well with you , and you may ˻ live a long time ˼ on the earth . ”
49006004	And fathers , do not make your children angry , but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord .
49006005	Slaves , obey your earthly masters with fear and trembling , in the sincerity of your heart , as to Christ ,
49006006	not ˻ while being watched ˼ , as people pleasers , but as slaves of Christ doing the will of God from the heart ,
49006007	serving with goodwill as to the Lord and not to people ,
49006008	knowing that each one of you , if he should do anything good , this he will receive back from the Lord , whether slave or free .
49006009	And masters , do the same things to them , giving up threats , knowing that both their Lord and yours is in heaven , and there is no partiality with him .
49006010	Finally , become strong in the Lord and in the might of his strength .
49006011	Put on the full armor of God , so that you may be able to stand against the strategems of the devil ,
49006012	because our struggle is not against blood and flesh , but against the rulers , against the authorities , against the world rulers of this darkness , against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places .
49006013	Because of this , take up the full armor of God , in order that you may be able to resist in the evil day , and having done everything , to stand .
49006014	Stand therefore , girding your waist with truth , and putting on the breastplate of righteousness ,
49006015	and binding shoes under your feet with the preparation of the good news of peace ,
49006016	in everything taking up the shield of faith , with which you are able to quench all the flaming arrows of the evil one ,
49006017	and receive the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God ,
49006018	with all prayer and supplication praying at all times in the Spirit , and to this end being alert with all perseverance and supplication for all the saints ,

50001001	Paul and Timothy , slaves of Christ Jesus , to all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi , together with the overseers and deacons .
50001002	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
50001003	I give thanks to my God upon my every remembrance of you ,
50001004	always in my every prayer for all of you , making the prayer with joy ,
50001005	because of your participation in the gospel from the first day until now ,
50001006	convinced of this same thing , that the one who began a good work in you will finish it until the day of Christ Jesus ,
50001007	just as it is right for me to think this about all of you , because I have you in my heart , since both in my imprisonment and in the defense and confirmation of the gospel all of you are sharers of grace with me .
50001008	For God is my witness , that I long for all of you with the affection of Christ Jesus .
50001009	And this I pray : that your love may abound still more and more in knowledge and all discernment ,
50001010	so that you may approve what is superior , in order that you may be sincere and blameless in the day of Christ ,
50001011	having been filled with the fruit of righteousness which comes through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God .
50001012	Now I want you to know , brothers , that ˻ my circumstances ˼ have happened instead for the progress of the gospel ,
50001013	so that my imprisonment in Christ has become known in the whole praetorium and to all the rest ,
50001014	and most of the brothers , trusting in the Lord because of my imprisonment , dare even more to speak the word without fear .
50001015	Some even because of envy and strife preach Christ , but some also because of good will .
50001016	The latter do so from love , knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the gospel .
50001017	The former proclaim Christ from selfish ambition , not sincerely , thinking to raise up affliction in my imprisonment .
50001018	˻ What is the result ? ˼ Only that in every way , whether in pretense or in truth , Christ is proclaimed , and in this I rejoice . But also I will rejoice ,
50001019	for I know that this will turn out to me for deliverance through your prayer and the support of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
50001020	according to my eager expectation and hope , that I will be put to shame in nothing , but with all boldness , even now as always Christ will be exalted in my body , whether through life or through death .
50001021	For to me to live is Christ and to die is gain .
50001022	But if it is to live in the flesh , this is fruitful work for me , and which I will prefer I do not know .
50001023	But I am hard pressed ˻ between the two options ˼ , having the desire to depart and to be with Christ , ˻ for this is very much better ˼ .
50001024	But to stay on in the flesh is more necessary for your sake .
50001025	And because I am convinced of this , I know that I will remain and continue with all of you for your progress and joy in the faith ,
50001026	so that what you can be proud of may increase in Christ Jesus because of me through my return again to you .
50001027	Only lead your lives in a manner worthy of the gospel of Christ , so that whether I come and see you or am absent I hear ˻ your circumstances ˼ , that you are standing firm in one spirit , with one soul contending side by side for the faith of the gospel ,
50001028	and not letting yourselves be intimidated in anything by your opponents , which is a sign of destruction to them , but of your salvation , and this from God ,
50001029	because to you has been graciously granted on behalf of Christ not only to believe in him , but also to suffer on behalf of him ,
50001030	having the same struggle which you saw in me and now hear about in me .
50002001	Therefore , if there is any encouragement in Christ , if any consolation of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any affection and compassion ,
50002002	complete my joy , so that ˻ you are in agreement ˼ , having the same love , united in spirit , ˻ having one purpose ˼ .
50002003	Do nothing according to selfish ambition or according to empty conceit , but in humility considering one another better than yourselves ,
50002004	each one of you not looking out for ˻ his own interests ˼ , but also each of you looking out for˻ the interests ˼ of others .
50002005	Think this in yourselves which was also in Christ Jesus ,
50002006	who , existing in the form of God , did not consider being equal with God something to be grasped ,
50002007	but emptied himselfby taking the form of a slave , by becoming in the likeness of people . And being found in appearance like a man ,
50002008	he humbled himselfby becoming obedient to the point of death , that is , death on a cross .

50002012	Therefore my dear friends , just as you have always obeyed , not as in my presence only but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
50002013	For the one at work in you , both to will and to work for his good pleasure , is God .
50002014	Do all things without grumbling and disputing ,
50002015	in order that you may become blameless and innocent , children of God without fault in the midst of a crooked and perverted generation , among whom you shine as stars in the world ,

50002017	But even if I am being poured out as a drink offering on the sacrifice and service of your faith , I rejoice and rejoice with all of you .

50002021	For they all seek ˻ their own interests ˼ , not those of Jesus Christ .

50002023	Therefore I hope to send him at once , as soon as I see ˻ my circumstances ˼ .
50002024	And I am convinced in the Lord that I myself will arrive shortly also .
50002025	But I considered it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother and fellow worker and fellow soldier , but your messenger and servant of my need ,
50002026	because he was longing for all of you and was distressed because you had heard that he was sick .
50002027	For indeed he was sick , coming near to death , but God had mercy on him and not on him only , but also on me , so that I would not have grief upon grief .
50002028	Therefore I am sending him with special urgency , in order that when you see him again you may rejoice , and I may be less anxious .
50002029	Therefore welcome him in the Lord with all joy , and consider such people highly honored ,
