50003001	Finally , my brothers , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you is not troublesome to me , but is a safeguard for you .
50003002	Beware of the dogs , beware of the evil workers , beware of the mutilation .

50003004	although I could have confidence even in the flesh . If anyone else thinks to put confidence in the flesh , I can do so more :
50003005	˻ circumcised on the eighth day ˼ , from the nation of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , a Hebrew born from Hebrews , according to the law a Pharisee ,

50003007	But whatever things were gain to me , these things I have considered loss because of Christ .

50003020	For our commonwealth exists in heaven , from which also we eagerly await a savior , the Lord Jesus Christ ,

52003004	for indeed when we were with you we told you beforehand that we were about to be afflicted , just as indeed it happened , and you know .
52003005	Because of this , I also , when I could endure it no longer , sent in order to know your faith , lest somehow the tempter tempted you and our labor should be in vain .
52003006	But now , because Timothy has come to us from you and has brought good news to us of your faith and love , and that ˻ you always think kindly of us ˼ , desiring to see us just as also we desire to see you ,
52003007	because of this , brothers , we have been comforted because of you in all our distress and affliction through your faith ,
52003008	because now we live , if you stand firm in the Lord .
52003009	For what thanks can we repay to God concerning you , because of all the joy with which we rejoice because of you before our God ,
52003010	night and day praying beyond all measure that we may see your face and complete what is lacking in your faith ?
52003011	Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus direct our way to you ,
52003012	and may the Lord cause you to increase and to abound in love for one another and for all , just as also we do for you ,
52003013	so that your hearts may be established blameless in holiness before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints . Amen .
52004001	Finally therefore , brothers , we ask you and appeal to you in the Lord Jesus that , just as you have received from us how it is necessary for you to live and to please God , just as indeed you are living , that you progress even more .
52004002	For you know what commands we gave to you through the Lord Jesus .
52004003	For this is the will of God , your sanctification : that you abstain from sexual immorality ;
52004004	that each of you know how to possess his own vessel in sanctification and honor ,
52004005	not in lustful passion , just as also the Gentiles who do not know God ;
52004006	not to transgress and to exploit his brother in the matter , because the Lord is the one who avenges concerning all these things , just as also we told you beforehand and testified solemnly .
52004007	For God did not call us to impurity , but in holiness .
52004008	Therefore the one who rejects thisis not rejecting man , but God , who also gives his Holy Spirit to you .
52004009	But concerning brotherly love , I do not have need to write to you , for you yourselves are taught by God to love one another ,
52004010	for indeed you are practicing it toward all the brothers in all of Macedonia . But we urge you , brothers , to progress even more ,
52004011	and to aspire to live a quiet life , and to attend to ˻ your own business ˼ , and to work with your own hands , just as we commanded you ,
52004012	so that you may live decently toward those outside , and may have need of nothing .
52004013	Now we do not want you to be ignorant , brothers , concerning those who have fallen asleep , so that you will not grieve as also the rest , who have no hope .
52004014	For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , thus also God will bring those who have fallen asleep through Jesus together with him .
52004015	For this we say to you by the word of the Lord , that we who are alive , who remain until the Lord’s coming , will not possibly precede those who have fallen asleep .
52004016	For the Lord himself will descend from heaven with a shout of command , with the voice of the archangel and with the trumpet of God , and the dead in Christ will rise first .
52004017	Then we who are alive , who remain , will be snatched away at the same time together with them in the clouds for a meeting with the Lord in the air , and thus we will be together with the Lord always .
52004018	Therefore comfort one another with these words .
52005001	Now concerning the times and the seasons , brothers , you have no need of anything to be written to you ,
52005002	for you yourselves well know that the day of the Lord is coming in the same way as a thief in the night .
52005003	Whenever they say “ Peace and security , ” then sudden destruction will overtake them like the birth pains of ˻ a pregnant woman ˼ , and they will not possibly escape .
52005004	But you , brothers , are not in the darkness , so that the day should catch you like a thief ,
52005005	for you are all sons of light and sons of day . We are not of the night nor of darkness .
52005006	So then , we must not sleep like the rest , but must be on the alert and be self-controlled .
52005007	For those who sleep , sleep at night , and those who get drunk , are drunk at night .
52005008	But because we are of the day , we must be sober , by putting on the breastplate of faith and love and as a helmet the hope of salvation ,
52005009	because God did not appoint us for wrath , but for the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ ,
52005010	who died for us , so that whether we are awake or asleep , we will live at the same time with him .
52005011	Therefore encourage one another and build up ˻ each other ˼ , just as indeed you are doing .
52005012	Now we ask you , brothers , to respect those who labor among you and rule over you in the Lord and admonish you ,
52005013	and to esteem them beyond all measure in love , because of their work . Be at peace among yourselves .
52005014	And we urge you , brothers , admonish the disorderly , console the discouraged , help the sick , be patient toward all people .
52005015	See to it that no one pays back evil for evil to anyone , but always pursue good , both toward one another and toward all people .
52005016	Rejoice always ,
52005017	pray constantly ,
52005018	give thanks in everything ; for this is the will of God for you in Christ Jesus .
52005019	Do not quench the Spirit .
52005020	Do not despise prophecies ,
52005021	but examine all things ; hold fast to what is good .
52005022	Abstain from every form of evil .
52005023	Now may the God of peace himself sanctify you completely , and may your spirit and soul and body be kept complete , blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005024	The one who calls you is faithful , who also will do this .
52005025	Brothers , pray for us also .
52005026	Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss .
52005027	I adjure you by the Lord , have this letter read aloud to all the brothers .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	Paul and Silvanus and Timothy , to the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001003	We ought to give thanks to God always concerning you , brothers , just as it is fitting , because your faith is flourishing and the love of each one of you all toward one another is increasing
53001004	so that we ourselves boast in you in the churches of God about your patient endurance and faith in all your persecutions and the afflictions that you are enduring ,
53001005	a proof of the righteous judgment of God , so that you may be considered worthy of the kingdom of God , on behalf of which also you are suffering ,
53001006	since it is righteous in the sight of God to pay back those who are afflicting you with affliction ,
53001007	and to you who are being afflicted , rest with us at the revelation of the Lord Jesus from heaven with his powerful angels ,
53001008	with flaming fire giving punishment to those who do not know God and who do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus ,
53001009	who will pay the penalty of eternal destruction , away from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his strength ,
53001010	whenever he should come to be glorified on that day by his saints and to be marveled at by all who believe , because our testimony was believed among you ,
53001011	for which purpose we also pray always for you , that you may be considered worthy of the calling of our God , and he might fulfill every desire for goodness and work of faith with power ,
53001012	in order that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you , and you in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Now we ask you , brothers , concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and our assembling to him ,
53002002	that you not be easily shaken from your composure , nor be troubled either by a spirit or by a message or by a letter ˻ alleged to be from us ˼ , to the effect that the day of the Lord has arrived .
53002003	Do not let anyone deceive you in any way , for that day will not come unless the rebellion comes first , and the man of lawlessness is revealed , the son of destruction ,
53002004	who opposes and who exalts himself over every so-called god or object of worship , so that he sits down in the temple of God , proclaiming that he himself is God .
53002005	Do you not remember that while we were still with you , we were saying these things to you ?
53002006	And you know that which restrains him now , so that he will be revealed in his own time .
53002007	For the mystery of lawlessness is at work already ; only the one who now restrains will do so until he is out of the way ,
53002008	and then the lawless one will be revealed , whom the Lord Jesus will slay with the breath of his mouth , and wipe out by the appearance of his coming ,
53002009	whose coming is in accordance with the working of Satan , with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
53002010	and with every unrighteous deception against those who are perishing , in place of which they did not accept the love of the truth , so that they would be saved .
53002011	And because of this , God sends them ˻ a powerful delusion ˼ so that they will believe the lie ,
53002012	in order that all may be condemned who did not believe the truth , but delighted in unrighteousness .
53002013	But we ought to give thanks to God always concerning you , brothers dearly loved by the Lord , because God has chosen you as first fruits for salvation by the sanctification of the Spirit and faith in the truth ,
53002014	for which purpose also he called you through our gospel for the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	So then , brothers , stand firm and hold fast to the traditions which you were taught , whether by spoken word or by letter from us .
53002016	Now may our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father , who has loved us and given us eternal encouragement and good hope by grace ,
53002017	encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good work and word .
53003001	Finally , brothers , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may progress and be honored , just as also it was with you ,
53003002	and that we may be delivered from evil and wicked people , ˻ for not all have the faith ˼ .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful , who will strengthen you and guard you from the evil one .
53003004	And we have confidence in the Lord about you , that you are both doing and you will do the things that we are commanding .
53003005	Now may the Lord direct your hearts toward the love of God and toward the patient endurance of Christ .
53003006	But we command you , brothers , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that you keep away from every brother who lives irresponsibly and not according to the tradition that they received from us .
53003007	For you yourselves know how it is necessary to imitate us , that we did not behave irresponsibly among you ,
53003008	nor did we eat bread from anyone without paying , but with toil and labor , we were working night and day in order not to be a burden to any of you ,
53003009	not that we do not have the right , but so that we may give ourselves as an example to you , so that you may imitate us .
53003010	For even when we were with you , we used to command this to you : that if anyone does not want to work , neither should he eat .
53003011	For we hear that some among you are living irresponsibly , working at nothing , but being busybodies .
53003012	Now we command and we exhort such people in the Lord Jesus Christ that , working with quietness , they eat their own bread .
53003013	But as for you , brothers , do not be discouraged while doing what is right .
53003014	But if anyone does not obey our message through this letter , take note not to associate with him , in order that he may be put to shame .
53003015	And do not consider him as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
53003016	Now may the Lord of peace himself grant you peace through everything in every way . May the Lord be with all of you .
53003017	The greeting is by my hand , Paul’s , which is ˻ a sign of genuineness ˼ in every letter : ˻ this is how I write ˼ .
53003018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all of you .
54001001	Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus according to the command of God our Savior and of Christ Jesus our hope ,
54001002	to Timothy , my true child in the faith . Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
54001003	Just as I urged you when I traveled to Macedonia , remain in Ephesus , so that you may instruct certain people not to teach other doctrine ,
54001004	and not to pay attention to myths and endless genealogies , which cause useless speculations rather than God’s plan that is by faith .
54001005	But the goal of our instruction is love from a pure heart and a good conscience and a faith without hypocrisy ,
54001006	from which some have deviated , and have turned away into fruitless discussion ,
54001007	wanting to be teachers of the law , although they do not understand either the things which they are saying or the things concerning which they are speaking confidently .
54001008	But we know that the law is good , if anyone makes use of it lawfully ,
54001009	knowing this , that the law is not given for a righteous person but for the lawless and rebellious , for the ungodly and sinners , for the unholy and totally worldly , for the one who kills his father and the one who kills his mother , for murderers ,
54001010	sexually immoral people , homosexuals , kidnappers , liars , perjurers , and ˻ whatever ˼ else is opposed to sound teaching ,
54001011	according to the glorious gospel of the blessed God that I was entrusted with .
54001012	˻ I give thanks ˼ to the one who strengthens me , Christ Jesus our Lord , because he considered me faithful , placing me into ministry ,
54001013	although I was formerly a blasphemer and a persecutor and a violent man , but I was shown mercy because I acted ignorantly in unbelief ,
54001014	and the grace of our Lord abounded with the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus .
54001015	The saying is trustworthy and worthy of all acceptance : Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners , of whom I am the foremost .
54001016	But because of this I was shown mercy , in order that in me foremost , Christ Jesus might demonstrate his total patience , for an example for those who are going to believe in him for eternal life .
54001017	Now to the King of the ages , immortal , invisible , to the only God , be honor and glory ˻ forever and ever ˼ . Amen .
54001018	I am setting before you this instruction , Timothy my child , in accordance with the prophecies spoken long ago about you , in order that by them you may fight the good fight ,
54001019	having faith and a good conscience , which some , because they have rejected these , have suffered shipwreck concerning their faith ,
54001020	among whom are Hymenaeus and Alexander , whom I have handed over to Satan , in order that they may be taught not to blaspheme .
54002001	Therefore , I urge first of all that petitions , prayers , requests , and thanksgiving be made on behalf of all people ,
54002002	on behalf of kings and all those who are in authority , in order that we may live a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and dignity .
54002003	This is good and acceptable before God our Savior ,
54002004	who wants all people to be saved and to come to a knowledge of the truth .
54002005	For there is one God and one mediator between God and human beings , the man Christ Jesus ,
54002006	who gave himself a ransom for all , the testimony at the proper time ,
54002007	for which I was appointed a herald and an apostle — I am speaking the truth , I am not lying — a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth .
54002008	Therefore I want the men in every place to pray , lifting up holy hands without anger and dispute .
54002009	Likewise also the women should adorn themselves in appropriate clothing , with modesty and self-control , not with braided hair and gold jewelry or pearls or expensive clothing ,
54002010	but with good deeds which are fitting for women who profess godliness .
54002011	A woman must learn in quietness with all submission .
54002012	But I do not permit a woman to teach or to exercise authority over a man , but ˻ to remain quiet ˼ .
54002013	For Adam was formed first , then Eve ,
54002014	and Adam was not deceived , but the woman , because she was deceived , came into transgression .
54002015	But she will be saved through the bearing of children , if she continues in faith and love and holiness with self-control .
54003001	The saying is trustworthy : if anyone aspires to supervision , he desires a good work .
54003002	Therefore the overseer must be irreproachable , the husband of one wife , temperate , self-controlled , respectable , hospitable , skillful in teaching ,
54003003	not addicted to wine , not a violent person , but gentle , peaceable , not loving money ,
54003004	managing his own household well , having children in submission with all dignity
54003005	( but if someone does not know how to manage his own household , how will he take care of the church of God ? ) ,
54003006	not newly converted , lest he become conceited and fall into the condemnation of the devil .
54003007	But he must also have a good testimony from those outside , in order that he may not fall into disgrace and the trap of the devil .
54003008	Deacons likewise must be dignified , not insincere , not devoted to much wine , not fond of dishonest gain ,
54003009	holding the mystery of the faith with a clear conscience ,
54003010	and these also must be tested first ; then let them serve if they are above reproach .
54003011	The wives likewise must be dignified , not slanderous , temperate , faithful in all things .
54003012	Deacons must be husbands of one wife , managing their children and their own households well .
54003013	For those who have served well acquire a good standing for themselves , and great boldness in the faith that is in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I am writing these things to you , hoping to come to you in a short time .
54003015	But if I am delayed , I am writing in order that you may know how one must conduct oneself in the household of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and mainstay of the truth .
54003016	And most certainly , great is the mystery of godliness : Who was revealed in the flesh , was vindicated by the Spirit , was seen by angels , was proclaimed among the Gentiles , was believed on in the world , was taken up in glory .
54004001	Now the Spirit explicitly says that in the last times some will depart from the faith , paying attention to deceitful spirits and teachings of demons ,
54004002	by the hypocrisy of liars , who are seared in their own conscience ,
54004003	who forbid marrying and insist on abstaining from foods that God created for sharing in with thankfulness by those who believe and who know the truth ,
54004004	because everything created by God is good and nothing is to be rejected if it is received with thankfulness ,
54004005	for it is made holy by the word of God and prayer .
54004006	By teaching these things to the brothers , you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus , trained in the words of the faith and of the good teaching that you have followed faithfully .
54004007	But reject those ˻ worthless myths told by elderly women ˼ , and train yourself for godliness .
54004008	For the training of the body is ˻ somewhat ˼ profitable , but godliness is profitable for everything , because it holds promise for the present life and for the life to come .
54004009	The statement is trustworthy and deserving of complete acceptance .
54004010	For to this end we labor and strive , because we have put our hope in the living God , who is the Savior of all people , especially of believers .
54004011	Command these things and teach them .
54004012	Let no one look down on your youth , but be an example for the believers in word , in conduct , in love , in faith , in purity .
54004013	Until I come , pay attention to the public reading , to exhortation , to teaching .
54004014	Do not neglect the gift that is in you , that was granted to you through prophecy with the laying on of hands by the council of elders .
54004015	Practice these things . Be diligent in these things , in order that your progress may be evident to everyone .
54004016	Fix your attention on yourself and on your teaching . Continue in them , for by doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you .
54005001	Do not rebuke an older man , but appeal to him as a father , younger men as brothers ,
54005002	older women as mothers , younger women as sisters , with all purity .
54005003	Honor widows who are truly widows .
54005004	But if any widow has children or grandchildren , they must learn to show profound respect for their own household first , and to pay back recompense to their parents , for this is pleasing in the sight of God .
54005005	But the widow who is one truly , and is left alone , has put her hope in God and continues in her petitions and prayers night and day .
54005006	But the one who lives for sensual pleasure is dead even though she lives .
54005007	And command these things , in order that they may be irreproachable .
54005008	But if someone does not provide for his own relatives , and especially the members of his household , he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever .
54005009	Let a widow be put on the list if she is not less than sixty years old , the wife of one husband ,
54005010	being well-attested by good works , if she has brought up children , if she has shown hospitality , if she has washed the feet of the saints , if she has helped those who are oppressed , if she has devoted herself to every good work .
54005011	But refuse younger widows , for whenever their physical desires lead them away from Christ , they want to marry ,
54005012	thus incurring condemnation because they have broken their former pledge .
54005013	And at the same time also , going around from house to house , they learn to be idle , and not only idle , but also gossipy and busybodies , saying the things that are not necessary .
54005014	Therefore I want younger widows to marry , to bear children , to manage a household , to give the adversary no opportunity for reproach .
54005015	For already some have turned away and followed after Satan .
54005016	If any believing woman has widows , she must help them , and the church must not be burdened , in order that it may help those who are truly widows .
54005017	The elders who lead well must be considered worthy of double honor , especially those who labor by speaking and teaching .
54005018	For the scripture says , “ You must not muzzle an ox while it is threshing , ” and “ The worker is worthy of his wages . ”
54005019	Do not accept an accusation against an elder except on the evidence of two or three witnesses .
54005020	Reprove those who sin in the presence of all , in order that the rest also may experience fear .
54005021	I testify solemnly before God and Christ Jesus and the elect angels that you observe these things without prejudice , doing nothing according to partiality .
54005022	Lay hands on no one hastily , and do not participate in the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	( No longer drink only water , but use a little wine for your stomach and your frequent illnesses . )
54005024	The sins of some people are evident , preceding them to judgment , but for some also they follow after them .
54005025	Likewise also good works are evident , and those considered otherwise are not able to be hidden .
54006001	All those who are under the yoke as slaves must regard their own masters as worthy of all honor , lest the name of God and the teaching be slandered .
54006002	And those who have believing masters must not look down on them because they are brothers , but rather they must serve , because those who benefit by their service are believers and dearly loved . Teach and encourage these things .
54006003	If anyone teaches other doctrine and does not devote himself to the sound words of our Lord Jesus Christ and the teaching that is in accordance with godliness ,
54006004	he is conceited , understanding nothing , but having a morbid interest concerning controversies and disputes about words , from which come envy , strife , slanders , evil suspicions ,
54006005	constant wrangling by people of depraved mind and deprived of the truth , who consider godliness to be a means of gain .
54006006	But godliness with contentment is a great means of gain .
54006007	For we have brought nothing into the world , so that neither can we bring anything out .
54006008	But if we have food and clothing , with these things we will be content .
54006009	But those who want to be rich fall into temptation and a trap and many foolish and harmful desires , which plunge those people into ruin and destruction .
54006010	For the love of money is a root of all evil , by which some , because they desire it , have gone astray from the faith and have pierced themselves with many pains .
54006011	But you , O man of God , flee from these things , and pursue righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patient endurance , gentleness .
54006012	Fight the good fight of the faith ; take hold of the eternal life to which you were called , and confessed the good confession in the presence of many witnesses .
54006013	I command you , in the sight of God who gives life to all things and Christ Jesus who testified the good confession before Pontius Pilate ,
54006014	that you observe the commandment without fault , irreproachable until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
54006015	which he will make known in his own time , the blessed and only Sovereign , the King of those who reign as kings and Lord of those who rule as lords ,
54006016	the one who alone possesses immortality , who lives in unapproachable light , whom no human being has seen nor is able to see , to whom be honor and eternal power . Amen .
54006017	Command those who are rich in this present age not to be proud and not to put their hope in the uncertainty of riches , but in God , who provides us all things richly for enjoyment ,
54006018	to do good , to be rich in good works , to be generous , sharing freely ,
54006019	storing up for themselves a good foundation for the future , in order that they may take hold of what is truly life .
54006020	O Timothy , guard what has been entrusted to you . Turn away from pointless empty talk and contradictions of what is falsely called knowledge ,
54006021	which some , by professing it , have deviated concerning the faith . Grace be with you all .
55001001	Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
55001002	to Timothy , my dear child . Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
55001003	˻ I am thankful ˼ to God , whom I have served with a clear conscience ˻ as my ancestors did ˼ , when ˻ I remember you constantly ˼ in my prayers night and day ,
55001004	longing to see you as I remember your tears , so that I may be filled with joy ,
55001005	˻ remembering the ˼ sincere faith in you , which lived first in your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunice , and I am convinced that is in you also ,
55001006	for which reason I remind you to rekindle the gift of God that is in you through the laying on of my hands .
55001007	For God has not given us a spirit of cowardice , but of power and love and self-discipline .
55001008	Therefore , do not be ashamed of the testimony about our Lord , nor me his prisoner , but suffer along with me for the gospel , according to the power of God ,
55001009	who saved us and called us with a holy calling , not according to our works but according to his own purpose and grace that was given to us in Christ Jesus ˻ before time began ˼ ,
55001010	but has now been disclosed by the appearing of our Savior Christ Jesus , who has abolished death and brought to light life and immortality through the gospel ,
55001011	for which I was appointed a proclaimer and an apostle and a teacher ,
55001012	for which reason also I suffer these things . But I am not ashamed , because I know in whom I have believed , and I am convinced that he is able to guard what I have entrusted until that day .
55001013	Hold fast to the pattern of sound words which you heard from me , in the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus .
55001014	Guard the good deposit through the Holy Spirit who lives in us .
55001015	You know this , that all those in Asia turned away from me , among whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord grant mercy to the household of Onesiphorus , because he refreshed me many times , and was not ashamed of my imprisonment ,
55001017	but when he was in Rome , he diligently sought me and found me .
55001018	May the Lord grant him to find mercy from the Lord in that day ! And how much he served me in Ephesus you know very well .
55002001	You , therefore , my child , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus ,
55002002	and the things which you have heard from me in the presence of many witnesses , entrust these things to faithful people who will be competent to teach others also .
55002003	Suffer together with me as a good soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	No one who serves as a soldier is entangled in the activities of everyday life , so that he may please the one who enlisted him .
55002005	And also if anyone competes he is not crowned unless he competes according to the rules .
55002006	The farmer who works hard must be the first to receive a share of the crops .
55002007	Consider what I am saying , for the Lord will grant you understanding in all these things .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ , raised from the dead , a descendant of David according to my gospel ,
55002009	in connection with which I suffer misfortune to the point of ˻ imprisonment ˼ as a criminal , but the word of God is not bound .
55002010	Because of this , I endure all things for the sake of the chosen , in order that they also may obtain salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
55002011	The saying is trustworthy : For if we died with him , we will also live with him ;
55002012	if we endure , we will also reign with him ; if we deny him , he also will deny us ;
55002013	if we are unfaithful , he remains faithful , ˻ because he cannot deny himself ˼ .
55002014	Remind people of these things , solemnly urging them before God not to dispute about words . This is in no way beneficial and leads to the ruin of the hearers .
55002015	Make every effort to present yourself approved to God , a worker having no need to be ashamed , guiding the word of truth along a straight path .
55002016	But avoid pointless chatter , for it will progress to greater ungodliness ,
55002017	and their message ˻ will spread ˼ like gangrene , among whom are Hymenaeus and Philetus ,
55002018	who have deviated concerning the truth by saying the resurrection has already taken place , and they are upsetting the faith of some .
55002019	However , the solid foundation of God stands firm , having this seal : “ The Lord knows those who are his , ” and “ Everyone who names the name of the Lord must abstain from unrighteousness . ”
55002020	Now in a great house there are not only gold and silver vessels , but also wooden and earthenware ones , some of which are for honorable use , and some of which are for ordinary use .
55002021	Therefore , if someone cleanses himself from these things , he will be a vessel for honorable use , set apart , useful to the Master , prepared for every good work .
55002022	But flee from youthful desires , and pursue righteousness , faith , love , and peace , in company with those who call upon the Lord from a pure heart .
55002023	But avoid foolish and uninformed controversies , because you know that they produce quarrels .
55002024	And the slave of the Lord must not quarrel , but be kind toward everyone , skillful in teaching , tolerant ,
55002025	correcting those who are opposed with gentleness , seeing whether perhaps God may grant them repentence to a knowledge of the truth ,
55002026	and they will come to their senses again and escape from the trap of the devil , being held captive by him to do his will .
55003001	But know this , that in the last days difficult times will come ,
55003002	for people will be lovers of themselves , lovers of money , boasters , arrogant , slanderers , disobedient to parents , ungrateful , unholy ,
55003003	hardhearted , irreconcilable , slanderous , without self-control , savage , with no interest for what is good ,
55003004	traitors , reckless , conceited , loving pleasure rather than loving God ,
55003005	maintaining a form of godliness , but denying its power . Avoid these people .
55003006	For from these are those who slip into houses and captivate foolish women loaded down with sins , led by various kinds of desires ,
55003007	always learning and never able to come to a knowledge of the truth .
55003008	And ˻ just as ˼ Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses , so also these oppose the truth , people corrupted in mind , disqualified concerning the faith .
55003009	But they will not progress to a greater extent , for their folly will be quite evident to everyone , as also the folly of those two was .
55003010	But you have faithfully followed my teaching , way of life , purpose , faith , patience , love , endurance ,
55003011	persecutions , and sufferings that happened to me in Antioch , in Iconium , and in Lystra , what sort of persecutions I endured , and the Lord delivered me from all of them .
55003012	And indeed , all those who want to live in a godly manner in Christ Jesus will be persecuted .
55003013	But evil people and imposters will progress to the worse , deceiving and being deceived .
55003014	But you continue in the things which you have learned and are convinced of , because you know from whom you learned them ,
55003015	and that from childhood you have known the holy writings that are able to make you wise for salvation through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	All scripture is inspired by God and profitable for teaching , for reproof , for correction , for training in righteousness ,
55003017	in order that the person of God may be competent , equipped for every good work .
55004001	I solemnly charge you before God and Christ Jesus , who is going to judge the living and the dead , and by his appearing and his kingdom ,
55004002	preach the word , be ready in season and out of season , reprove , rebuke , exhort , with all patience and instruction .
55004003	For there will be a time when they will not put up with sound teaching , but in accordance with their own desires , they will accumulate for themselves teachers , ˻ because they have an insatiable curiosity ˼ ,
55004004	and they will turn away from the hearing of the truth , but will turn to myths .
55004005	But you , be self-controlled in all things , bear hardship patiently , do the work of an evangelist , fulfill your ministry .
55004006	For I am already being poured out as a drink offering , and the time of my departure is imminent .
55004007	I have fought the good fight , I have completed the race , I have kept the faith .
55004008	Finally , the crown of righteousness is reserved for me , that the Lord , the righteous Judge , will award to me on that day , and not only to me , but also to all who have loved his appearing .
55004009	Make haste to come to me quickly .
55004010	For Demas deserted me , because he loved the present age , and went to Thessalonica . Crescens went to Galatia ; Titus went to Dalmatia .
55004011	Luke alone is with me . Take along Mark and bring him with you , because he is useful to me for ministry .
55004012	But I have sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , bring the cloak that I left behind in Troas with Carpus , and the scrolls , especially the parchments .
55004014	Alexander the metalworker did me much harm ; may the Lord pay back to him according to his deeds ,
55004015	against whom you also be on guard , because he vehemently opposed our words .
55004016	At my first defense , no one came to my aid , but they all deserted me ; may it not be counted against them .
55004017	But the Lord helped me and strengthened me , so that through me the proclamation might be fulfilled and all the Gentiles might hear , and he rescued me from the lion’s mouth .
55004018	The Lord will rescue me from every evil deed , and will save me for his heavenly kingdom , to whom be the glory ˻ forever and ever ˼ . Amen .
55004019	Greet Prisca and Aquila and the household of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus remained in Corinth , but Trophimus I left behind in Miletus because he was sick .
55004021	Make haste to come before winter . Eubulus and Pudens and Linus and Claudia and all the brothers greet you .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . Grace be with you .
56001001	Paul , a slave of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ for the faith of the chosen of God and the knowledge of the truth that is according to godliness ,
56001002	in the hope of eternal life which God , who does not lie , promised before eternal ages ,
56001003	but at the proper time has disclosed his message in the proclamation with which I was entrusted according to the command of God our Savior ,
56001004	to Titus , my true child according to a common faith . Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior .
56001005	On account of this , I left you behind in Crete , in order that what remains may be set in order and you may appoint elders in every town , as I ordered you .
56001006	If anyone is blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children , not ˻ accused of dissipation ˼ or rebellious .
56001007	For it is necessary for the overseer to be blameless as God’s steward , not self-willed , not quick-tempered , not addicted to wine , not violent , not greedy for dishonest gain ,
56001008	but hospitable , loving what is good , prudent , just , devout , self-controlled ,
56001009	holding fast to the faithful message according to the teaching , in order that he may be able both to exhort with sound instruction and to reprove those who speak against it .
56001010	For there are many rebellious people , idle talkers and deceivers , especially those of the circumcision ,
56001011	whom it is necessary to silence , whoever are ruining whole families by teaching things which must not be taught for the sake of dishonest gain .
56001012	A certain one of them , one of their own prophets , has said , “ Cretans are always liars , evil beasts , lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	This testimony is true , for which reason reprove them severely , in order that they may be sound in the faith ,
56001014	not paying attention to Jewish myths and commandments of people who turn away from the truth .
56001015	To the pure all thingsare pure , but to those who are defiled and unbelieving nothing is pure , but both their mind and conscience are defiled .
56001016	They profess to know God , but by their deeds they deny him , because they are detestable and disobedient , and unfit for every good deed .
56002001	But you , speak the things which are fitting for sound instruction .
56002002	Older men are to be temperate , worthy of respect , self-controlled , sound in faith , in love , and in endurance .
56002003	Older women likewise are to be reverent in their behavior , not slanderous , not enslaved to much wine , teaching what is good ,
56002004	in order that they may encourage the young women to love their husbands and to love their children ,
56002005	to be self-controlled , pure , busy at home , good , being subject to their own husbands , in order that the word of God may not be slandered .
56002006	Likewise , exhort the young men to be self-controlled ,
56002007	concerning everything showing yourself to be an example of good deeds , in your teaching demonstrating soundness , dignity ,
56002008	a sound message beyond reproach , in order that ˻ an opponent ˼ may be put to shame , because he has nothing bad to say concerning us .
56002009	Slaves must be subject to their own masters in everything , to be well-pleasing , not to talk back ,
56002010	not stealing , but demonstrating all good faith , in order that they may do credit to the teaching of God our Savior in everything .
56002011	For the grace of God has appeared , bringing salvation to all people ,
56002012	training us in order that , denying impiety and worldly desires , we may live self-controlled and righteously and godly in the present age ,
56002013	looking forward to the blessed hope and the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior Jesus Christ ,
56002014	who gave himself for us , in order that he might redeem us from all lawlessness and purify for himself a people for his own possession , zealous for good deeds .
56002015	Speak these things and exhort and reprove with all authority . Let no one disregard you .
56003001	Remind them to be subject to the rulers and to the authorities , to obey , to be prepared for every good work ,
56003002	to speak evil of no one , to be peaceable , gentle , showing all courtesy to all people .
56003003	For we also were once foolish , disobedient , led astray , enslaved to various desires and pleasures , spending our lives in wickedness and envy , despicable , hating one another .
56003004	But when the kindness and love for mankind of God our Savior appeared ,
56003005	he saved us , not by deeds of righteousness that we have done , but because of his mercy , through the washing of regeneration and renewal by the Holy Spirit ,
56003006	whom he poured out on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Savior ,
56003007	so that , having been justified by his grace , we may become heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
56003008	The saying is trustworthy , and I want you to insist concerning these things , so that those who have believed in God may be careful to engage in good deeds . These things are good and beneficial for people .
56003009	But avoid foolish controversies and genealogies and contentions and quarrels about the law , for they are useless and fruitless .
56003010	Reject a divisive person after a first and second admonition ,
56003011	knowing that such a person is perverted and is sinning , being self-condemned .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , make haste to come to me in Nicopolis , for I have decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Diligently send on their way Zenas the lawyer and Apollos , so that ˻ they may lack nothing ˼ .
56003014	But also our people must learn to engage in good deeds for necessary needs , so that they will not be unfruitful .
56003015	All those with me greet you . Greet those who love us in the faith . Grace be with all of you .
57001001	Paul , a prisoner of Christ Jesus , and Timothy our brother , to Philemon , our dear friend and fellow worker ,
57001002	and to Apphia our sister , and to Archippus our fellow soldier , and to the church in your house .
57001003	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
57001004	I thank my God , always making mention of you in my prayers ,
57001005	because I hear about your love and faith which you have toward the Lord Jesus and for all the saints .
57001006	I pray that the fellowship of your faith may become effective in the knowledge of every good thing that is in us for Christ .
57001007	For I have great joy and encouragement from your love , because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you , brother .
57001008	Therefore , although I have great confidence in Christ to order you to do what is proper ,
57001009	instead I appeal to you because of love , since I am such a one as Paul , now an old man and also a prisoner of Christ Jesus .
57001010	I am appealing to you concerning my child whom I became the father of during my imprisonment , Onesimus .
57001011	Once he was useless to you , but now he is useful both to you and to me ,
57001012	whom I have sent back to you himself , that is , my heart ,
57001013	whom I wanted to keep with me , in order that he might serve me on behalf of you during my imprisonment for the gospel .
57001014	But apart from your consent , I wanted to do nothing , in order that your good deed might be not as according to necessity , but according to your own free will .
57001015	For perhaps because of this , he was separated from you for a time , in order that you might have him back forever ,
57001016	no longer as a slave , but more than a slave , a beloved brother , especially to me , but how much more to you , both in the flesh and in the Lord .
57001017	If therefore you consider me a partner , receive him as you would me .
57001018	But if in anything he has caused you loss or owes you anything , ˻ charge this to my account ˼ .
57001019	I , Paul , write this with my own hand : I will pay it back , lest I mention to you that ˻ you owe me even your very self besides ˼ .
57001020	Yes , brother , I ought to have some benefit of you in the Lord ; refresh my heart in Christ .
57001021	Confident of your obedience , I am writing to you because I know that you will do even beyond what I say .
57001022	At the same time also , prepare a guest room for me , for I hope that through your prayers I will be restored to you .
57001023	Epaphras , my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus , greets you ,
57001024	and so do Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke , my fellow workers .
57001025	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	Although God spoke long ago in many parts and in many ways to the fathers by the prophets ,
58001002	in these last days he has spoken to us by a Son , whom he appointed heir of all things , through whom also he made the world ,
58001003	who is the radiance of his glory and the representation of his essence , sustaining all things by the word of his power . When he had made purification for sins , he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high ,
58001004	having become by so much better than the angels , by as much as he has inherited a more excellent name than theirs .
58001005	For to which of the angels did he ever say , “ You are my son , today I have fathered you , ” and again , “ I will be ˻ his father ˼ , and he will be ˻ my son ˼ ” ?
58001006	And again , when he brings the firstborn into the world , he says , “ And let all the angels of God worship him . ”
58001007	And concerning the angels he says , “ The one who makes his angels winds , and his servants a flame of fire , ”
58001008	but concerning the Son , “ Your throne , O God , is˻ forever and ever ˼ , and the scepter of righteous is the scepter of your kingdom .
58001009	You have loved righteousness and hated lawlessness ; because of this God , your God , has anointed youwith the olive oil of joy more than your companions .
58001010	And , “ You , Lord , laid the foundation of the earth in the beginning , and the heavens are the works of your hands ;
58001011	they will perish , but you continue , and they will all become old like a garment ,
58001012	and like a robe you will roll them up , and like a garment they will be changed ; but you are the same , and your years will not run out . ”
58001013	But to which of the angels has he ever said , “ Sit down at my right hand , until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet . ”
58001014	Are they not all spirits engaged in special service , sent on assignment for the sake of those who are going to inherit salvation ?
58002001	Because of this , it is all the more necessary that we pay attention to the things we have heard , lest we drift away .
58002002	For if the word spoken through angels was binding and every transgression and act of disobedience received a just penalty ,
58002003	how will we escape if we neglect so great a salvation which had its beginning when it was spoken through the Lord and was confirmed to us by those who heard ,
58002004	while God was testifying at the same time by signs and wonders and various miracles and distributions of the Holy Spirit according to his will .
58002005	For he did not subject to angels the world to come , about which we are speaking .
58002006	But someone testified somewhere , saying , “ What is man , that you remember him , or the son of man , that you care for him ?
58002007	You made him for a short time lower than the angels ; you crowned him with glory and honor ;
58002008	you subjected all things under his feet . For in subjecting all things to him , he left nothing that was not subject to him . But now we do not yet see all things subjected to him ,
58002009	but we see Jesus , for a short time made lower than the angels , because of the suffering of death crowned with glory and honor , so that by the grace of God he might taste death on behalf of everyone .
58002010	For it was fitting for him for whom are all things and through whom are all things in bringing many sons to glory to perfect the originator of their salvation through sufferings .
58002011	For both the one who sanctifies and the ones who are sanctified are all from one , for which reason he is not ashamed to call them brothers ,
58002012	saying , “ I will proclaim your name to my brothers ; in the midst of the assembly I will sing in praise of you . ”
58002013	And again , “ I will trust in him . ” And again , “ Behold , I and the children God has given me . ”
58002014	Therefore , since the children share in blood and flesh , he also in like manner shared in these same things , in order that through death he could destroy the one who has the power of death , that is , the devil ,
58002015	and could set free these who through fear of death were subject to slavery throughout all their lives .
58002016	For surely he is not concerned with angels , but he is concerned with the descendants of Abraham .
58002017	Therefore he was obligated to be made like his brothers in all respects , in order that he could become a merciful and faithful high priest in the things relating to God , in order to make atonement for the sins of the people .
58002018	For in that which he himself suffered when he was tempted , he is able to help those who are tempted .
58003001	Therefore , holy brothers , sharers in a heavenly calling , consider Jesus , the apostle and high priest of our confession ,
58003002	who was faithful to the one who appointed him , as Moses also was in all his household .
58003003	For this one is considered worthy of greater glory than Moses , inasmuch as the one who builds it has greater honor than the house .
58003004	For every house is built by someone , but the one who built all thingsis God .
58003005	And Moses was faithful in all his house as a servant , for a testimony to the things that would be spoken ,
58003006	but Christ was faithful as a son over his house , whose house we are , if indeed we hold fast to our confidence and the hope we can be proud of .
58003007	Therefore , just as the Holy Spirit says , “ Today , if you hear his voice ,
58003008	do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion , in the day of testing in the wilderness ,
58003009	where your fathers tested me by trialand saw my works
58003010	for forty years . Therefore I was angry with this generation , and I said , ‘ They always go astray in their heart , and they do not know my ways . ’
58003011	As I swore in my anger , ‘ ˻ They will never enter ˼ into my rest . ’ ”
58003012	Watch out , brothers , lest there be in some of you an evil , unbelieving heart , with the result that you fall away from the living God .
58003013	But encourage one another ˻ day by day ˼ , as long as it is called “ today , ” so that ˻ none of you become hardened ˼ by the deception of sin .
58003014	For we have become partners of Christ , if indeed we hold fast the beginning of our commitment steadfast until the end ,
58003015	˻ while it is said ˼ , “ Today , if you hear his voice , do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion . ”
58003016	For who , when they heard it , were disobedient ? Surely it was not all who went out from Egypt through Moses ?
58003017	And with whom was he angry for forty years ? Was it not with those who sinned , whose dead bodies fell in the wilderness ?
58003018	And to whom did he swear they would not enter into his rest , except those who were disobedient ?
58003019	And so we see that they were not able to enter because of unbelief .
58004001	Therefore let us fear , while there remains a promise of entering into his rest , that none of you appear to fall short of it .
58004002	˻ For we also have had the good news proclaimed to us ˼ , just as those also did , but the message ˻ they heard ˼ did not benefit them , because they were not united with those who heard it in faith .
58004003	For we who have believed enter into that rest , just as he has said , “ As I swore in my anger , ‘ ˻ They will never enter ˼ into my rest . ’ ” And yet these works have been accomplished from the foundation of the world .
58004004	For he has spoken somewhere about the seventh day in this way : “ And God rested on the seventh day from all his works , ”
58004005	and in this passage again , ‘ ˻ They will never enter ˼ into my rest . ’ ”
58004006	Since therefore it remains for some to enter into it , and the ones to whom the good news was proclaimed previously did not enter because of disobedience ,
58004007	again he ordains a certain day , today , speaking by David after so long a time , just as had been said before , “ Today , if you hear his voice , do not harden your hearts . ”
58004008	For if Joshua had caused them to rest , he would not have spoken about another day after these things .
58004009	Consequently a sabbath rest remains for the people of God .
58004010	For the one who has entered into his rest has also himself rested from his works , just as God did from his own works .
58004011	Therefore , let us make every effort to enter into that rest , in order that no one may fall in the same pattern of disobedience .
58004012	For the word of God is living and active and sharper than any double-edged sword , and piercing as far as the division of soul and spirit , both joints and marrow , and able to judge the reflections and thoughts of the heart .
58004013	And no creature is hidden in the sight of him , but all things are naked and laid bare to the eyes of him to whom ˻ we must give our account ˼ .
58004014	Therefore , because we have a great high priest who has gone through the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast to our confession .
58004015	For we do not have a high priest who is not able to sympathize with our weaknesses , but who has been tempted in all things in the same way , without sin .
58004016	Therefore let us approach with confidence to the throne of grace , in order that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need .
58005001	For every high priest taken from among men is appointed on behalf of people in the things relating to God , in order that he can offer both gifts and sacrifices on behalf of sins ,
58005002	being able to deal gently with those who are ignorant and led astray , since he himself also is surrounded by weakness ,
58005003	and because of it he is obligated to offer sacrifices for sins ˻ for himself also , as well as for the people ˼ .
58005004	And someone does not take for himself the honor , but is called by God , just as Aaron also was .
58005005	Thus also Christ did not glorify himself to become high priest , but the one who said to him , “ You are my Son , today I have fathered you , ”
58005006	just as also in another place he says , “ You are a priest ˻ forever ˼ according to the order of Melchizedek , ”
58005007	who in the days of his flesh offered up both prayers and supplications , with loud crying and tears , to the one who was able to save him from death , and he was heard as a result of his reverence .
58005008	Although he was a son , he learned obedience from what he suffered ,
58005009	and being perfected , he became the source of eternal salvation to all those who obey him ,
58005010	being designated by God a high priest according to the order of Melchizedek .
58005011	Concerning this ˻ we have much to say and it is difficult to explain ˼ , since you have become sluggish in hearing .
58005012	For indeed , although you ought to be teachers ˻ by this time ˼ , you have need of someone to teach you again the beginning elements of the oracles of God , and ˻ you have need of ˼ milk and not solid food .
58005013	For everyone who partakes of milk is unacquainted with the message of righteousness , because he is an infant .
58005014	But solid food is for the mature , who because of practice have trained their faculties for the distinguishing of both good and evil .
58006001	Therefore , leaving behind the elementary message about Christ , let us move on to maturity , not laying again a foundation of repentance from dead works and faith in God ,
58006002	teaching about baptisms and laying on of hands , and resurrection of the dead and eternal judgment .
58006003	And this we will do , if God permits .
58006004	For it is impossible concerning those who have once been enlightened , and have tasted the heavenly gift , and become sharers of the Holy Spirit ,
58006005	and have tasted the good word of God and the powers of the coming age ,
58006006	and having fallen away , to renew them again to repentence , because they have crucified again for themselves the Son of God and held him up to contempt .
58006007	For ground that drinks the rain that comes often upon it , and brings forth vegetation usable to those people˻ for whose sake ˼ it is also cultivated , shares a blessing from God .
58006008	But if it produces thorns and thistles , it is worthless and near to a curse , whose end is for burning .
58006009	But even if we are speaking in this way , dear friends , we are convinced of better things concerning you , and belonging to salvation .
58006010	For God is not unjust , so as to forget your work and the love which you demonstrated for his name by having served the saints , and continuing to serve them .
58006011	And we desire each one of you to demonstrate the same diligence for the full assurance of your hope until the end ,
58006012	in order that you may not be sluggish , but imitators of those who inherit the promises through faith and patience .
58006013	For when God made a promise to Abraham , since he had no one greater to swear by , he swore by himself ,
58006014	saying , “ Surely ˻ I will greatly bless ˼ you , and ˻ I will greatly multiply ˼ you . ”
58006015	And so , by persevering , he obtained the promise .
58006016	For people swear by what is greater than themselves , and the oath for confirmation is the end of all dispute for them .
58006017	In the same way God , because he wanted to show even more to the heirs of the promise the unchangeableness of his resolve , guaranteed it with an oath ,
58006018	in order that through two unchangeable things , in which it is impossible for God to lie , we who have taken refuge may have powerful encouragement to hold fast to the hope set before us ,
58006019	which we have like an anchor of the soul , both firm and steadfast , and entering into the inside of the curtain ,
58006020	where Jesus , the forerunner for us , entered , because he became a high priest ˻ forever ˼ according to the order of Melchizedek .
58007001	For this Melchizedek , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham as he was returning from the slaughter of the kings and blessed him ,
58007002	to whom also Abraham apportioned a tenth of everything — in the first place , his name is translated “ king of righteousness , ” and then also “ king of Salem , ” that is , “ king of peace ” ;
58007003	without father , without mother , without genealogy , having neither beginning of days nor end of life , but resembling the Son of God — he remains a priest for all time .
58007004	But see how great this man was , to whom even Abraham the patriarch gave a tenth from the spoils !
58007005	And indeed those of the sons of Levi who receive the priesthood have a commandment to collect a tenth from the people according to the law , that is , from their brothers , although ˻ they are descended from Abraham ˼ .
58007006	But the one who did not trace his descent from them collected tithes from Abraham and blessed the one who had the promises .
58007007	Now without any dispute the inferior is blessed by the more prominent .
58007008	And in this case mortal men receive tithes , but in that case it is testified that he lives .
58007009	And , ˻ so to speak ˼ , even Levi , the one who receives tithes , has paid tithes through Abraham .
58007010	For he was still in the loins of his father when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	Thus if perfection was through the Levitical priesthood , for on the basis of it the people received the law , what further need is there for another priest to arise according to the order of Melchizedek and not said to be according to the order of Aaron ?
58007012	For when the priesthood changes , of necessity there is a change of the law also .
58007013	For the one about whom these things are spoken belongs to another tribe from which no one has officiated at the altar .
58007014	For it is evident that our Lord is a descendant of Judah , a tribe with reference to which Moses said nothing concerning priests .
58007015	And it is still more clear , if another priest according to the likeness of Melchizedek arises ,
58007016	who has become a priest not according to a law of physical requirement , but according to the power of an indestructible life .
58007017	For it is testified , “ You are a priest ˻ forever ˼ according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	For on the one hand a preceding commandment is set aside because of its weakness and uselessness
58007019	( for the law made nothing perfect ) , but on the other hand there is the introduction of a better hope through which we draw near to God .
58007020	And by as much as this was not without an oath ( for these on the one hand ˻ have become priests ˼ without an oath ,
58007021	but he with an oath by the one who said to him , “ The Lord has sworn and will not change his mind , ‘ You are a priest ˻ forever ˼ ’ ” ) ,
58007022	by so much more also Jesus has become the guarantee of a better covenant .
58007023	And indeed many ˻ have become ˼ priests , because they were prevented by death from continuing in office ,
58007024	but he , because he continues ˻ forever ˼ , holds the priesthood permanently .
58007025	Therefore also he is able to save completely those who draw near to God through him , because he always lives in order to intercede on their behalf .
58007026	For a high priest such as this indeed is fitting for us , holy , innocent , undefiled , separated from sinners , and having become exalted above the heavens ,
58007027	who does not ˻ need every day ˼ like the former high priests to offer up sacrifices for his own sins and then for the sins of the people , because he did this once for all when he offered up himself .
58007028	For the law appoints men as high priests who have weakness , but the statement of the oath , after the law , appoints a Son , who is made perfect ˻ forever ˼ .
58008001	Now this is the main point in what has been said : we have a high priest such as this , who sat down at the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in heaven ,
58008002	a minister of the sanctuary and of the true tabernacle which the Lord set up , not man .
58008003	For every high priest is appointed in order to offer both gifts and sacrifices ; therefore it was necessary for this one also to have something that he offers .
58008004	Now if he were on earth , he would not even be a priest , because there are those who offer the gifts according to the law ,
58008005	who serve a sketch and shadow of the heavenly things , just as Moses was warned when he was about to complete the tabernacle , for he says , “ See to it that you make everything according to the pattern which was shown to you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now he has attained a more excellent ministry , by as much as he is also mediator of a better covenant which has been enacted upon better promises .
58008007	For if that first covenant had been faultless , occasion would not have been sought for a second .
58008008	For in finding fault with them he says , “ Behold , days are coming , says the Lord , when I will complete a new covenant with the house of Israeland with the house of Judah ,
58008009	not like the covenant which I made with their fatherson the day I took hold of them by my handto lead them out of the land of Egypt , because they did not continue in my covenantand I disregarded them , says the Lord .
58008010	For this is the covenant that I will decree with the house of Israelafter those days , says the Lord : I am putting my laws in their mindsand I will write them on their hearts , and I will be ˻ their ˼ Godand they will be ˻ my ˼ people .
58008011	And they will not teach each one his fellow citizenand each one his brother , saying , ‘ Know the Lord , ’ because they will all know me , from the least of them to the greatest .
58008012	For I will be merciful toward their wrongdoings , and I will not remember their sins any longer . ”
58008013	In calling it new , he has declared the former to be old . Now what is becoming obsolete and growing old is near to disappearing .
58009001	Now even the first covenant had regulations for worship and the earthly sanctuary .
58009002	For a tent was prepared , the first one , in which were the lampstand and the table and the presentation of the loaves , which is called the holy place .
58009003	And after the second curtain was a tent called the holy of holies ,
58009004	containing the golden incense altar and the ark of the covenant covered on all sides with gold , in which were a golden jar containing the manna and the rod of Aaron that budded and the tablets of the covenant .
58009005	And above it were the cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy seat , about which it is not now possible to speak in detail .
58009006	Now these things having been prepared in this way , the priests enter into the first tent ˻ continually ˼ as they accomplish their service ,
58009007	but only the high priest enters into the second tent once a year , not without blood , which he offers on behalf of himself and the sins of the people committed in ignorance .
58009008	The Holy Spirit was making this clear , that the way into the holy place was not yet revealed , while the first tent was still in existence ,
58009009	which was a symbol for the present time , in which both the gifts and sacrifices which were offered were not able to perfect the worshiper with respect to the conscience ,
58009010	concerning instead only food and drink and different washings , regulations of outward things imposed until the time of setting things right .
58009011	But Christ has arrived as a high priest of the good things to come . Through the greater and more perfect tent not made by hands , that is , not of this creation ,
58009012	and not by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood , he entered once for all into the most holy place , obtaining eternal redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a young cow sprinkled on those who are defiled sanctify them for the ritual purity of the flesh ,
58009014	how much more will the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without blemish to God , cleanse our consciences from dead works to serve the living God ?
58009015	And because of this , he is the mediator of a new covenant , in order that , because a death has taken place for the redemption of transgressions committed during the first covenant , those who are the called may receive the promise of the eternal inheritance .
58009016	For where there is a will , it is a necessity for the death of the one who made the will to be established .
58009017	For a will is in force concerning those who are dead , since it is never in force when the one who made the will is alive .
58009018	Therefore not even the first covenant was ratified without blood .
58009019	For when every commandment had been spoken by Moses to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and goats with water and scarlet wool and hyssop and sprinkled both the scroll itself and all the people ,
58009020	saying , “ This is the blood of the covenant that God has commanded for you . ”
58009021	And likewise he sprinkled both the tabernacle and all the utensils of service with the blood .
58009022	Indeed , nearly everything is purified with blood according to the law , and apart from the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness .
58009023	Therefore it was necessary for the sketches of the things in heaven to be purified with these sacrifices , but the heavenly things themselves to be purified with better sacrifices than these .
58009024	For Christ did not enter into a sanctuary made by hands , a mere copy of the true one , but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God on our behalf ,
58009025	and not in order that he can offer himself many times , as the high priest enters into the sanctuary ˻ year by year ˼ with blood not his own ,
58009026	since it would have been necessary for him to suffer many times from the foundation of the world , but now he has appeared once at the end of the ages for the removal of sin by the sacrifice of himself .
58009027	And ˻ just as ˼ it is destined for people to die once , and after this , judgment ,
58009028	thus also Christ , having been offered once in order to bear the sins of many , will appear for the second time without reference to sin to those who eagerly await him for salvation .
58010001	For the law , possessing a shadow of the good things that are about to come , not the form of things itself , is never able ˻ year by year ˼ by means of the same sacrifices which they offer without interruption to make perfect those who draw near .
58010002	For otherwise , would they not have ceased to be offered , because the ones who worship , having been purified once and for all , would no longer have any consciousness of sins ?
58010003	But in them there is a reminder of sins ˻ year by year ˼ .
58010004	For it is impossible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	Therefore , when he came into the world , he said , “ Sacrifice and offering you did not want , but a body you prepared for me ;
58010006	you did not delight in whole burnt offerings and offerings for sins .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Behold , I have come — in the roll of the book it is written about me — to do your will , O God . ’
58010008	When he says above , “ Sacrifices and offerings and whole burnt offerings and offerings for sinyou did not want , nor did you delight in , ” which are offered according to the law ,
58010009	then he has said , “ Behold , I have come to do your will . ” He takes away the first in order to establish the second ,
58010010	by which will we are made holy through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
58010011	And every priest stands every day serving and offering the same sacrifices many times , which are never able to take away sins .
58010012	But this one , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for all time , sat down at the right hand of God ,
58010013	from now on waiting until his enemies are made a footstool for his feet .
58010014	For by one offering he has perfected for all time those who are made holy .
58010015	And the Holy Spirit also testifies to us , for after saying ,
58010016	“ This is the covenant that I will decree for themafter those days , says the Lord : I am putting my laws on their hearts , and I will write them on their minds . ”
58010017	He also says , “ Their sins and their lawless deeds I will never remember again . ”
58010018	Now where there is forgiveness of these , there is no longer an offering for sin .
58010019	Therefore , brothers , since we have confidence for the entrance into the sanctuary by the blood of Jesus ,
58010020	by the new and living way which he inaugurated for us through the curtain , that is , his flesh ,
58010021	and since we have a great priest over the house of God ,
58010022	let us approach with a true heart in the full assurance of faith , our hearts sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and our bodies washed with pure water .
58010023	Let us hold fast to the confession of our hope without wavering , for the one who promised is faithful .
58010024	And let us think about ˻ how to stir one another up to love ˼ and good works ,
58010025	not abandoning ˻ our meeting together ˼ , as is the habit of some , but encouraging each other , and by so much more as you see the day drawing near .
58010026	For if we keep on sinning deliberately after receiving the knowledge of the truth , there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins ,
58010027	but a certain fearful expectation of judgment and a fury of fire that is about to consume the adversaries .
58010028	Anyone who rejected the law of Moses dies without mercy on the testimony of two or three witnesses .
58010029	How much worse punishment do you think the person will be considered worthy of who treats with disdain the Son of God and who considers ordinary the blood of the covenant by which he was made holy and who insults the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	For we know the one who said , “ Vengeance is mine , I will repay , ” and again , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is a terrifying thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	But remember the former days in which , after you were enlightened , you endured a great struggle with sufferings ,
58010033	sometimes being publicly exposed both to insults and to afflictions , and sometimes becoming sharers with those who were treated in this way .
58010034	For you both sympathized with the prisoners and put up with the seizure of your belongings with joy because you knew that you yourselves had a better and permanent possession .
58010035	Therefore do not throw away your confidence , which has great reward .
58010036	For you have need of endurance , in order that after you have done the will of God , you may receive what was promised .
58010037	For yet “ a very , very little while , and the one who is coming will come and will not delay .
58010038	But my righteous one will live by faith , and if he shrinks back , my soul is not well pleased with him . ”
58010039	But we are not among those who shrink back to destruction , but among those who have faith to the preservation of our souls .
58011001	Now faith is the realization of what is hoped for , the proof of things not seen .
58011002	For by this the people of old were approved .
58011003	By faith we understand the worlds were created by the word of God , in order that what is seen did not come into existence from what is visible .
58011004	By faith Abel offered to God a greater sacrifice than Cain , by which he was approved that he was righteous , because God approved him for his gifts , and through it he still speaks , although he is dead .
58011005	By faith Enoch was taken up , so that he did not experience death , and he was not found , because God took him up . For before his removal , he had been approved ˻ as having been pleasing ˼ to God .
58011006	Now without faith it is impossible to please him , for the one who approaches God must believe that he exists and is a rewarder of those who seek him .
58011007	By faith Noah , having been warned about things not yet seen , out of reverence constructed an ark for the deliverance of his family , by which he pronounced sentence on the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes by faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham , when he was called , obeyed to go out to a place that he was going to receive for an inheritance , and he went out , not knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith he lived in the land of promise as a stranger , living in tents with Isaac and Jacob , the fellow heirs of the same promise .
58011010	For he was expecting the city that has foundations , whose architect and builder is God .
58011011	By faith , even though Sarah herself was barren , he received ˻ the ability to procreate ˼ even ˻ past the normal age ˼ , because he regarded the one who had promised to be faithful .
58011012	And therefore these were fathered from one man , and he being as good as dead , as the stars of heaven in number and like the innumerable sand by the shore of the sea .
58011013	These all died in faith without receiving the promises , but seeing them from a distance and welcoming them , and admitting that they were strangers and temporary residents on the earth .
58011014	For those who say such things make clear that they are seeking a homeland .
58011015	And if they had been remembering that land from which they had gone out , they would have had opportunity to return .
58011016	But now they aspire to a better land , that is , a heavenly one . Therefore God is not ashamed of them , to be called their God , for he has prepared for them a city .
58011017	By faith Abraham , when he was tested , offered Isaac , and the one who received the promises was ready to offer his one and only son ,
58011018	with reference to whom it was said , “ In Isaac your descendants will be named , ”
58011019	having reasoned that God was able even to raise him from the dead , from which he received him back also as a symbol .
58011020	By faith also Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things that were going to happen .
58011021	By faith Jacob , as he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph and worshiped , leaning on the top of his staff .
58011022	By faith Joseph , as he was dying , mentioned about the exodus of the sons of Israel and gave instructions about his bones .
58011023	By faith Moses , when he was born , was hidden for three months by his parents , because they saw the child was handsome , and they were not afraid of the edict of the king .
58011024	By faith Moses , when he was grown up , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter ,
58011025	choosing instead to be mistreated with the people of God rather than to experience the transitory enjoyment of sin ,
