58011026	considering ˻ reproach endured for the sake of Christ ˼ greater wealth than the treasures of Egypt , for he was looking to the reward .
58011027	By faith he left Egypt , not fearing the anger of the king , for he persevered as if he saw the invisible one .
58011028	By faith he kept the Passover and the sprinkling of blood , in order that the one who destroyed the firstborn would not touch them .
58011029	By faith they crossed the Red Sea as if on dry land ; the Egyptians , ˻ when they made the attempt ˼ , were drowned .
58011030	By faith the walls of Jericho fell down after they had been marched around for seven days .
58011031	By faith Rahab the prostitute did not perish with those who were disobedient , because she welcomed the spies in peace .
58011032	And what more shall I say ? For time would fail me to tell about Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , and Samuel and the prophets ,
58011033	who through faith conquered kingdoms , accomplished justice , obtained what was promised , shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	extinguished the effectiveness of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , were made strong from weakness , became mighty in battle , put to flight enemy battle lines .
58011035	Women received back their dead by resurrection . But others were tortured , not accepting release , in order that they might gain a better resurrection .
58011036	And others ˻ experienced mocking and flogging ˼ , and in addition bonds and imprisonment .
58011037	They were stoned , they were sawed in two , they died by murder with a sword , they wandered about in sheepskins , in goatskins , impoverished , afflicted , mistreated ,
58011038	of whom the world was not worthy , wandering about on deserts and mountains and in caves and in holes in the ground .
58011039	And all these , although they were approved through their faith , did not receive what was promised ,
58011040	because God had provided something better for us , so that they would not be made perfect without us .
58012001	Therefore , since we also have such a great cloud of witnesses surrounding us , putting aside every weight and ˻ the sin that so easily ensnares us ˼ , let us run with patient endurance the race that has been set before us ,
58012002	fixing our eyes on Jesus , the originator and perfecter of faith , who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , disregarding the shame , and has sat down at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	For consider the one who endured such hostility against himself by sinners , so that you will not grow weary in your souls and give up .
58012004	You have not yet resisted to the point of shedding your blood as you struggle against sin .
58012005	And have you completely forgotten the exhortation which instructs you as sons ? “ My son , do not make light of the Lord’s discipline , or give up when you are corrected by him .
58012006	For the Lord disciplines the one whom he loves , and punishes every son whom he accepts . ”
58012007	Endure it for discipline . God is dealing with you as sons . For what son is there whom a father does not discipline ?
58012008	But if you are without discipline , in which all legitimate sons have become participants , then you are illegitimate and not sons .
58012009	Furthermore , we have had ˻ our earthly fathers ˼ who disciplined us , and we respected them . Will we not much rather subject ourselves to the Father of spirits and live ?
58012010	For they disciplined us for a few days according to what seemed appropriate to them , but he does so for our benefit , in order that we can have a share in his holiness .
58012011	Now all discipline seems for the moment not to be joyful but painful , but later it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness for those who are trained by it .
58012012	Therefore strengthen your slackened hands and your weakened knees ,
58012013	and make straight paths for your feet , so that what is lame will not be dislocated , but rather be healed .
58012014	Pursue peace with everyone , and holiness , without which no one will see the Lord .
58012015	Take care that no one falls short of the grace of God ; that no one growing up like a root of bitterness causes trouble , and by it many become defiled ;
58012016	that no one be a sexually immoral or totally worldly person like Esau , who for one meal traded his own birthright .
58012017	For you know that also afterwards , when he wanted to inherit the blessing , he was rejected , because he did not find an occasion for repentence , although he sought it with tears .
58012018	For you have not come to something that can be touched , and to a burning fire , and to darkness , and to gloom , and to a whirlwind ,
58012019	and to the noise of a trumpet , and to the sound of words which those who heard begged that not another word be spoken to them .
58012020	For they could not endure what was commanded : “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned . ”
58012021	And the spectacle was so terrifying that Moses said , “ I am terrified and trembling . ”
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion , and to the city of the living God , to the heavenly Jerusalem , and to tens of thousands of angels , to the festal gathering
58012023	and assembly of the firstborn who are enrolled in heaven , and to God the judge of all , and to the spirits of righteous people made perfect ,
58012024	and to Jesus , the mediator of a new covenant , and ˻ to the sprinkled blood ˼ that speaks better than Abel’s does .
58012025	Watch out that you do not refuse the one who is speaking ! For if those did not escape when they refused the one who warned them on earth , much less will we escape , if we reject the one who warns from heaven ,
58012026	whose voice shook the earth at that time , but now he has promised , saying , “ Yet once more I will shake not only the earth but also heaven . ”
58012027	Now the phrase “ yet once more ” indicates the removal of what is shaken , namely , things that have been created , in order that the things that are not shaken may remain .
58012028	Therefore , since we are receiving an unshakable kingdom , let us be thankful , through which let us serve God acceptably , with awe and reverence .
58012029	For indeed our God is a consuming fire .
58013001	Brotherly love must continue .
58013002	Do not neglect hospitality , because through this some have received angels as guests without knowing it .
58013003	Remember the prisoners , as though you were fellow-prisoners ; remember the mistreated , as thoughyou yourselves also are being mistreated in the body .
58013004	Marriage must be held in honor by all , and the marriage bed be undefiled , because God will judge sexually immoral people and adulterers .
58013005	Your lifestyle must be free from the love of money , being content with what you have . For he himself has said , “ I will never desert you , and I will never abandon you . ”
58013006	So then , we can say with confidence , “ The Lord is my helper , and I will not be afraid . What will man do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your leaders , who spoke the word of God to you ; ˻ considering the outcome of their way of life ˼ , imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and ˻ forever ˼ .
58013009	Do not be carried away by various and strange teachings , for it is good for the heart to be strengthened by grace , not by foods by which those who participate have not benefited .
58013010	We have an altar from which those who serve in the tabernacle do not have the right to eat .
58013011	For the bodies of those animals whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sins are burned up outside the camp .
58013012	Therefore Jesus also suffered outside the gate , in order that he might sanctify the people by his own blood .
58013013	So we must go out to him outside the camp , bearing his reproach .
58013014	For here we do not have a permanent city , but we seek the city that is to come .
58013015	Therefore through him let us offer up a sacrifice of praise ˻ continually ˼ to God , that is , the fruit of lips that confess his name .
58013016	And do not neglect doing good and generosity , for God is pleased with such sacrifices .
58013017	Obey your leaders and submit to them , for they keep watch over your souls as those who will give an account , so that they can do this with joy and not with groaning , for this would be unprofitable for you .
58013018	Pray for us , for we are convinced that we have a good conscience , and want to conduct ourselves commendably in every way .
58013019	And I especially urge you to do this , so that I may be restored to you more quickly .
58013020	Now may the God of peace , who brought up from the dead our Lord Jesus , the great shepherd of the sheep , by the blood of the eternal covenant ,
58013021	equip you with every good thing to do his will , carrying out in us what is pleasing before him through Jesus Christ , to whom be the glory ˻ forever and ever ˼ . Amen .
58013022	Now I urge you , brothers , bear with my word of exhortation , for indeed I have written to you ˻ briefly ˼ .
58013023	Know that our brother Timothy has been released , with whom I will see you , if he comes quickly enough .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all the saints . Those from Italy greet you .
58013025	Grace be with all of you .
59001001	James , a slave of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes in the dispersion . Greetings !
59001002	Consider it all joy , my brothers , whenever you encounter various trials ,
59001003	because you know that the testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	And let endurance have its perfect effect , so that you may be mature and complete , lacking in nothing .
59001005	Now if any of you lacks wisdom , let him ask for it from God , who gives to all without reservation and not reproaching , and it will be given to him .
59001006	But let him ask for it in faith , without any doubting , for the one who doubts is like the surf of the sea , driven by the wind and tossed about .
59001007	For that person must not suppose that he will receive anything from the Lord ;
59001008	he is a double-minded man , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	Now let the brother of humble circumstances boast in his high position ,
59001010	but the rich person in his humiliation , because he will pass away like a flower of the grass .
59001011	For the sun rises with its burning heat and dries up the grass , and its flower falls off , and the beauty of its appearance is lost . So also the rich person in his pursuits will wither away .
59001012	Blessed is the person who endures testing , because when he is approved he will receive the crown of life that he has promised to those who love him .
59001013	No one who is being tempted should say , “ I am being tempted by God , ” for God ˻ cannot be tempted ˼ by evil , and he himself tempts no one .
59001014	But each one is tempted when he is dragged away and enticed by his own desires .
59001015	Then desire , after it has conceived , gives birth to sin , and sin , when it is brought to completion , gives birth to death .
59001016	Do not be deceived , my dear brothers .
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , coming down from the Father of lights , with whom there is no variation or shadow of change .
59001018	By his will he gave birth to us through the message of truth , so that we should be a kind of first fruits of his creatures .
59001019	Understand this , my dear brothers : every person must be quick to hear , slow to speak , slow to anger ,
59001020	for human anger does not accomplish the righteousness of God .
59001021	Therefore , putting aside all moral uncleanness and wicked excess , welcome with humility the implanted message which is able to save your souls .
59001022	But be doers of the message and not only hearers , deceiving yourselves ,
59001023	because if anyone is a hearer of the message and not a doer , this one is like someone staring at ˻ his own face ˼ in a mirror ,
59001024	for he looks at himself and goes away and immediately forgets what sort of person he was .
59001025	But the one who looks into the perfect law of liberty and continues to do it , not being a forgetful hearer but a doer who acts , this one will be blessed ˻ in what he does ˼ .
59001026	If anyone thinks he is religious , although he does not bridle his tongue but deceives his heart , this person’s religion is worthless .
59001027	Pure and undefiled religion in the sight of our God and Father is this : to look after orphans and widows in their affliction , and to keep oneself unstained by the world .
59002001	My brothers , do not hold your faith in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ with partiality .
59002002	For if someone enters into your assembly in fine clothing with a gold ring on his finger , and a poor person in filthy clothing also enters ,
59002003	and you look favorably on the one wearing the fine clothing and you say , “ Be seated here in a good place , ” and to the poor person you say , “ You stand there or be seated by my footstool , ”
59002004	have you not made distinctions among yourselves and become judges with evil thoughts ?
59002005	Listen , my dear brothers ! Did not God choose the poor of the world to be rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom that he has promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor ! Are not the rich exploiting you and they themselves dragging you into the courts ?
59002007	Do they themselves not blaspheme the good name ˻ of the one to whom you belong ˼ ?
59002008	However , if you carry out the royal law according to the scripture , “ You shall love your neighbor as yourself , ” you are doing well .
59002009	But if you show partiality , you commit sin , and thus are convicted by the law as transgressors .
59002010	For whoever keeps the whole law but stumbles in one point only has become guilty of all of it .
59002011	For the one who said “ Do not commit adultery ” also said “ Do not murder . ” Now if you do not commit adultery but you do murder , you have become a transgressor of the law .
59002012	Thus speak and thus act as those who are going to be judged by the law of liberty .
59002013	For judgment is merciless to the one who has not practiced mercy . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	What is the benefit , my brothers , if someone says that he has faith but does not have works ? That faith is not able to save him , is it ?
59002015	If a brother or a sister is poorly clothed and lacking food for the day ,
59002016	and one of you should say to them , “ Go in peace , keep warm and ˻ eat well ˼ , ” but does not give them what is necessary for the body , what is the benefit ?
59002017	Thus also faith , if it does not have works , is dead by itself .
59002018	But someone will say , “ You have faith and I have works . ” Show me your faith apart from your works , and I will show you my faith by my works .
59002019	You believe that God is one ; you do well . Even the demons believe , and shudder !
59002020	But do you want to know , O foolish person , that faith apart from works is useless ?
59002021	Was not Abraham our father justified by works when he offered up his son Isaac on the altar ?
59002022	You see that faith was working together with his works , and by the works the faith was perfected .
59002023	And the scripture was fulfilled that says , “ And Abraham believed God , and it was credited to him for righteousness , ” and he was called God’s friend .
59002024	You see that a person is justified by works and not by faith alone .
59002025	And likewise was not Rahab the prostitute also justified by works when she welcomed the messengers and sent them out by a different route ?
59002026	For just as the body without the spirit is dead , so also faith without works is dead .
59003001	Not many should become teachers , my brothers , because you know that we will receive a greater judgment .
59003002	For we all stumble in many ways . If anyone does not stumble in what he says , he is a perfect individual , able to hold in check his whole body also .
59003003	And if we put bits in the mouths of horses so that they obey us , we also guide their whole bodies .
59003004	Behold also ships : although they are so large and are driven by strong winds , they are guided by a very small rudder wherever the inclination of the pilot wishes .
59003005	So also the tongue is a small member of the body and boasts great things . Behold how small a fire sets ablaze how great a forest !
59003006	And the tongue is a fire ! The world of unrighteousness , the tongue , is set among our members , defiling the whole body and setting on fire ˻ the course of human existence ˼ , being set on fire by hell .
59003007	For every species of animals and birds , of reptiles and sea creatures , is being tamed and has been tamed by the human species ,
59003008	but no human being is able to tame the tongue . It is a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless the Lord and Father , and with it we curse people who are made in the likeness of God .
59003010	From the same mouth come blessing and cursing . My brothers , these things ought not to be so !
59003011	A spring does not pour forth from the same opening fresh and bitter water , does it ?
59003012	A fig tree is not able , my brothers , to produce olives , or a grapevine figs . Neither can a saltwater spring produce fresh water .
59003013	Who is wise and understanding among you ? Let him show by his good behavior his works , with the humility of wisdom .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and selfish ambition in your hearts , do not boast and tell lies against the truth .
59003015	This is not the wisdom that comes down from above , but is earthly , unspiritual , demonic .
59003016	For where there is jealousy and selfish ambition , there is disorder and every evil practice .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is first pure , then peaceful , gentle , obedient , full of mercy and good fruits , nonjudgmental , without hypocrisy ,
59003018	And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace among those who make peace .
59004001	From where are conflicts and from where are quarrels among you ? Is it not from this , from your pleasures that wage war among your members ?
59004002	You desire and do not have ; you murder and are filled with envy , and are not able to obtain ; you fight and quarrel . You do not have because you do not ask .
59004003	You ask and do not receive , because you ask with wrong motives , in order that you may spend it on your pleasures .
59004004	Adulterous people ! Do you not know that friendship with the world is enmity with God ? Therefore whoever wants to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of God .
59004005	Or do you think that in vain the scripture says , “ The spirit which he caused to dwell in us desires jealously ” ?
59004006	But he gives greater grace . Therefore it says , “ God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	Therefore subject yourselves to God . But resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God , and he will draw near to you . Cleanse your hands , you sinners , and purify your hearts , you double-minded !
59004009	Lament and mourn and weep ! Let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to gloominess .
59004010	Humble yourselves before the Lord , and he will exalt you .
59004011	Do not speak evil of one another , brothers . The one who speaks evil of a brother or judges his brother speaks evil of the law and judges the law . But if you judge the law , you are not a doer of the law but a judge of the law .
59004012	There is one lawgiver and judge who is able to save and to destroy . But who are you to judge your neighbor ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow we will travel to such and such a city and spend a year there , and carry on business and make a profit , ”
59004014	you who do not know ˻ what will happen tomorrow ˼ , ˻ what your life will be like ˼ . For you are a smoky vapor that appears for a short time and then disappears .
59004015	Instead you should say , “ If the Lord wills , we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you boast in your arrogance . All such boasting is evil .
59004017	Therefore , to the one who knows to do good and does not do it , to him it is sin .
59005001	Come now , you rich people , weep and cry aloud over the miseries that are coming upon you !
59005002	Your wealth has rotted , and your clothing has become moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and silver have become corroded , and their corrosion will be a witness against you , and it will consume your flesh like fire . You have stored up treasure in the last days .
59005004	Behold , the wages that were held back by you from the workers who reap your fields cry out , and the cries of the reapers have come to the ears of the Lord of hosts .
59005005	You have lived self-indulgently on the earth and have lived luxuriously . You have fattened your hearts in the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned , you have murdered the righteous person ; he does not resist you .
59005007	Therefore be patient , brothers , until the coming of the Lord . Behold , the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the soil , being patient concerning it until it receives the early and late rains .
59005008	You also be patient . Strengthen your hearts , because the coming of the Lord is near .
59005009	Brothers , do not complain against one another , in order that you may not be judged . Behold , the judge stands before the doors !
59005010	Brothers , take as an example of perseverence and endurance the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord .
59005011	Behold , we consider blessed those who have endured . You have heard about the patient endurance of Job , and you saw the outcome from the Lord , that the Lord is compassionate and merciful .
59005012	Now above all , my brothers , do not swear either by heaven or by earth or by any other oath , but let your yes be yes and your no , no , in order that you may not fall under judgment .
59005013	Is anyone among you suffering misfortune ? He should pray . Is anyone cheerful ? He should sing praise .
59005014	Is anyone among you sick ? He should summon the elders of the church and they should pray over him , anointing him with olive oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	And the prayer of faith will save the one who is sick , and the Lord will raise him up , and if he has committed sins ˻ he will be forgiven ˼ .
59005016	Therefore confess your sins to one another , and pray for one another , so that you may be healed . The effective prayer of a righteous person accomplishes much .
59005017	Elijah was a human being with the same nature as us , and ˻ he prayed fervently ˼ for it not to rain , and it did not rain on the land for three years and six months .
59005018	And he prayed again , and the sky gave rain and the earth produced its fruit .
59005019	My brothers , if anyone among you should wander away from the truth and someone turns him back ,
59005020	he should know that the one who turns a sinner back from the error of his way will save that person’s soul from death , and will cover over a great number of sins .
60001001	Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the chosen who are residing temporarily in the dispersion in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
60001002	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , by the sanctification of the Spirit , for obedience and for sprinkling with the blood of Jesus Christ . May grace and peace be multiplied to you .
60001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who according to his great mercy has caused us to be born again to a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
60001004	into an inheritance imperishable and undefiled and unfading , reserved in heaven for you
60001005	who are being protected by the power of God through faith for a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time ,
60001006	in which you rejoice greatly , although now for a short time , if it is necessary , you are distressed by various trials ,
60001007	so that the genuineness of your faith , more valuable than gold that is passing away , but is tested by fire , may be found to result in praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ ,
60001008	whom , although you have not seen , you love ; in whom now you believe , although you do not see him , and you rejoice greatly with joy inexpressible and full of glory ,
60001009	obtaining the goal of your faith , the salvation of your souls .
60001010	Concerning this salvation , the prophets who prophesied about the grace meant for you sought and made careful inquiry ,
60001011	investigating for what person or which time the Spirit of Christ in them was indicating when he testified beforehand to the sufferings with reference to Christ and the glories after these things ,
60001012	to whom it was revealed that they were serving not themselves but you with reference to the same things which now have been announced to you through those who proclaimed the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven , ˻ things into which ˼ angels desire to look .
60001013	Therefore , ˻ when you have prepared your minds for action ˼ by being self-controlled , put your hope completely in the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ .
60001014	As obedient children , do not be conformed to the former desires you used to conform to in your ignorance ,
60001015	but as the one who called you is holy , you yourselves be holy in all your conduct ,
60001016	for it is written , “ You will be holy , because I am holy . ”
60001017	And if you call on himas Father who judges impartially according to each one’s work , conduct yourselves with fear during the time of your temporary residence ,
60001018	because you know that you were redeemed from your futile way of life inherited from your ancestors not with perishable things like silver or gold ,
60001019	but with the precious blood of Christ , like that of an umblemished and spotless lamb
60001020	who was foreknown before the foundation of the world , but has been revealed in these last times for you
60001021	who through him are believing in God , who raised him from the dead and gave him glory , so that your faith and hope are in God .
60001022	Having purified your souls by your obedience to the truth for sincere brotherly love , love one another fervently from a pure heart ,
60001023	because you have been born again , not from perishable seed but imperishable , through the living and enduring word of God .
60001024	For “ all flesh is like grass , and all its glory like the flower of the grass . The grass withers and the flower falls off ,
60001025	but the word of the Lord endures ˻ forever ˼ . ” And this is the word that has been proclaimed to you .
60002001	Therefore , ridding yourselves of all malice and all deceit and hypocrisy and envy and all slander ,
60002002	like newborn infants long for the unadulterated spiritual milk , so that by it you may grow up to salvation ,
60002003	if you have tasted that the Lord is kind ,
60002004	to whom you are drawing near , a living stone rejected by men but chosen and precious in the sight of God .
60002005	And you yourselves , as living stones , are being built up as a spiritual house for a holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	For it stands in scripture , “ Behold , I am laying in Zion a stone , a chosen and precious cornerstone , and the one who believes in him will never be put to shame . ”
60002007	Therefore the honor is for you who believe , but for those who refuse to believe , “ The stone that the builders rejected , this one has become ˻ the cornerstone ˼ , ”
60002008	and “ A stone of stumbling and a rock of offense , ” who stumble because they disobey the word to which also they were consigned .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people for God’s possession , so that you may proclaim the virtues of the one who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light ,
60002010	who once were not a people , but now are the people of God , the ones who were not shown mercy , but now are shown mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , I urge you as foreigners and temporary residents to abstain from fleshly desires which wage war against your soul ,
60002012	maintaining your good conduct among the Gentiles , so that in the things in which they slander you as evildoers , by seeing your good deeds they may glorify God on the day of visitation .
60002013	Subject yourselves to every human authority for the sake of the Lord , whether to a king as having supreme authority ,
60002014	or to governors as those sent out by him for the punishment of those who do evil and the praise of those who do good .
60002015	For the will of God is as follows : by doing good to silence the ignorance of foolish people .
60002016	Live as free persons , and not using your freedom as a covering for evil , but as slaves of God .
60002017	Honor all people , love the community of believers , fear God , honor the king .
60002018	Domestic slaves , be subject to your masters with all respect , not only to those who are good and gentle , but also to those who are unjust .
60002019	For this finds favor , if because of consciousness of God someone endures sorrows while suffering unjustly .
60002020	For what credit is it if , when you sin and are beaten for it , you endure ? But if you endure when you do good and suffer for it , this finds favor with God .
60002021	For to this you were called , because Christ also suffered for you , leaving you an example , so that you should follow in his footsteps ,
60002022	who did not commit sin , nor was deceit found in his mouth ,
60002023	who when he was reviled , did not revile in return ; when suffering , he did not threaten , but entrusted himself to the one who judges justly ,
60002024	who himself bore our sins in his body on the tree , so that we may die to sins and live to righteousness , by whose wounds you were healed .
60002025	For you were going astray like sheep , but you have turned back now to the shepherd and guardian of your souls .
60003001	In the same way , wives , be subject to your own husbands , so that even if some are disobedient to the word , they may be won over without a word by the conduct of their wives ,
60003002	when they see your respectful , pure conduct .
60003003	Let your adornment not be the external kind , braiding hair and putting on gold jewelry or putting on fine clothing ,
60003004	but the hidden person of the heart , with the imperishable quality of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is highly valuable in the sight of God .
60003005	For in the same way formerly the holy women also , who hoped in God , used to adorn themselves by being subject to their own husbands ,
60003006	like Sarah obeyed Abraham , calling him lord , whose children you have become when you do good and are not frightened with respect to any terror .
60003007	Husbands , in the same way live with your wives˻ knowledgeably ˼ , as with the weaker female vessel , showing them honor as fellow heirs also of the grace of life , so that your prayers will not be hindered .
60003008	And finally , all of you be harmonious , sympathetic , showing mutual affection , compassionate , humble ,
60003009	not repaying evil for evil or insult for insult , but on the other hand blessing others , because for this reason you were called , so that you could inherit a blessing .
60003010	For “ The one who wants to love lifeand see good daysmust keep his tongue from eviland his lips must not speak deceit .
60003011	And he must turn away from evil and do good ; he must seek peace and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are on the righteous , and his ears are open to their prayer . But the face of the Lord is against those who do evil .
60003013	And who is the one who will harm you if you are a zealous adherent for what is good ?
60003014	But even if you might suffer for the sake of righteousness , you are blessed . And do not be afraid of their intimidation or be disturbed ,
60003015	but set Christ apart as Lord in your hearts , always ready to make a defense to anyone who asks you for an accounting concerning the hope that is in you .
60003016	But do so with courtesy and respect , having a good conscience , so that in the things in which you are slandered , the ones who malign your good conduct in Christ may be put to shame .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good , ˻ if God wills it ˼ , than for doing evil .
60003018	For Christ also suffered once for sins , the just for the unjust , in order that he could bring you to God , being put to death in the flesh , but made alive in the spirit ,
60003019	in which also he went and proclaimed to the spirits in prison ,
60003020	who were formerly disobedient , when the patience of God waited in the days of Noah , while an ark was being constructed , in which a few — that is , eight souls — were rescued through water .
60003021	And also , corresponding to this , baptism now saves you , not the removal of dirt from the flesh , but an appeal to God for a good conscience through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who is at the right hand of God , having gone into heaven , with angels and authorities and powers having been subjected to him .
60004001	Therefore , because Christ suffered in the flesh , you also equip yourselves with the same way of thinking , because the one who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin ,
60004002	in order to live the remaining time in the flesh no longer for human desires , but for the will of God .
60004003	For the time that has passed was sufficient ˻ to do what the Gentiles desire to do ˼ , having lived in licentiousness , evil desires , drunkenness , carousing , drinking parties , and wanton idolatries ,
60004004	with respect to which they are surprised when you do not run with them into the same flood of dissipation , and so they revile you .
60004005	They will give an account to the one who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	Because for this reason also the gospel was preached to those who are dead , so that they were judged ˻ by human standards ˼ in the flesh , but they may live in the spirit ˻ by God’s standards ˼ .
60004007	Now the end of all things draws near . Therefore be self-controlled and sober-minded for your prayers .
60004008	Above all , keep your love for one another constant , because love covers a large number of sins .
60004009	Be hospitable to one another without complaining .
60004010	Just as each one has received a gift , use it for serving one another , as good stewards of the varied grace of God .
60004011	If anyone speaks , let it be as the oracles of God ; if anyone serves , let it be as by the strength that God provides , so that in all things God will be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom is the glory and the power ˻ forever and ever ˼ . Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , do not be surprised at the fiery ordeal among you , when it takes place to test you , as ifsomething strange were happening to you .
60004013	But to the degree that you share in the sufferings of Christ , rejoice , so that also at the revelation of his glory you may rejoice and be glad .
60004014	If you are reviled on account of the name of Christ , you are blessed , because the Spirit of glory and of God rests on you .
60004015	By all means do not let anyone of you suffer as a murderer or a thief or an evildoer or as a meddler .
60004016	But if someone suffers as a Christian , he must not be ashamed , but must glorify God with this name .
60004017	For it is the time for the judgment to begin out from the household of God . But if it begins out from us first , what will be the outcome for those who are disobedient to the gospel of God ?
60004018	And if the righteous are saved with difficulty , ˻ what will become of the ungodly and the sinner ˼ ?
60004019	So then also those who suffer according to the will of God must entrust their souls to a faithful Creator in doing good .
60005001	Therefore I , your fellow elder and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a sharer of the glory that is going to be revealed , exhort the elders among you :
60005002	shepherd the flock of God among you , exercising oversight not by compulsion but willingly , in accordance with God , and not greedily but eagerly ,
60005003	and not as lording it over ˻ those under your care ˼ , but being examples for the flock .
60005004	And when the chief Shepherd appears , you will receive the unfading crown of glory .
60005005	In the same way , younger men , be subject to the elders , and all of you clothe yourselves with humility toward one another , because God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble .
60005006	Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , so that he may exalt you at the right time ,
60005007	casting all your cares on him , because ˻ he cares ˼ for you .
60005008	Be sober ; be on the alert . Your adversary the devil walks around like a roaring lion , looking for someone to devour .
60005009	˻ Resist him ˼ , steadfast in your faith , because you know the same kinds of sufferings are being accomplished by your community of believers in the world .
60005010	And the God of all grace , who called you to his eternal glory in Christ Jesus , after you have suffered for a short time , will himself restore , confirm , strengthen , and establish you .
60005011	To him be the power ˻ forever ˼ . Amen .
60005012	Through Silvanus , the faithful brother ( as I consider him ) , I have written to you ˻ briefly ˼ to encourage you and to attest that this is the true grace of God . Stand firm in it .
60005013	She who is in Babylon , chosen the same as you , greets you , and so does my son Mark .
60005014	Greet one another with a loving kiss . Peace to all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	Simeon Peter , a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who have obtained a faith equal in value to ours by the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001002	May grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord ,
61001003	because his divine power has bestowed on us all thingsthat are necessary for life and godliness , through the knowledge of the one who called us by his own glory and excellence of character ,
61001004	through which things he has bestowed on us his precious and very great promises , so that through these you may become sharers of the divine nature after escaping from the corruption that is in the world because of evil desire ,
61001005	and for this same reason , and by applying all diligence , supply with your faith excellence of character , and with excellence of character , knowledge ,
61001006	and with knowledge , self-control , and with self-control , patient endurance , and with patient endurance , godliness ,
61001007	and with godliness , brotherly love , and with brotherly love , love .
61001008	For if these things are yours and are increasing , this does not make you useless or unproductive in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For the one for whom these thingsare not present is blind , being nearsighted , ˻ having forgotten the cleansing ˼ of his former sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers , be zealous even more to make your calling and election secure , because if you do these things , you will never ever stumble .
61001011	For in this way entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ will be richly supplied for you .
61001012	Therefore I intend to remind you continually concerning these things , although you know them and are established in the truth that you have .
61001013	But I consider it right , for as long as I am in this habitation , to stir you up by a reminder ,
61001014	because I know that the removal of my habitation is imminent , as indeed our Lord Jesus Christ made clear to me .
61001015	And I will also make every effort that you are able at any time , after my departure , ˻ to recall these things to mind ˼ .
61001016	For we did not make known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ by following ingeniously concocted myths , but by being eyewitnesses of that one’s majesty .
61001017	For he received honor and glory from God the Father when a voice such as this was brought to him by the Majestic Glory , “ This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . ”
61001018	And we ourselves heard this voice brought from heaven when we were with him on the holy mountain ,
61001019	and we possess as more reliable the prophetic word , to which you do well if you pay attention to it as to a lamp shining in a dark place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts ,
61001020	recognizing this above all , that every prophecy of scripture does not come about from one’s own interpretation ,
61001021	for no prophecy was ever produced by the will of man , but men carried along by the Holy Spirit spoke from God .
61002001	But there were also false prophets among the people , as there will be false teachers among you also , who will bring in ˻ destructive heresies ˼ , even denying the Master who bought them , thus bringing on themselves swift destruction .
61002002	And many will follow their licentious ways , because of whom the way of truth will be reviled .
61002003	And in greediness they will exploit you with false words , whose condemnation from long ago is not idle , and their destruction is not asleep .
61002004	For if God did not spare the angels who sinned , but held them captive in Tartarus with chains of darkness and handed them over to be kept for judgment ,
61002005	and did not spare the ancient world , but preserved Noah , a proclaimer of righteousness , ˻ and seven others ˼ when he brought a flood on the world of the ungodly ,
61002006	and condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah to destruction , reducing them to ashes , having appointed themas an example for those who are going to be ungodly ,
61002007	and rescued righteous Lot , worn down by the way of life of lawless persons in licentiousness
61002008	( for that righteous man , as he lived among them day after day , was tormenting his righteous soul by the lawless deeds he was seeing and hearing ) ,
61002009	then the Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials and to reserve the unrighteous to be punished at the day of judgment ,
61002010	and especially those who go after the flesh in defiling lust and who despise authority . Bold and arrogant , they do not tremble in awe as they blaspheme majestic beings ,
61002011	whereas angels , who are greater in strength and power , do not bring against them a demeaning judgment from the Lord .
61002012	But these persons , like irrational animals born only with natural instincts for capture and killing , blaspheming ˻ about things ˼ they do not understand , in their destruction will also be destroyed ,
61002013	being harmed as the wages of unrighteousness . Considering reveling in the daytime a pleasure , they are stains and blemishes , carousing in their deceitful pleasures when they feast together with you ,
61002014	having eyes full of desire for an adulteress and unceasing from sin , enticing unstable persons , and having hearts trained for greediness . Accursed children !
61002015	By leaving the straight path , they have gone astray , because they followed the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ,
61002016	but received a rebuke for his own lawlessness : a speechless donkey , speaking with a human voice , restrained ˻ the prophet’s madness ˼ .
61002017	These people are waterless springs and mists driven by a hurricane , for whom the gloom of darkness has been reserved .
61002018	˻ For by speaking high-sounding but empty words ˼ , they entice with desires of the flesh and with licentiousness those who are scarcely escaping from those who live in error ,
61002019	promising them freedom although they themselves are slaves of depravity . For to whatever someone succumbs , by this he is enslaved .
61002020	For if , after they have escaped from the defilements of the world through the knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , and they are again entangled in these thingsand succumb to them , the last state has become worse for them than the first .
61002021	For it would have been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness than having known it , to turn back from the holy commandment that had been delivered to them .
61002022	The statement of the true proverb has happened to them , “ A dog returns to its own vomit , ” and “ A sow , after washing herself , returns to wallowing in the mud . ”
61003001	Dear friends , this is already the second letter I am writing to you , in both of which I am attempting to stir up your sincere mind by a reminder ,
61003002	to remember the words proclaimed beforehand by the holy prophets and the commandment of the Lord and Savior through your apostles ,
61003003	above all knowing this , that in the last days scoffers will come with scoffing , following according to their own desires
61003004	and saying , “ Where is the promise of his coming ? For ˻ ever since ˼ the fathers fell asleep , all things have continued just as they have been from the beginning of creation . ”
61003005	For when they maintain this , it escapes their notice that the heavens existed long ago and the earth held together out of water and through water by the word of God ,
61003006	by means of which things the world that existed at that time was destroyed by being inundated with water .
61003007	But by the same word the present heavens and earth are reserved for fire , being kept for the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly people .
61003008	Now , dear friends , do not let this one thing escape your notice , that one day with the Lord is like a thousand years , and a thousand years is like one day .
61003009	The Lord is not delaying the promise , as some consider slowness , but is being patient toward you , because he does not want any to perish , but all to come to repentence .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief , in which the heavens will disappear with a rushing noise , and the celestial bodies will be destroyed by being burned up , and the earth and the deeds done on it will be disclosed .
61003011	Because all these things are being destroyed in this way , what sort of people must you be in holy behavior and godliness ,
61003012	while waiting for and hastening the coming of the day of God , because of which the heavens will be destroyed by being burned up and the celestial bodies will melt as they are consumed by heat !
61003013	But according to his promise , we are waiting for new heavens and a new earth in which righteousness resides .
61003014	Therefore , dear friends , because you are waiting for these things , make every effort to be found at peace , spotless and unblemished in him .
61003015	And regard the patience of our Lord as salvation , just as also our dear brother Paul wrote to you , according to the wisdom that was given to him ,
61003016	as he does also in all his letters , speaking in them about these things , in which there are some things hard to understand , which the ignorant and unstable distort to their own destruction , as they also do the rest of the scriptures .
61003017	Therefore , dear friends , because you know this beforehand , guard yourselves so that you do not lose your own safe position because you have been led away by the error of lawless persons .
61003018	But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be the glory , both now and to the day of eternity . Amen .
62001001	What was from the beginning , what we have heard , what we have seen with our eyes , what we have looked at and our hands have touched , concerning the word of life —
62001002	and the life was revealed , and we have seen and testify and announce to you the eternal life which was with the Father and was revealed to us —
62001003	what we have seen and heard , we announce to you also , in order that you also may have fellowship with us , and indeed our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ .
62001004	And these things we write , in order that our joy may be complete .
62001005	And this is the message which we have heard from him and announce to you , that God is light and there is no darkness in him at all .
62001006	If we say that we have fellowship with him and walk in the darkness , we lie and do not practice the truth .
62001007	But if we walk in the light as he is in the light , we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we say that we do not have sin , we deceive ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62001009	If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just , so that he will forgive us our sins and will cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , I am writing these things to you in order that you may not sin . And if anyone sins , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous one ,
62002002	and he is the propitiation for our sins , and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
62002003	And by this we know that we have come to know him , if we keep his commandments .
62002004	The one who says “ I have come to know him , ” and does not keep his commandments is a liar , and the truth is not in this person .
62002005	But whoever keeps his word , truly in this person the love of God has been perfected . By this we know that we are in him .
62002006	The one who says that he resides in him ought also to walk in this way : just as that one walked .
62002007	Dear friends , I am not writing a new commandment to you , but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning . The old commandment is the message which you have heard .
62002008	Again , I am writing a new commandment to you , which is true in him and in you , because the darkness is passing away and the true light already is shining .
62002009	The one who says he is in the light and hates his brother is in the darkness until now .
62002010	The one who loves his brother resides in the light , and there is no cause for stumbling in him .
62002011	But the one who hates his brother is in the darkness , and walks in the darkness , and does not know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I am writing to you , little children , because your sins have been forgiven you on account of his name .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have known the One who is from the beginning . I am writing to you , young men , because you have conquered the evil one .
62002014	I have written to you , children , because you have known the Father . I have written to you , fathers , because you have known the One who is from the beginning . I have written to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of God resides in you , and you have conquered the evil one .
62002015	Do not love the world or the things in the world . If anyone loves the world , the love of the Father is not in him ,
62002016	because everything that is in the world — the desire of the flesh and the desire of the eyes and the arrogance of material possessions — is not from the Father , but is from the world .
62002017	And the world is passing away , and its desire , but the one who does the will of God remains ˻ forever ˼ .
62002018	Children , it is the last hour , and just as you have heard that antichrist is coming , even now many antichrists have arisen , by which we know that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would have remained with us . But they went out , in order that it might be shown that all of them are not of us .
62002020	And you have an anointing from the Holy One , and you all know .
62002021	I have not written to you because you do not know the truth , but because you do know it , and because every lie is not of the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar except the one who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This person is the antichrist , the one who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	Everyone who denies the Son does not have the Father either ; the one who confesses the Son has the Father also .
62002024	As for you , what you have heard from the beginning must remain in you . If what you have heard from the beginning remains in you , you also will remain in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is the promise which he himself promised us : eternal life .
62002026	These things I have written to you concerning the ones who are trying to deceive you .
62002027	And as for you , the anointing which you received from him remains in you , and you do not have need that anyone teach you . But as his anointing teaches you about all things , and is true and is not a lie , and just as it has taught you , you reside in him .
62002028	And now , little children , remain in him , so that whenever he is revealed we may have confidence and not be put to shame before him at his coming .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous , you know that everyone also who practices righteousness has been fathered by him .
62003001	See what sort of love the Father has given to us : that we should be called children of God , and we are ! Because of this the world does not know us : because it did not know him .
62003002	Dear friends , now we are children of God , and what we will be has not yet been revealed . We know that whenever he is revealed we will be like him , because we will see him just as he is .
62003003	And everyone who has this hope in him purifies himself , just as that one is pure .
62003004	Everyone who practices sin also practices lawlessness , and sin is lawlessness .
62003005	And you know that that one was revealed in order that he might take away sins , and in him there is no sin .
62003006	Everyone who resides in him does not sin . Everyone who sins has neither seen him nor known him .
62003007	Little children , let no one deceive you : the one who practices righteousness is righteous , just as that one is righteous .
62003008	The one who practices sin is of the devil , because the devil has been sinning from the beginning . For this reason the Son of God was revealed : in order to destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Everyone who is fathered by God does not practice sin , because his seed resides in him , and he is not able to sin , because he has been fathered by God .
62003010	By this the children of God and the children of the devil are evident : everyone who does not practice righteousness is not of God , namely , the one who does not love his brother .
62003011	For this is the message that you have heard from the beginning : that we should love one another ,
62003012	not as Cain , who was of the evil one and violently murdered his brother . And ˻ for what reason ˼ did he violently murder him ? Because his deeds were evil and the deeds of his brother were righteous .
62003013	And do not marvel , brothers , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have passed over from death to life because we love the brothers . The one who does not love remains in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates his brother is a murderer , and you know that every murderer does not have eternal life residing in him .
62003016	We have come to know love by this : that ˻ he ˼ laid down his life on behalf of us , and we ought to lay down our lives on behalf of the brothers .
62003017	But whoever has the world’s material possessions and observes his brother ˻ in need ˼ and shuts his heart against him , how does the love of God reside in him ?
62003018	Little children , let us not love with word or with tongue , but in deed and truth .
62003019	And by this we know that we are of the truth and will convince our heart before him ,
62003020	that if our heart condemns us , that God is greater than our heart and knows all things .
62003021	Dear friends , if our heart does not condemn us , we have confidence before God ,
62003022	and whatever we ask we receive from him , because we keep his commandments and do what is pleasing ˻ in his sight ˼ .
62003023	And this is his commandment : that we believe in the name of his Son Jesus Christ and love one another , just as ˻ he commanded us ˼ .
62003024	And the one who keeps his commandments resides in him , and he in him . And by this we know that he resides in us : by the Spirit whom he has given to us .
62004001	Dear friends , do not believe every spirit , but test the spirits to determine if they are from God , because many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you know the Spirit of God : every spirit that confesses Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is from God ,
62004003	and every spirit that does not confess Jesus is not from God , and this is the spirit of the antichrist , of which you have heard that it is coming , and now it is already in the world .
62004004	You are from God , little children , and have conquered them , because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world .
62004005	They are from the world ; ˻ therefore ˼ they speak from the world and the world listens to them .
62004006	We are from God . The one who knows God listens to us ; whoever is not from God does not listen to us . By this we know the Spirit of truth and the spirit of deceit .
62004007	Dear friends , let us love one another , because love is from God , and everyone who loves has been fathered by God and knows God .
62004008	The one who does not love does not know God , because God is love .
62004009	By this the love of God is revealed in us : that God sent his one and only Son into the world in order that we may live through him .
62004010	In this is love : not that we have loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , if God loved us in this way , we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has seen God at any time . If we love one another , God resides in us and his love is perfected in us .
62004013	By this we know that we reside in him and he in us : that he has given us of his Spirit .
62004014	And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God , God resides in him and he in God .
62004016	And we have come to know and have believed the love that God has in us . God is love , and the one who resides in love resides in God , and God resides in him .
62004017	By this love is perfected with us , so that we may have confidence in the day of judgment , because just as that one is , so also are we in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love , but perfect love drives out fear , because fear includes punishment , and the one who is afraid has not been perfected in love .
62004019	We love , because he first loved us .
62004020	If anyone says , “ I love God , ” and hates his brother , he is a liar , for the one who does not love his brother whom he has seen is not able to love God whom he has not seen .
62004021	And this is the commandment we have from him : that the one who loves God should love his brother also .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been fathered by God , and everyone who loves ˻ the father ˼ also loves the child fathered by him .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of God : whenever we love God and keep his commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of God : that we keep his commandments . And his commandments are not burdensome ,
62005004	because everyone who is fathered by God conquers the world . And this is the victory which has conquered the world : our faith .
62005005	Now who is the one who conquers the world except the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	This is the one who came by water and blood — Jesus Christ , not with the water only , but with the water and with the blood . And the Spirit is the one who testifies , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	For there are three that testify ,
62005008	the Spirit and the water and the blood , and the three are ˻ in agreement ˼ .
62005009	If we receive the testimony of people , the testimony of God is greater , because this is the testimony of God that he has testified concerning his Son .
62005010	( The one who believes in the Son of God has the testimony in himself . The one who does not believe God has made him a liar , because he has not believed in the testimony that God has testified concerning his Son . )
62005011	And this is the testimony : that God has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	The one who has the Son has the life ; the one who does not have the Son of God does not have the life .
62005013	These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God , in order that you may know that you have eternal life .
62005014	And this is the confidence that we have before him : that if we ask anything according to his will , he hears us .
62005015	And if we know that he hears us in whatever we ask , we know that we have the requests that we have asked from him .
62005016	If anyone should see his brother sinning a sin not leading to death , he should ask , and he will grant life to him , to those who sin not leading to death . ( There is a sin leading to death ; I do not say that he should ask about that .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin , and there is a sin not leading to death . )
62005018	We know that everyone who is fathered by God does not sin , but the one fathered by God , he protects him , and the evil one does not touch him .
62005019	We know that we are from God , and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding , in order that we may know the one who is true , and we are in the one who is true , in his Son Jesus Christ . This one is the true God and eternal life .

65001001	Jude , a slave of Jesus Christ and brother of James , to those who are called , loved in God the Father and kept for Jesus Christ .

65001003	Dear friends , although I was making every effort to write to you concerning our common salvation , I considered it a necessity to write to you to encourage you to contend for the faith delivered once and for all to the saints .
65001004	For certain men have slipped in stealthily , who were designated long ago for this condemnation , ungodly ones , who change the grace of our God into licentiousness and who deny our only Master and Lord Jesus Christ .
65001005	Now I want to remind you , although you know everything once and for all , that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , the second time destroyed those who did not believe .
65001006	And the angels who did not keep to their own domain but deserted their proper dwelling place , he has kept in eternal bonds under deep gloom for the judgment of the great day ,
65001007	as Sodom and Gomorrah and the towns around them indulged in sexual immorality and ˻ pursued unnatural desire ˼ in the same way as these , are exhibited as an example by undergoing the punishment of eternal fire .
65001008	Despite that , in the same way also these men , because of their dreams , defile the flesh and reject authority and blaspheme majestic beings .
65001009	But Michael the archangel , when he argued with the devil , disputing concerning the body of Moses , did not dare to pronounce a blasphemous judgment , but said , “ The Lord rebuke you ! ”
65001010	But these persons blaspheme all that they do not understand , and all that they understand by instinct like the irrational animals , by these things they are being destroyed .
65001011	Woe to them ! For they have traveled in the way of Cain , and have given themselves up to the error of Balaam for gain , and have perished in the rebellion of Korah .
65001012	These are the ones feasting together without reverence , hidden reefs at your love feasts , caring for themselves , waterless clouds carried away by winds , late autumn trees without fruit , twice dead , uprooted ,
65001013	wild waves of the sea foaming up their own shameful deeds , wandering stars , for whom the deep gloom of darkness has been reserved for eternity .
65001014	And Enoch , the seventh from Adam , also prophesied about these people , saying , “ Behold , the Lord came with tens of thousands of his holy ones
65001015	to execute judgment against all , and to convict every soul concerning all their ungodly deeds that they have committed in an ungodly way , and concerning all the harsh things that ungodly sinners have spoken against him .
65001016	These people are grumblers , discontented , proceeding according to their own desires , and their mouths speaking pompous words , ˻ showing partiality to gain an advantage ˼ .
65001017	But you , dear friends , remember the words proclaimed beforehand by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001018	for they said to you that in the end time there will be scoffers following according to their own ungodly desires .
65001019	These are the ones who cause divisions , worldly , not having the Spirit .
65001020	But you , dear friends , by building yourselves up in your most holy faith , by praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	keep yourselves in the love of God , looking forward to the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life .
65001022	And have mercy on those who doubt ,
65001023	and save others by snatching them from the fire , and have mercy on others with fear , hating even the tunic stained by the flesh .
65001024	Now to the one who is able to protect you from stumbling and make you to stand before his glory blameless with exultation ,
65001025	to the only God our Savior , through Jesus Christ our Lord , be glory , majesty , power , and authority before all time and now and for all eternity . Amen .

66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s day , and I heard behind me a great sound like a trumpet
66001011	saying , “ What you see , write in a book and send it to the seven churches : to Ephesus and to Smyrna and to Pergamum and to Thyatira and to Sardis and to Philadelphia and to Laodicea . ”
